neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. The apartment is located next to the “Bäckeranlage” park and is still close to the heart of Zurich. The famous shopping areas like the Bahnhofstrasse or the old town "Niederdorf" with its many shops and restaurants are only a few minutes away by tram. The apartment is directly accessible by public transport. The nearest tram station "Helevetiaplatz" is only 150m away – from which you have direct connections to the lake and the famous “Bahnhofstrasse”. The main station in Zurich can be reached in about 12 minutes by tram or bus. There are Supermarkets in the direct vicinity. The “Denner” and “Coop” supermarkets are only 100m away.

name: Bullerby in Zurich - Rossö
description:
Rossö is one of two wooden, cosy and fully equipped cabin wagons standing on a meadow in the city of Zurich, where sheeps are grazing. Enjoy city and country life at the same time!

The space
Bullerby is located in the city but in a beautiful green and private area. We offer a fire place where you can barbecue and there are lots of possibilities to create special events. There are animals living here too: 3 sheeps, 3 cats and 7 hens.

As we (Sven, Line, Liv & Mia) moved here, we where fascinated about this green spot so close to the city center. And as travel and camping fans, we thought about sharing this big space with others, who appreciate city life and nature as much as we do. So we had the idea to share our place with two custom made cabin wagons, that fit into our Scandinavian style home. The cabins are fully equipped including bathroom and kitchen. neighborhood_overview:
Close to the Binz SZU Station (3min. walking distance) from Binz you can reach Uetliberg within minutes and enjoy a wonderful view over the Zürich lake and the whole city from the mountain.

5 minutes walking into the other direction you are in Sihlcity Shopping Center - a really cool place to check out, where they also do have a cinema with international movies and "original voice / language" versions. Many multi culti restaurants to be found there as well.

7 minutes by tram (walking to the tram: 2 mins) you are in the heart of the center, downtown on BAHNHOFSTRASSE and PARADEPLATZ by the lake. Old town is just there too, perfect to take a walk, visit galleries, go shopping, go for drinks and do whatever you love - at the end of the day, Zürich is a very famous city for its differnet offer on culture and entertainment - thats why famous people living just mintues from here come into town to enjoy their spare time (Tina Turner, Paris Hilton, etc.)

description:
Clean spacious room in an calm apartment excellently located in energetic district Wiedikon, just a few steps from city centre. In apartment there is full-sized kitchen with coffee machine. You'll also get a mobile-hotspot to have internet while exploring the city.

Please check detailed description below to know more.

The space
You are renting a room in an three-rooms apartment. The room has inside a real bed (which can be expanded to queen-size bed), table and wardrobe, so you'll have enough space to store all your luggage.

The room is perfect for a couple or a single person, as it's around 15m².

To make your stay easier for you, there will be waiting for you:
* Internet in the apartment
* Mobile Wifi Hotspot - so you can have constant internet connection while travelling, with battery lasting whole day
* Coffee machine with a wide variety of coffee capsules
* EU -> Swiss converter for your electrical devices<

Michał

Our apartments are designed and built around our guests. Space, privacy, service and design are our hallmarks - whether a guest is staying in our smallest apartment or our largest.

Sleek interiors are designed and built with classic Swiss attention to detail across the Le Bijou collection.

Each apartment features beautifully appointed bedroom, living, dining, kitchen and bathroom spaces equipped with the latest modern conveniences and designed in our beautifully sleek contemporary style.

High-specification contemporary design is paired with the bespoke Le Bijou technology to provide seamless service from reservation to check-out.

Guest access
Everythin
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of Zurich at the famous Münsterhof next to the Fraumünster Church and Paradeplatz, Le Bijou presents a swiss masterpiece in hospitality: The MH6 Penthouse Apartment.

MH6 is Zurich's most exclusive overnight accommodation with over 180 m2 in size, space for up to 8 people and spectecular view over the city's landmarks.

The penthouse apartment features an in-room sauna, private jacuzzi, a fully equipped kitchen and bar combined with services on demand. MH6 is discreetly hidden in one of Zurichs oldest buildings. The perfect combination of tradition and modern hospitality.

host_about:
Ich bin eine junge Frau, wohne jetzt mit meinem Kater in Zürich und bin viel und weit gereist. Zweimal war ich während einem Jahr auf Weltreise. Das erste Mal bin ich durch Asien nach Australien, Neuseeland und Kanada gereist, das letzte Mal von Guatemala bis nach Ushuaia, weiter auf die Osterinsel und Tahiti. 
Ich mag es sehr fremde Menschen und Kulturen kennen zu lernen und mich mit ihnen auszutauschen. 

I am a young woman, living in Zurich with a cat and I am well travelled. Twice I travelled around the world for a year by myself and I have seen and met lots of interesting places and people. On one trip I went trough Asia, OZ, NZ, parts of the American West Coast and all the way from Vancouver to Toronto. My last big trip led overland from Guatemala to Ushuaia, Easter Island and Tahiti.  
I love to meet and chat to new people from all around the world.

description:

The space

name: Zurich old town, exclusive
description:
Beautiful private room in the middle of the most exclusive living area in old town Zurich, only a few steps away from all major attractions and lake.

This exceptional private home was built in 1430 and has been home to some of Zurich's most famous residents.

Deluxe breakfast buffet included.

Newly, lovingly renovated.

Special part of Swiss history. Lake view, marvelous garden, fountain plunge pool. Use of conference room/office, garden and breakfast stube. Very quite, no cars.

The space
The breakfast room has original wooden panels dating back to the 15th century with a view to the lake and gardens in the back.

Guest access
Private room with ensuite bath, Conference room with refrigerator and separate bath, private fully equipped office with internet and large windows. Access to breakfast room. Use of three two, modern and first class renovated bathrooms.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: Oberdorf is the most attractive neighborhood in the old city of Zurich. It is two blocks from the Cathedrale Gross Muenster, Bahnhofstrasse and Paradeplatz yet a cosy, quite neighborhood with young and old. Art museums, spas, sport centers, all within minutes. The hidden gardens of Zurich in our back yard are private and quite. Pedestrian zone with no cars or traffic noise.
host_about:
I am an American entrepreneur living in Europe now for 29 years. I love sports, nature, technology, our garden and most of all my love Hanspeter. 

We are very fortunate to live in this special place and it gives us pleasure to share it with our guests. 

I play the flute, make my own tinctures, and grappa from the grapes in our garden. 

We love to eat, play chess & enjoy the arts. 

I am passionate about the environment and founded and run (Website hidden by Airbnb) the largest knowledge sharing platform and business exchange for the global water sector. We have 5 companies between us and are active in security, digital asset management , knowledge management and cryptocurrencies.

name: Charming apartment close to the centre
description:
Located on the second floor, this place is pretty bright. You will stay in a charming, fully equipped three-room apartment from the 70ies, with original wooden floors and ceramic tiles as well in the bathroom and in the balcony. From the kitchen, you’ll access to the balcony, which opens to a green and quiet inner court. Each of the two bedrooms are equipped with double beds and are very quiet.
I will provide you with fresh towels and make sure coffee and tea are available.

The space
Welcome to my place, it’s yours for a while! As I’m actually living here, you will the apartment fully equipped, feel free to use everything - just be respectful and leave and leave it as you found it.
neighborhood_overview:
It’s a very safe and quiet neighbourhood, located 10 Bus-minutes from the railway main station (Hauptbahnhof). For food supply, you’ll have a small shop just around the corner and a gas station that is open until 12pm, just a 5min walk away.

In Zürich, nothing is really far anyway. From this place, you’ll get to the living area of “Langstrasse” in 5 Bus-minutes and to the city centre (old town) in 10. The bus line 31, which is almost in front of the door, will bring you straight to the area of the art museum. In 10 min walk from the apartment you can get to the “Bullingerplatz”, a charming place with a fountain. which is filled with locals on sunny summer days – as long as they are not hanging around in one of the numerous river resorts or close to the lake.
host_about:
I am an Architect, around 30, living and working in the city of Zurich, Switzerland - The way I like to travel through cities is connecting both, the fun and "the clever" way. And because discovering a place is more than site seeing, I prefer to stay somewhere here than in a hotel.
Glad to meet you soon_ Thierry

Huge kitchen with dishwasher, fridge and freezer. Shower and own washing machine/dryer in the bathroom. Boxspring bed, TV and wi-fi, coffee machine available.

From here you have many train connections to Zurich Main Station (only 7 minutes) and to Zurich Airport (3 minutes).

Restaurants, bars, 50m swimming pool, ice skating ring, gyms, the shopping centre Center Eleven as well as Zurich downtown and Zurich Airport are all within reach by walk or in 10 minutes with the train/bus.

name: House with pool in a great/quiet area in Zurich
description:
Built in 1928, the 5-bedroom house with garden and pool is a perfect location for a family. Modern furniture and design classics create a welcoming and bright atmosphere for a stay in and around the house. The place is close to the city center and yet in a very quiet location.

The space
At the ground floor of the house, you will find a large living and dining room with an open kitchen. On the first floor, there are 3 (kids-)bedrooms and a bath room with bathtub. On the second floor, there is another large (parents-)bedroom, an «office» and a bath room with shower. In the attic, you will find another bedroom. At the basement, there is the washing machine, a playroom fort he kids and direct access to the garage, that you can use during your stay.

There is our cat «Malou», that will wander around the garden and is looking forward meeting people from all over the world. She is living in the basement, not in the living area of the house.

The house is a listed building in a save neighbourhood.

The space

With a 5 minutes walk you'll find the apartment from the central station or the national museum, with its beautiful park.
When crossing the river (Limmat) you can pay a visit to the old town and the university district (ETH and University of Zurich).
Further along the famous shopping street Bahnhofstrasse, with all exclusive shops, you get to the lake of Zurich with a stunning view of the alps.
Following the street, where the apartment is located, to the Langstrasse, (about 5min on foot) you'll find yourself in the popular Zurich's nightlife scene.

The space

Our cleaning service with two week housekeeping and linen change (towels and sheets) is included in the rental price for all apartments, including waste disposal and final cleaning.

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables.

name: grosse, unmöblierte Wohnung zur Untermiete
description:
Meine Wohnung ist ganz in der Nähe von Universität/ETH und dem Bus 33 (ÖV). Sie ist zur Untermiete verfügbar von 1. Oktober - 30. April 17.
Monatsmiete: 1980 CHF inkl. Nebenkosten
Sie werden meine grosse Unterkunft lieben wegen der ruhigen Umgebung, des vielen Lichts und der guten Lage. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für Paar und Alleinreisende. Es wird zu Ihrem Schutz ein offizieller Untermietvertrag abgeschlossen. Bitte vereinbaren Sie einen Besichtigungstermin für kommenden Freitag 16. September.

The space
Die Wohnung ist unmöbliert und biete Ihnen die Möglichkeit nach anderen Wohnungen zu suchen oder einen 6-monatigen Aufenthalt in Zürich zu haben. Die Wohnung wird nur nach vereinbartem Besichtigungstermin an diesem Freitag, 16. September übergeben.

Other things to note
Bitte vereinbaren Sie einen Besichtigungstermin an diesem Freitag, 16. September zwischen 14h und 16h.
host_about:
Holà, coucou and hello
My friends call me Babu and I'm always interested in meeting new, open and friendly people from all over the world. I grew up in Zurich -the German part of Switzerland- and I am now living in the French part. 
I like to travel all over the world when I have some free time - especially in South America, where I learned even a little Spanish. I think that's why I love cooking and food from everywhere.
I'll be happy to show you my favorite "Bistros" and "Cafés" or give you some usefull information about Lausanne and the beautiful region of the Geneva Lake.

The loft is equipped with all basic necessities :-)
Please note that if you are taller than 1.90M , the ceiling might be to low for you.

Located on the top floor of the building, our Studio is discrete and well protected from outside noises. The building itself is centrally located in a residential area and is served with direct connections to the main station, the lake and others points of interest.
The Studio is spacious enough for you to feel at home and relax after a long day of visiting Zurich and its surroundings.

Our home is your home. During your stay, our entire studio is for your use.

name: Stylish garden flat in quiet, central location
description:
2 bedroom ground floor flat located on a quiet residential road just 4 minutes train ride into Zurich HB station.
Furnished to a very high standard with a fully equipped kitchen. A delicious breakfast with freshly home baked bread, homemade jam and homegrown fruits from our garden is also available for a small premium, should you wish.

The space
Situated on the ground floor of our house, this self contained flat has been tastefully decorated with great attention to detail. Children are very welcome with high chair, baby cot and toys all available on request. Our aim is to make our guests feel as at home as possible.

Guest access
The house is surrounded by a beautiful, wild garden with a private balcony for our guests to enjoy with direct access into the garden. A washer and tumbler are available in a dedicated wash room located in the cellar and can be used upon agreement.
neighborhood_overview: The accommodation is located in Wiedikon which has the best bars, restaurants and independent boutiques the city has to offer right on your door step.
host_about: We are Petra and Simon. Our roots are in both Denmark and Switzerland. We have been living in our house in Zurich with our two daughters – Frida (12) and Asta (7) for the past 10 years. The house was built in 1895 and has been carefully renovated by us over the past years. Petra is a Graphic Designer and Art Historian and Simon is an Engineer. We love Art and Design, music, cooking, gardening, the mountains and opening our door to friends and guests…

description:
Whether you are travelling alone, as a couple or on a businesstrip - you will love our newly renovated studios on the third floor of our villa. They are all spacious (30 m2). Each of them has a separate bathroom. They have very comfortable kingsize bed, a fridge, a coffeemachine, a water kettle and a table where you can work. In the hallway you will find a microwave, dishwasher, a washer/dryer and a printer/scanner/copy machine. Non-smoking - no kitchen facility.

The space
The spacious Studio (30 m2) offers a unique view on the gardens of our green and quiet neighbourhood. The furniture is made of wood - especially made by Swiss carpenters for us. Good design and swiss or at least european materials are very important for us. The bed is very comfortable - you will sleep very well in it. Ensuite bathroom. Wonderful view over the city.

name: Cosy room in Zürich / Affoltern
description:
Bright 14.5 sqm room, top location in Zurich Affoltern.
Available as of February 1st 2021

Highlights

Room
Unfurnished
14.5 sqm, bright, overlooking courtyard
Very quiet

Flat
New construction, in top condition
Large-scale and light-flooded
Fully furnished

The space
For the third room in our 3-people WG we, Flavio and Michael, are looking for another person as of February 1st, 2021 - exact dates are flexible.

Room:
The room is 14.5 sqm (3.3 x 4.4 m), unfurnished and very quiet. It has two large windows overlooking the backyard, through which plenty of sunshine comes in.

Flat:
The (120 sqm) apartment is a new building from 2011, fully furnished, with high speed internet and in top condition. It is located on the 3rd floor, an elevator is available. In addition to three separate rooms, the apartment has a large and light-flooded living room, a fully equipped kitchen w
neighborhood_overview:
Location:
The apartment is conveniently located, yet quietly located by S-Bahn and bus stop directly in front of the door.
15 min to the main station by S-Bahn / E-Bike,
6-9 min to Oerlikon by S-Bahn / bus,
7 min to ETH Hönggerberg by bus.

A motorway exit to the A1 is 1 km away. A large Migros (MM), Coop and Migrolino (Mon-Sun open) are reachable in 3 minutes on foot. The idyllic recreation area Katzensee is located in the immediate vicinity and is ideal for bathing, jogging or cycling.
host_about:
Hello everyone, 

I am renting out a room in a 3 bed room apartment in Zürich Affoltern to one to two guests on selected days. You would be sharing the apartment with two friendly flat mates who have separate rooms - both working during daytime but enjoy spending the evening together over a good conversation, a cup of tea or a self-prepared meal.  

About the room: 
- Simply furnished (mattress, space for clothes, desk, and chair)
- Separate bathroom with shower and toilet
- Shared facilities include the living room, kitchen and balcony. 

Public transportation to the city center is convenient and includes a train (15 min to main train station via train S6) as well as multiple bus lines (approx. 25 min to city center). Also, for those who enjoy nature, there is plenty of fields, forests and lakes close by for you to go jogging, walking or for a summer swim. 

Should you be interested, simply make a reservation and I will get back to you soon afterwards. Also feel free to write me in case of questions regarding the room for rent. 

Michael

name: Stauffacher Apartment- Rodriguez
description:
On 33 sqm this beautiful and furnished 2.5 room business flat offers a maximum comfort. The furnished business apartment impresses through its central location in Zurich and its modern equipment. Form the business rental you reach the main station in a few minutes and you are perfectly connected to the public transport. The beautiful Bäckeranlage park is located opposite the business apartment. Here you can stroll and find recreation.

The space
The bright accommodation offers space for four guests. In the bedroom of this furnished flat there is one double bed and the living area provides a sofa bed for two persons. In the spacious living room with adjoining kitchen you will also find a comfortable seating area. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to cook. Of course, a private bathroom belongs to the furnished business flat.
neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. The apartment is located next to the “Bäckeranlage” park and is still close to the heart of Zurich. The famous shopping areas like the Bahnhofstrasse or the old town "Niederdorf" with its many shops and restaurants are only a few minutes away by tram. The apartment is directly accessible by public transport. The nearest tram station "Helevetiaplatz" is only 150m away – from which you have direct connections to the lake and the famous “Bahnhofstrasse”. The main station in Zurich can be reached in about 12 minutes by tram or bus. There are Supermarkets in the direct vicinity. The “Denner” and “Coop” supermarkets are only 100m away.

name: Large and bright apartment - Quiet but central
description:
We offer our apartment in a lovely, quiet and very convenient location. Direct tram connection to airport and main train station. Walking distance to ETH/University, historic center, lake, shopping. 2 bright rooms, 1.5 bathrooms, large kitchen and living room, balcony with view over Uetliberg and sunsets. You'll love it!

The space
We rent our full apartment when we are out of town. It includes 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other one with a comfortable single/double pull-out bed. For groups of 5 people, we offer the option of an inflatable mattress or sleeping on the large couch in the living room. If you are traveling with a baby, we also have a baby room with a crib and a changing table.
The apartment is very bright, with a West-facing balcony to enjoy views of the city, Uetliberg mountain, and beautiful sunsets. There is a main bathroom with shower/bathtub and a smaller bathroom with a second toilet. The kitchen is large and fully equipped.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a residential area, very nice, safe and quiet, on the Zurichberg hill. There are several supermarkets just minutes away, as well as smaller stores and boutiques.
host_about:
We're a young Italian couple from Bergamo, currently living in Zurich. Pietro is an assistant professor in economics at the University of Zurich, and Cecilia works as a data analyst for an energy efficiency organization. We lived in Chicago for 6 years before moving to Zurich in September 2015. 

We love: the outdoors, cooking, cats (Cecilia) & dogs (Pietro), coffee (Cecilia) & chocolate (Pietro). We're laid back hosts and guests. We're happy to hang out when there is a chance, but we won't intrude.

Small flat (50m2) for two travellers with 1 bathroom in the kreis 5. Near Escherwyss Platz, 7 min by tram to Zurich main station, famous Bahnhofstrasse. Limmat river and vibrant Langstrasse are reachable in walking distance. Surrounded by various restaurants, parks & cafés.

The space
The flat has 50m2 with 1 bed room, 1 bath room, a living room, 1 balcony and a kitchen.

I will provide you with shampoo and douche gels so that it is easier for you to travel. The kitchen is fully equipped. In the room you will find more information about the city and of course the WIFI connection.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole appartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the house is the supermarket called "Coop", a pharmacy and a kiosk.

It takes only a few steps to get to the restaurants which are located in the neighborhood. Only two minutes away you can enjoy having drinks around the Escherwyss Platz. The restaurant Geroldsgarten is a nice spot on a nice summer day.

Only by crossing the street you can enjoy the Limmat river, go for a swim, sitting on the gras and having a nice picnic.

name: Bright and cozy 1.5 apartment in Zurich (HG-4)
description:
Elegant apartment in very central location. The beautiful and modernly furnished apartment is equipped with flat screen tv, hi-fi system and free wireless access.

Cleaning

Our cleaning service with two week housekeeping and linen change (towels and sheets) is included in the rental price for all apartments, including waste disposal and final cleaning.

Free WiFi

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables. Compost, PET bottles, glass, carton, paper, aluminium cans, batteries and other toxic waste are disposed

name: Terrace-flat close to the alternative Zurich
description:
The renovated flat in an over 120 y/o building in the heart of Zurich is located near Escher-Wyss-Platz and the river and several bus/tram-stops. It is close to the city center and may nightlife spots. It comes with a large kitchen, a living room with a large and comfy sofa and table for six. The apartment has two separate bedrooms (one with a bed for two and the other with a smaller bed). A fourth person can sleep on an additional mattress. Furthermore, there is a huge sunny balcony.

The space
We renovated and refurnished the flat during the last years to give it a unique style. There are vintage lamps and stylish furniture, a modern light system (Phillips Hue, you can download the app or control it over the switches on the wall) and we have a fan in the summer and central heating in winter. The green wall and the dark wooden beams create a unique atmosphere.

We are on the top floor and love our balcony and you sure will too, enjoy a warm summer eveni
neighborhood_overview: Great place for going out in Zurich and get to know the alternative part of this vibrating city. Also the old town is directly reachable by bus or tram in around 15 minutes. The flat is also close to the airport (20‘) and the main station (12‘).
host_about: I have been living in Zurich for more than five years. Working and doing my PhD at the Universitiy of Zurich i love to travel during weekends or during smester brakes (or just do my work in other places). Thus, I can welcome travelling people in my flat.

You can accept a two rooms apartment with a big kitchen, a bathroom with a bathtub and a separate toilet.
The apartment itself is furnished quite simple, a sofa in the living room, a double bed and a wardrobe in the bedroom and a dining table in the kitchen.

The space
Dear Guest, I´m currently setting up my account - that is why the description is short and the pictures aren´t perfect. Thank you for your understanding. :)

First things first, I´m renting out the apartment where I usually live in. But only in terms I´m on holiday.
+ shampoo in the bathroom, toothpaste if forgotten, a lot of pasta for hungry evenings ...

If you decide to stay at my place, you can accept a two rooms apartment with a big ki

host_about:
I am working for a bank here in Zurich and have a tendency to work long hours. I recently relocated to Switzerland to restart a more "normal" life. 

Before moving to Switzerland I spent 3 years doing an overland journey around the world. I rode my motorcycle from London to Vietnam, then traveled across the America from Ushuaia all the way up to New York. If you want to know more about my journey check out my blog lespassengers com or my fessebouc "les passengers"

I keep traveling from time to time and am delighted to host travellers as much as I can to keep an open mind and feed my curiosity. Now I can't travel as much I love to have the travellers coming to me ;-)

name: Central, minimalist, clean flat
description:
This quiet & spirited flat is located in the heart of Zurich’s trendy neighborhood, Wipkingen. The place perfect for couples, single travelers, business people and small families as it offers a spacious living area at an affordable price :)

The space
My little flat is located super close (150m) to Wipkingen Bahnhof, where you find not only different transportation means but also bars, restaurants and shopping options.

It's in the fourth floor with a pretty bird's view over the street and the backyard.
The flat is furnished quite simply and I personally like to have some space to breathe and do yoga :) You can use the yoga equipment (blocks & mat) if you want. The space is extremely quiet and relaxing to live here.

There are only two peculiarities to the flat, both of which you can see in the images.
1) The bathroom sink is located outside of the bathroom in the flat's hallway
2) The bed lays on close to the ground but fea
neighborhood_overview:
There are so many different supermarkets, places to eat and shop just 150m away! Although I highly recommend exploring the area with a "fresh" pair of eyes, here are the things I'd vouch for:

Bar "Nordbrücke" – Open almost all days, great selection of drinks, spinning sessions by local DJs on weekends (can get crowded by then).

"The Artisan" – awesome craft beer/dinner place with very good fresh produce and great "bière blonde" as well as more freaky nuances of beer.

"Ultimo Bacio"– organic supermarket with everything your organic heart craves for. Very extensive selection of fine chocolates (in case you want to bring some home) and great bread.

Apart from that, you'll find an ice cream shop, an Italian restaurant, supermarkets, a bakery, and just about everything you need around these places in no less than 200m distance from the flat.
host_about:
I am a social globe explorer with a lot of interests! I'm working to make the world a nicer place to live. 

When I'm not in my current base, Zurich, I travel  and learn as much as possible to shape the place we call earth. Our time here is limited so why don't we just do cool, helpful stuff? 
 
The one thing I couldn't live without is
to look at my life shortly before death and realize that I did not try to pursue changing the world for the better.
Sounds stupid but I just want to spend my time intensively. 



Have a nice day!

description:
Located in downtown Zurich within walking distance of the main train station and just next to tram stop "Stauffacher", including parking.

This 160m2 two-story attic/penthouse design apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, two bathrooms and a separate toilet, two separate bedrooms (master bedroom on the top floor with separate bathroom, and a smaller bedroom on the lower floor) and a third room for two additional guests. The apartment is ideal for couples, families or business travelers.

The space

Guest access

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Downtown Zurich area in the famous "Kreis 4", which is a lively neighbourhood that offers many great restaurants, trendy shops, a nearby movie Theater and great public transportation.
host_about: Thierry is a 35 years old Swiss that is married to a Finnish wife called Eija. We are parents to 3 year old twins and live and work in the surroundings of Zurich. We love good food, design, art, travel and action. We play volleyball, tennis, squash, golf and Finnish baseball. Thierry is working as the CEO of an international IT company. Eija works for an international pharma company where she leads a team of financial analysts and controllers.

Elegant apartment in very central location. The beautiful and modernly furnished apartment is equipped with a sofa-bed, flat screen tv, hi-fi system and free wireless access.

Cleaning

Our cleaning service with two week housekeeping and linen change (towels and sheets) is included in the rental price for all apartments, including waste disposal and final cleaning.

Free WiFi

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). name: gemütliche zwei zimmer in altbau nähe see
description:
ich vermiete zwei zimmer in meiner wohnung, schlaf und wohnzimmer. in der nähe von tram und bus, nähe einkaufszentrum sihlcity, nähe see, bahnhof enge, hauptbahnhof, stadtzentrum (bahnhofstrasse) die wohnung ist altbau. ich bin unkompliziert arbeite als gärtner und komparse in der oper. du solltest auch unkompliziert sein und altbau mögen...
meine mitbewohnerin welche auch hier wohnt ist hotelfachfrau und arbeitet im moment in einer bäckerei welche auch ein restaurant ist.

The space
es kann ein kinderbett in das zu vermietende wohnzimmer gestellt werden, müsste aber selbst mitgebracht werden.

Guest access
badezimmer, küche und balkon

Other things to note
da ich für einen monat im ausland bin suche ich jemanden, oder zwei personen welche mein zimmer vom 22.7.2017 bis 22.8.2017 mietet. wer sich für den ganzen monat interessiert kann man sich auf einen fixpreis einigen
neighborhood_overview: nähe rietbergmuseum, rieterpark, allmend, see, tohnhalle, bürkliplatz (flohmarkt und foodmarkt), bellevue, rote fabrik, nähe binz wo die bahn für auf den üetliberg hält

name: Spacious family home in Downtown Switzerland
description:
This contemporary furnished town apartment has all amenities you want to have in a home away from home...

The space
Wonderful city appartment, beautifully furnished and fully equipped. The 4 bedrooms can sleep up to 10 people. 2 bathrooms, hi-speed WiFi and washing machine / dryer are just some of the amenities. And there’s a big veranda with BBQ grill

Guest access
Entire apartment

Other things to note
The building belongs to a former brewery compound, which has been converted into a beautiful campus that hosts offices (Big Tech European Development Center), a spa, restaurants, shops as well as apartment buildings. It is nestled between the river Sihl (awesome jogging trail!), the regional funicular train up the Uetliberg (Top of Zurich with great views) and Brandschenkestreet.
neighborhood_overview: Zürich-Enge is literally ‚downtown’ - major sights, shopping and attractions such as the lake are less than a 10 minutes walk away...
host_about: Hi there, I love staying with fellow AirBnB hosts myself since I believe in the power of this community. Looking forward to many inspiring encounters with local flavor...;)

name: Wohnung mit grossem sonnigen Süd-Balkon/ 5' bis HB
description:
Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe vom Bahnhof Zürich Altstetten. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende Abenteurer und Geschäftsreisende.

Guest access
Sie dürfen die gesamte Wohnung und den schönen Balkon benutzen.
neighborhood_overview:
Die Umgebung ist ruhig. Meine Nachbarn sind auch ruhig. Vom Balkon, der Küche und der Fensterseite hat man einen Blick ins Grüne in einem Wohnquartier. Man sieht von der Wohnung aus keine Strasse oder Eisenbahnlinie. Daher gibt es weder Lärm durch Autos noch durch Züge.
In 3 Gehminuten oder nach einer Tramstation ist man am Lindenplatz. Dort gibt es eine Post, Restaurants, den Neumarkt Altstetten und viele weitere Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
host_about:
I speak 5 languages (German, French, Spanish, Portuguese and English) and I have lived in Switzerland, United States, Brazil, Poland and Germany. I love to travel all over the world. I have been in more than 60 countries on all continents. I like to experience and learn about other cultures. I'm very international.
I would like to invite you to explore Zurich and Switzerland and I hope that you also like it.

Die Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende Abenteurer, Geschäftsreisende und Paare. Gerne vermieten wir das Apartement auch für eine längere Zeitdauer. Regelmässige Reinigung mit Bettwäsche wechseln. Nähe S-Bahn Station Binz. Bäckerei Lebensmittelläden Restaurants Post visavie und in der Nähe.
5 min zu Fuss zum Einkaufszentrum Brunaupark, 10 zu Fuss zur Sihlcity.

The space

The villa offers 5 bedrooms, 3 living rooms, a cinema room, 2 office rooms, a cigar room and a garden. All furniture and décor are original period items, meanwhile the Villa offers today comforts and technology.
The heart of the city is less than 10minutes away by public transport or by car.
We have a Villa guardian for your convenience.

The space
If you do not want to stay in a hotel, Villa Imperial in Zurich is the perfect choice for you – it offers full privacy: nobody disturbs you, it even meets the requirements of celebrities and VIP persons.

The villa is a unique and exclusive venue for wedding or birthday parties and business events, eg. product launch, partner party (price and conditions are upon request only)

The villa has a beautiful and large garden and a cov

 I am Azur, the property manager of Luxury villas, such as Villa Anabel near Monaco or as Villa Imperial in Zürich.

description:
Cozy and tidy apartment on the last floor of a four stories building easily accessible with lift. Four large windows overview the roofs of central Zurich. Supreme location, walking distance to the main attractions of the city as well as major public transport.

Die Wohnung befindet sich im letzten Stock und vier grosse Fenster bieten einen herrlichen Ausblick über die Dächer von Zürich. Der Hauptbahnhof, Einkaufsmöglickeiten und die ETH sind in nur 5 Minuten zu Fuss erreichbar.

The space
Fully equipped with one large queen size bed that can host up to two people, table with chairs, kitchen (including a large range of cooking tools as well as table set-ups), kettle and Nespresso machine and bathroom with all facilities. A cupboard with drawers is also available.
The large windows offer a stunning view on the Liebfrauenkirche, an icon on Zurich. WiFi is available for the guests.

Possibility to grant a discount for longer stays. Check-in a

- 300 Meter to Zurich Main Station (HB - Hauptbahnhof).

- 200 Meter from Central.

- 5 minutes to Coop and Migros supermarkets (in Central Station, the only one in town open also on Sundays).

name: Cozy Room in Zürich, sunny, calm and central
description:
Optimal for a Business trip or Holidays in Zurich. One King Size bed, kitchen may be used, bathroom, entre, and a big Terrasse with a wonderful view over Zurich. 15 Minutes per bus to downtown or 20 min distance to Airport by car or bus/Train.
WLAN available - NO-SMOKING

Appreciate when you take off the shoes after entering the appartment .
Then my home will be your Castle for a while.

Check-in / check-out individuelly, ask for preferred check-In Time and get approval a.s.a.p.

The space
Appartment with one Bedroom/Livingroom, one KingSize Bed, Terrasse, Bath, Kitchen may be used with respect, Nespresso Coffee machine available. Big Terrasse may be used as well.
Overall a very sunny and bright place to stay with an unique view over the City.
host_about:
Ich bin Silvia, eine Schweizerin, seit über 30 Jahren in Zürich wohnhaft, in der Lebensmitte, und ein Cosmopolitan. Mein Lebensmotto ist "Balanced every day". Ein ausgeglichener Tag ist ein guter Tag. Und Zeit, freie Zeit, das kostbarste Gut.
Ruhig, gelassen und mit bewusster Achtsamkeit gehe ich durchs Leben oder versuche es täglich.  Fotografie, Yoga, Essen, Reisen, Kunst, Lesen, Filme/Kino, Musik sowieso, und vieles mehr, sind die Dinge und schönen Momente, die mein Leben bereichern. Ich bin Nichtraucherin seit über 15 Jahren und geniesse ein sauberes, gemütliches und gut riechendes zu Hause und every day the view, the sunrise and the sunset.

name: Vintage roof-apartment with two bedrooms and AC
description:
In a quiet residential area in the north of Zurich, we offer a beautiful, bright roof apartment with bathroom, kitchen, living / dining area and two bedrooms. The outside area with pergola and barbecue is open for sharing.

Oerlikon railway station is less than a ten-minute walk from the apartment and the exhibition hall and the "Hallenstadion" are a 15-minute walk away. Airport and city center can be reached comfortably within minutes by public transportation.

The space
The apartment is newly renovated and furnished with love. There is no washing machine. The host offers a laundry service if necessary.

Guest access
We live on the lower two levels of the house. You share the entry with us, but you have your own lockable door to the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located on a very quiet street with little one-way traffic. The Oerlikon train station is within an eight-minute walk and one of the most frequented in Switzerland with excellent connections in all directions.
The "Hallenstadion" with its big concerts and sporting events as well as the neighboring exhibition halls can be reached by bus in five minutes or on foot in fifteen minutes.
In the center of Oerlikons you will find numerous restaurants and shopping.
On the Wednesday and Saturday morning fresh products from the surrounding area can be found on the weekly market.

The space

The rest of the apartment includes a great entrance & kitchen area, toilet/showers and a big living room where the second bed, the sofa bed is. If you are more than 4 people, there is the possibility to use the air-mattress.

The apartment is perfect for a couple, max 3 people. There is also a washing machine and dryer in the apartment. All at your disposal.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the very heart of Zurich, Niederdorf a pedestrian area located only minuted away from the main station. Here you will find the greatest variety of beautiful bars and restaurants, as well as a great shopping and grocery.

From the terrace you have the most beautiful view on the river; the lake is a 5min stroll away and the main station just 10 min walk.

description:
Ciao! Welcome to my lovely apartment. You’ll love my place because of the location and the neighborhood, set in the chic and residential area of Seefeld just a few steps from romantic lake zurich and close to main attractions, boutiques, restaurants, bars, botanical gardens, china gardens, the Opera, and swimming.

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families.

The space
The apartment is stylishly decorated and furnished for you to enjoy the best comfort with elevator, balcony, full furnished kitchen, and your own washer and dryer. In winter you can enjoy the fireplace and in the summer you are steps from lake beaches.

There is tram and bus stop just in front of the apartment that links you to the main station and the airport (25 min) very easily accessible. The city centre is a few tram stops or a short walk away.

Guest access
A bedroom, a living room, a balcony, a dining ro

It is a quiet neighborhood but close to the vibrant parts of the city such as Niederdorf.

name: 3.5 room apartment in Zurich-Oerlikon (BA-21)
description:
Elegant apartment in very central location. The beautiful and modernly furnished apartment is equipped with flat screen tv, hi-fi system and free wireless access.

Cleaning

Our cleaning service with two week housekeeping and linen change (towels and sheets) is included in the rental price for all apartments, including waste disposal and final cleaning.

Free WiFi

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables. Compost, PET bottles, glass, carton, paper, aluminium cans, batteries and other toxic waste are disposed

Founded in Switzerland in 2013, Delta Estates AG specialises in the rental of high-quality furnished homes known for their commitment to service and style at ideally situated locations.  

All of our apartments are fully fitted with a kitchen, dishwasher, coffee and washing machine and are easily accessible by public or private transport.

name: Very Centric studio with roof top terrace
description:
Small and cozy top floor studio with its own roof top terrace.

The studio has been redone in 2017, so it's all new and fresh! It's perfect for 1- 2 if you are looking for a very centric location to overnight. (Not suitable for infants.)

Kitchen is fully equipped and has dishwasher, microwave, coffee machine, water boiler and toaster.

It's on the 4th floor (no elevator) with a terrace only for yourself! Has a ladder to climb up and you will be rewarded with fantastic view over Zürich.

Guest access
You will have the whole place + the terrace for yourself.

Other things to note
There is a bar on the ground floor in the same building, so some road noise can be heard if the windows are open.

Check-in after 8 pm is possible upon request and 20 CHF extra are to be paid upon arrival.
neighborhood_overview: Super centric. You can't be at a better location. The old town is just in front of the door! Plenty of restaurants, bars and shops in the area. A super market is just around the corner.
host_about:
Hello!

We are a couple in our 30-ies who used to work in large international corporations in Zürich. But we've left that path to start our own company to be able to travel and work at the same time as digital nomads.

Everything that has to do with traveling, cultures and languages is exciting for us! We have travelled to over 70 countries and speak 7 languages, counted together.

The Airbnb community is fantastic. We love to get to meet people from all over the world, both as guests and hosts. It's our priority to make our guests feels like home and to have a wonderful time here in Switzerland. 

Hope to have to chance to have you as our guests. Looking forward to hear from you!

name: New Rooftop-Apartment, central and quiet
description:
Newly built (2017), bright and carefully furnished mansard apartment. With a spacious private rooftop terrace and great view of the city. The apartment is on the 4th floor of an Art Nouveau building. No elevator. It is ideal for 1 person or a pair, also for longer stays. Unfortunately, it is not suitable for children under ten. There are grocery stores, bakeries, a post office, restaurants and an ATM close to the apartment.

The space
The apartment is located at the foot of the Zürichberg, near the University and the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH). It’s a 7 minutes drive by tram to the main train station, to the lake and to the old town. From/to the airport it takes you about 25 minutes by a direct tram (Line Nr. 10). The nearest tram stop is only 5 minutes away by foot. The apartment has a kitchenette (coffee machine, electric kettle, fridge and two induction hobs), but not a fully equipped kitchen.

The bed is 140 cm wide and has a high-en
host_about:
Ich bin Germanistin und Kunsthistorikerin, habe in Zürich und Berlin studiert, und reise selber sehr gerne. Viele Reisen führten mich in die verschiedensten Ländern von Afrika, aber auch Amerikas und Asiens. Regelmässig sind wir auch in europäischen Städten und Ländern unterwegs, vor allem in Paris, wo ich am liebsten eine zweite Wohnung hätte... 
Ich kenne die Bedürfnisse von Reisenden und bin, falls gewünscht, gerne bereit, Tipps und Infos zu Zürich zu geben.

name: Precious apartment by the lake in central Zurich
description:
Central apartment in the exclusive Zurich Seefeld area, just minutes away from the beautiful Zurichhorn park and the lake.

The flat has one double (160cm) bed and a sofa that can easily be made into another 140cm bed. There is a big wardrobe area, plenty of storage space and large windows facing the street. The kitchen now has fold-out dining table for up to three people (not shown on the pictures).

If you have any individual requests I'll do my best to accommodate.

Any questions just ask!

Guest access
The entire apartment is available for the guest(s). There are laundry facilities in the building free of charge. The building also has a bicycle storage room.
neighborhood_overview: Seefeld is one of the most beautiful and "posh" areas in central Zurich with lots of restaurants & bars, yet it is still very safe and tranquil, with the best access to the lake where you can swim and enjoy the adjacent park. There are plenty of supermarkets nearby.

name: Above the roofs and in the middle of everything!
description:
My cosy little attic apartment sits right above the roofs of Zurich – with a view of the Üetliberg! – and yet right in the middle of everything. The hotspot of Zurich nightlife (Langstrasse) with many bars, restaurants, clubs and cinemas is literally around the corner. There are two bus stops in front of the building, the main train station as well as the historic center are within walking distance. There’s hardly a better location to experience the different aspects of this little big city!

The space
As I live and work here, I set up my rooms for multifunctional use: the large bed serves as a sofa as well, the dining room is also a study.

Guest access
The apartment is fully equipped with washing machine, dish washer, big flatscreen television, sound system, Wifi, Netflix, E-Piano, many DVDs and even more books in German, English, French and Italian – yet there is no elevator!

name: Room: 2★Your downtown base for tourism + business★
description:
Your private bedroom is located in a old beautiful and cozy apartment in the center of Zurich on one of the most famous streets in Switzerland: Langstrasse. You are just minutes from central station and just a few meters from the city's nightlife in the midst of clubs, bars, restaurants, shops and also relaxing green areas. Zürich international airport can be reached in half an hour with public transport. There is often the opportunity to check in earlier or later. Just send me an inquiry.

The space
A compliment which I always hear from guests, that the accommodation is very well located. It is located just a few minutes from Zurich main train station (Zürich HB), from which you can easily reach Zurich International Airport ZRH. My accommodation is ideal for tourists who want to visit our beautiful city of Zurich as you can reach many attractions and the old town on foot very quickly. Even party people who only come to Zurich for the weekend or for a concert are
neighborhood_overview:
Langstrasse is Zurich's most colorful and varied district. You can savor international specialties and enjoy multi-cultural shopping options during the day here, while the street converts into Zurich's nightlife district at night. One bar after another, popular clubs and if you get hungry from partying a lot, there's plenty of food available from the many take-aways and 24-hour shops. Langstrasse never sleeps and has progressed from a former red-light district into one of the most popular districts in the city. This is also thanks to the many young designers and restaurant owners, who have upgraded the district over the past years. (Source: Website Zurich tourism)

The apartment is located in one of the city's most popular locations: the so called Langstrassenquartier. The Langstrasse (which means long street) is one of the most colorful addresses here in Zurich. The Swiss Army used to be stationed here in large barracks which still exists today and are only minutes from the

name: Bright, spacious room with large loggia
description:
The room is located in a residential area, the next bus stop is 1 min away and you have connections every 10 min to the city center with a 15-20 min ride.
There is direct access to a large loggia to enjoy breakfast or dinner outside. The appartment is also close to two nice parks and the mountain Uetliberg where you can enjoy a great view of the city.
The next supermarket is 300m away. There is WIFI, fresh bed sheets, towels, 2 pillows etc. available.
If you have any questions, let me know.

The space
The appartment is usually shared between 3 people, but until the 28.12, we are all on holidays so there will be nobody else there. From the 28.12 on, only one roommate will be in the appartment and as he already went through a Covid infection in September, there is no risk of infection. Of course, the whole apparment will be desinfected and there is desinfectant available for everybody. Each room has its own lock and key.

name: Studio Apartment Mini
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS.

If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Mini Studio Apartments' size: 15 m²

This modern studio caters for all the daily needs. Its bright and spacious living and dining area with designer furniture tempts with a cozy dining corner. Directly opposite, there is a fully fitted kitchenette with a glass ceramic stove, microwave, coffee maker, cutlery and crockery. The discreetly separated sleeping area is furnished with a comfortable double bed. The bright bathroom with a shower features bath towels, a hairdryer and toiletries.

Guest access
The laundry room in the basement equipped with washing machines & dryers is at your disposal free of charge. Washing powder/liquid is not provided.
neighborhood_overview: The historical building stands in the very center of the 1st district of Zurich. The Paradeplatz and the world-famous Bahnhofstrasse are both in close proximity. Within a short walking distance, guests will find a plethora of restaurants, bars and clubs and shopping opportunities. The beautiful Sihl can be easily reached on foot. You can also enjoy a walk to the city center alongside the river.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

host_about: hello i am vincenzo,i come from italy and i live in zurich with my wife Antonietta,she is a really nice person,we are both serious,trustworthy,friendly,openmind and we will be available for you for any suggest or questions.we both work in zurich,i am a cook,so i offer also meal service for my gust if required for a reasonable price,my wife is a professional cleaner,and she also take care of our house,so you will be sure to find a very clean place.we love travel infact we have traveled in many places worldwide.we also love spend time with friends or make new friends and find interesting people.for me airbnb is not only a way to make some money but is also a way to meet new people,help them to get the best from their travel and maybe make new friends.i think people are loosing confidence towards the next,but is just because we are doing a more asocial life,that way we don t trust anyone,that s why we should start to meet as much people possible in our life,we will discover that there are so many good persons in the world,the bad guy are only a small part of the world but only  by socializing we can discover that.

name: Duplex Apartment Mini
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Mini Duplex Apartments' size: 29 m² - 36 m², depending on available units

This duplex apartment is decorated in urban chalet style. Natural materials like wood and stone combined with designer furniture and understated earthy tones fill the apartment with a sense of elegance. The lower features an open living and dining area with a fully fitted kitchenette, dining corner and a snug lounge with flat screen TV. A separate bathroom with a shower, hand towels, a hairdryer and company-branded toiletries is also available. A staircase leads to the upper gallery, where an open sleeping area is situated, featuring a comfortable double bed, wardrobe, flat screen TV and working desk.
neighborhood_overview: This flagship apartment house is located in the urban area of the 3rd district of Zurich. The city center and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The direct vicinity offers some restaurants, bars, as well as shopping possibilities. The shopping center Shilcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Moreover, local recreation areas Sihl and Allmend Brunau are situated nearby.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

A cozy and trendy studio apartment with lake and Mountain views and only 9 minutes bus ride to Bürkliplatz city center. The lake is a 5 minute walk and nearest bus stop is also 5 minutes walking distance.

The apartment is on the top floor of the building with beautiful views of the lake and mountains, and is in a very quiet neighbourhood, but it's close and accessible to the city. The lake is just a 5-10 minute walk.

name: Relax and enjoy "Little big city Zürich".
description:
Share & enjoy the cozy, peaceful atmosphere of my home after you have explored the city.
Bright, sunny room (17sqm/172sqft) room in a 3-bedroom apartment. Located in a residential area, very quiet surrounding. Well connected by bus & train: Airport (35min direct train), City Centre/central station/Old town(25min), Lake Zürich 15min. walk. Free private parking on the premises.
If you come for a new job/internship & need my address to register, contact me in advance for availability&procedures!
neighborhood_overview:
Wollishofen-Kilchberg is a very green, quiet and first of all residential area. Due to its characteristics and proximity to the center it is in high demand. It offers nice views into green gardens, panoramic views over the lake and the mountains.
You will be woken up by birdsongs and not by traffic.
Some of the nicest lakeside bars and restaurants you can find along the Lake Zürich are nearby. (lf you look at the map indication of my listing click on the icons for restaurants or point of views you will find around my place to get some ideas.)
Also the famous LINDT chocolate factory and there gorgeous outlet shop is located nearby and you can often smell a slight fragrance of chocolate in the air.
To have space, peace, a safe neighborhood and a lot of green around is what I love most living here and would like to share with you.
host_about:
“It is passion that makes man live;  reason makes one only last.” 
― Nicolas Chamfort
"Durch die Leidenschaften lebt der Mensch, durch die Vernunft existiert er bloss."

This is my motto  in life and I try to live up to it as much as I can. I have traveled extensively for work and leisure and made invaluable experiences during my trips. I am passionate about wine, food, exotic herbs and plants. But nothing beats good company and great talks! My home is my castle I love and I care about. You are welcome to share and enjoy it with me.

I am an easy going, open minded person with a lot of interests.  I love reading  and I am an "old school" newspaper addict. On a Sunday morning you will most likely find me on the sofa surrounded by newspapers and magazines and well equipped with coffee and cookies to indulge in what is going on in the world. 
*******************************************************************
Note to Guests
• I enjoy meeting people and like to know who my guests are. Write a bit about yourself and your purpose of travelling. That way I not only get a better picture of you but can come up with valuable information and ideas to make your arrival and stay pleasent, convenient and memorable.
• A novel of your life story isn't necessary; just write about what you think someone meeting you for the first time would want to know.

description:
You are going to have your own private part of our appartement. The appartement is located at suburban part of Zurich. The Samsunghall, Microsoft and UPC are close by.
The tram is right in front of the house which will take you directly and quickly to downtown Zürich.
Grocery stores and a shoppingmall are accross the street.
We have a lot of green surroundings, including the river "Glatt" which is a perfect spot for a nice and relaxing walk.
You can use our Netflix Account for free.

The space
Our guest room has a 1.40x2.00m bed and is ideal for 2 people. The room is part of our 4.5-room appartement.

Guest access
You are going to have your own private part of the appartement. We share the kitchen, the living and dining room.
neighborhood_overview:
The district 12, Schwamendingen, comprises the three quarters:
- Saatlen,
- Schwamendingen-Center and
- Hirzenbach.

Typical of our city district is, compared to the rest of the city, the particularly large green areas, the extremely active club life, and the large number of co-operative appartements.
The latter were created especially in the 1950s and offer increasingly sought-after low-cost housing. Because of their age, many cooperatives are in the process of modernizing their housing stock during these years. Not only because of building replacements or renovations, but also through new developments such as the Hunziker Areal. The owners along the highway expect the upcoming motorway housing an additional increase in attractiveness for their properties. The motorway separating today the district will connect the two quarters Saatlen and Schwamendingen center after completion of the enclosure and offer the population with the Ueberlandpark an attractive
host_about: Hallo Airbnb Community, Wir sind ein junges paar ferienbegeisterter Weltenbummler und freuen uns über neue Bekanntschaften rund um den Globus. Wir empfangen gerne Gäste und geben Ihnen Tipps aus erster Hand. Genau so sind wir gerne unterwegs und erkunnden die Welt.

The apartment offers 4 bedrooms, two dinning rooms, an open kitchen and a large living room.
This newly renovated apartment is designed with premium quality materials and finish.

description:
Beautiful 4 room apartment (120 m2 / 1'300 sq ft) in historical building located in prime location close to lake Zurich (2 min walk) and Paradeplatz / Bahnhofsstrasse (5min walk). Very quite due to court yard to the back and one way street to the front. Train station Enge at a 10 min walk. This is the ideal choice for a business trip or a couples' getaway.

The space
The apartment is furnished with designer pieces. The ceilings are 3 m / 9ft high. kitchen has an induction cook top.

Guest access
The apartment is all yours...
neighborhood_overview: It is a historical area of Zurich with big representative buildings around beautiful courtyards. Around the apartment there are some bars and restaurants, within a 10 minutes walk there are many good restaurants, bars, touristic attractions, shopping and last but surely not least the unique promenade of the idyllic Zurich lake. In the summer there are many people swimming, sailing, wake boarding etc. in the lake, which is to me the USP of Zurich.
host_about:
Hi, we are a couple - my partner from Greece, working in the creative field and me Swiss-Argentinian working in the financial field. We have Airbnbed our homes since 2012; first in New York, while we were living there and since 2016 in Zurich, where we have moved now.
Looking forward to meeting you,
Gabriela

name: Charming and big flat at Zurich MainStation(135m2)
description:
Prime location at Bahnhofplatz, Zurich. Right next to the train station, at the top of the famous shopping area "Bahnhofstrasse". It can not be more central. The 4.5 room apartment is on the 6th floor. It offers space for up to 10 people on 135m2 and 50m2 terrace.

Top Location am Bahnhofplatz, Zürich. Direkt neben dem Bahnhof, an der Spitze der Bahnhofstr. Zentraler geht es nicht. Die 4.5 Zimmer-Wohnung ist auf dem 6. Stock. Sie bietet Raum für bis zu 10 Personen auf 135m2 und 50m2 Terrasse.

The space
The The terrace offers a great view over the city and the Limmat. The river and the Landesmuseum are less than 5 minutes walking distance away. The old town of Zurich "Niederdörfli" is also reached in a few minutes. On the ground floor of the property is a restaurant and a bar. In 100m walking distance you can find several bars, restaurants and a supermarket. The apartment is fully equipped and offers all the comforts for unvorgetable holyday experience.
neighborhood_overview: In der Bahnhofstrasse findet man alles, was das Herz begehrt: Mode, Kunst und Zürcher Spezialitäten. Sie verbindet auf 1.4 Kilometern den Zürichsee mit dem Hauptbahnhof. Hier findet man zahlreiche Boutiquen, Warenhäuser und Uhrenläden, aber auch den Paradeplatz – das Zentrum der Schweizer Banken. Bei Einheimischen ist die Bahnhofstrasse ebenso beliebt wie bei den Gästen und ist immer ein Besuch wert. Im Sommer lässt es sich hier gemütlich zum See flanieren, im Winter findet man an allen Ecken Glühwein und heisse Schokolade. Von der Bahnhofstrasse weg führen der Rennweg und die Augustinergasse in die pittoreske Altstadt.

name: THE FLAG Zürich - Business Apartment in Altstetten
description:
Spacious Business Room (18sqm) with 140cm bed, partly with small balcony, Shower/WC, hair dryer
fully equipped kitchenette (without hob), fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, kettle
small seating area, safe, flatscreen TV, ironing station

on request breakfast buffet (CHF 15 per person) or snacks for on the go in the restaurant

Guest access
free access to fitness room and public terrace

Other things to note
Please note that our breakfast will not be available until May 31, 2020. Thank you for your understanding
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

name: Wohnung im Kreis 4
description:
The space
Deine gemütliche Unterkunft liegt in mitten der Altstadt in einem historischen Palais im neu ausgebauten Dachgeschoss, somit kam man einen wunderbaren Blick über die Dachlandschaft von München genießen. Du hast dein eigenes Bad und eine kleine Küche, die mit allem ausgestattet ist was man so braucht um ein paar schöne Tage in München zu erleben. Außerdem ist das zimmer mit einer kommode für deine sachen, einem schreibtisch und einem gemütlichen sessel ausgestattet . Für einen unvergesslich schönen Aufenthalt stehen wir, deine Gastgeber, Mea, Timo und unser Hund Phine, dir gerne mit Ratschlägen und Tipps zur Seite. Bis bald, wir freuen uns!

description:
Luxury 100m2 apartment in the old town of Zurich. A 10 min walk or nearby tram takes you downtown (lake, mainstation).
The Masterbedroom has a huge boxspring bed. In the second Bedroom is one big bedsofa.
The Livingroom has a big leathersofa that can be changed to a bed for 2.
There is an TV, aircondition and a free travel-internet-hotspot.
The wintergarden has a big Diningtable, a fully equipped kitchen.
Bathroom with bathtub, towels and soap.
Shops, restaurants, bakery even on sundays.

The space
The apartment is fully equipped.
You have a kitchen with fridge/freezer, dishwasher and stove.
There is a washer/dryer in the building you can use.

Guest access
You have the studio apartment to yourself. If you have any questions, please contact me.

Other things to note
Smoking is not allowed in the studio apartment, however you have access to the romantic court yard.

The nearby trainstation „Stadelhofen“ provides shopping even on sundays and is perfect to go by train to the airport and all swiss holidayspots.

Familys will find a big park nearby with a playground dor the kids.

name: Home Away from Home
description:
Are you looking for warm and inviting home to live in Zurich short-term or long-term? Here is a highly functional, yet beautiful and inviting place to live only 10 minutes from city center or main train station (HB). Tram #13 right out front. River and forest only 10 minute walk. Groceries across street. Great location for anyone to stay in the heart of Zurich. Available short-term or long-term. Monthly discounted 10%. Super high speed Internet for home office working.

The space
Attention to detail to the quality and taste of the decor for beauty and comfort, including live indoor plants, antiques, a private sun deck/balcony with fresh herbs, roses, morning glories, bee hives. Room comes with plenty of storage and wardrobe in hallway to hang clothes. High speed Internet and utilities all included.

Guest access
You have full access to the kitchen if you want to prepare your own meals. Laundry room with washer and dryer is avai
neighborhood_overview: I live in a charming quarter called "Wipkingen".  Very close to city center, but very green with lots of trees and gardens.  Excellent location for a walk along the Limmat river or a jog through the nearby forest with parkour training course and wood chip-covered jogging track.  My place is close to restaurants, groceries, night life and public transportation.   You can enjoy a fully equipped gym across the river with indoor pool and sauna for a drop in fee of only ~$30/day.
host_about: A professional woman enjoying the cosmopolitan city of Zurich.  Born and raised in California.  Now married to a Suisse and loving it here in beautiful Switzerland.

name: Home away from home with great connections
description:
Bright, newly renovated, comfortable apartment a few minutes walk from Oerlikon Station with 1 stop direct subway connections to Main Station, City Centre, airport etc.

The space
The location is great, you are one subway stop from the city centre (Hauptbahnhof) and one stop from the airport! Big shops and super markets are very close, and you can easily cook here as well, as the kitchen has all you need. It's a great place for a family or group of friends. There are lots of beautiful parks at walking distance (MFO park for example).

Guest access
You have access to everything in the apartment, we have one small and one big balcony, dryer and washer for free in our bathroom and an office space in case you need to get work done.
neighborhood_overview: A few minutes walk from oerlikon station, which is serviced by many trams, buses, subways and trains to anywhere you want to go. Oerlikon Bahnhof also has shops that are Open Sunday's and until late at night, if you need groceries.
host_about: I am a sociologist, living in Switzerland with my sweet husband, who is a computer engineer. We both like to travel and airbnb our home when we are away. We are tidy, non-smokers who enjoy meaningful conversation, cooking and a good book :)

name: Stadt Zürich  4102 Kleines Studio Albisriederplatz
description:
Kleines, gemütliches Studio in der Stadt Zürich für 1 bis 2 Per. (für 2 Gäste buchen) in der Nähe des Albisriederplatzes, ganz für Dich allein! 3 min zu Fuss zum Albisriederplatz, Station für Tram 2 + 3 /Bus. Migros, Coop, Restaurants, Bars, Bäckereien. Mit Tram 3 in 15 min zum Hauptbahnhof oder City/Altstadt.Aussenparkplatz,CHF 8.-/ Tag, bitte Autonummer und Automarke mitteilen! Danke.Wenn Ihr zu zweit seid, bitte für 2 Personen buchen, besten Dank! Strenges Rauchverbot, keine Parties.

The space
Die Unterkunft ist ideal für 1 Personen. Bad und kleiner Küche mit Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Kaffeemaschine. Geschirr, Besteck, Teller und Pfannen sind vorhanden.
Weisse Handtücher und ein frisch bezogenes 160x200cm Bett sind für Dich bereit.
Bei längerem Aufenthalt wird die Wohnung regelmässig gereinigt.

Föhn, TV, Bügeleisen, Bügelbrett stehen bereit.

Apartment with kitchen and bathroom. Approximately 20 square meters. 2 min walk to
neighborhood_overview:

Mit dem Tram ( 2 oder 3) bist Du in wenigen Minuten in der City, am Hauptbahnhof (ca. 15min/3 Km) und in der Altstadt ( 15 min/ 3 Km) oder am Bellevue /See ( Tram 2 ).

Hallo,
wohne und arbeite schon seit immer in der Stadt Zürich.

name: Zurich - easy,  convenient, cosy
description: Wir wohnen in unserm Haus in einer ruhigen Umgebung und doch nur 2 Minuten von einer Bus/Tram-Haltestelle entfernt. Stadtzentrum, Hauptbahnhof (15 Min), Flughafen (30 Min.) und ETH Hönggerberg (8 Min)  sind sehr einfach zu erreichen.
host_about:
Ich bin Bernadette und wohne mit meinem Mann und drei erwachsenen Kindern in einem ruhigen aber belebten Quartiert in Zürich. Hier bewohnen wir ein Haus mit drei Wohnungen und haben Platz genug, Dich zu beherbergen. 
Als Familie sind wir viel gereist und haben immer wieder unkomplizierte Gastfreundschaft erlebt. Wir freuen uns, wenn die Welt zu uns kommt. 

Die ganze Familien kennt die Stadt Zürich gut. Wir  geben gerne Tipps im Bereich Ausgang, Kultur, Sport und Fun. Wer keine Tipps braucht ... auch ok.

Schlafzimmer 1 kriegt die Abendsonne, die Fenster neu Zweifachverglast. Die Küche und das Bad sind eher antik, aber sauber. Zum Kochen beim Herd den Knopf an der Wand nach unten drehen. Denner, Coop, Zug, Bus 5 Min zu Fuss. Praktisch alles vor der Haustür. HB mit dem Zug in 10 min, zum See mit dem Tram 30 min.

The space
Zu vermieten steht Zimmer 1-"Gästezimmer" ausgestattet mit einem IKEA weissen 2Ps-Bett, Arbeitstisch und einem Schrank und Sessel. Im Wohnzimmer kann man auf dem roten grossen Sofa für 2 Ps schlafen oder einflach chillen und TV schauen, wenn es gerade niemand benutzt.

Guest access
WLAN, Balkon mit Balkonsitz, Küche zum selber kochen ausgestattet. Bügelbrett, Bügeleisen, Finken für Gäste.

Other things to note

Hallo, 

my name is Veronika, i am living and working in Switzerland since 2007 as Kindergarden teacher.

In my free time i like to dance, travel, hike...or do some sport activities. I prefere healthy self made food and like to discover myself by travelling to foreign countries. Positive open minded people are always welcome in my life/Flat.

The Best thing about Switzerland is chocolate, cheese and hiking. I hope you will enjoy your stay in this lovely small city.

description:
The apartment is in a top district! Is just 290 meters away from the public transport & the grocery, 1.5km from Swiss National Museum.
Käferberg 1.7km It is a picturesque location, and the upper southwestern side is also the location of restaurants overlooking the city of Zürich and the Limmat valley. 2.6km to Zurich main station, and 2.7km from ETH Zurich.
Bahnhofstrasse is 2.9km from the apartment, and Paradeplatz is 3.1km. The nearest airport is Kloten Airport, 6.9km from the property.

The space
The property is ideal for friends , couples and families!

Fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and a beautiful balcony!
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is in a very residential area in quiet surroundings.
500 meters to Zurich Limmat River, Zürich's oldest river bath from 1909. It is partly a swimming pool and partly a showcase for Zürich's hottest beach bodies!

From our property you can walk along of the one most beautiful areas of Limmat River and reach Zurich city in 30 minutes!

Supermarket Migros - Coop are two minutes walk from the apartment.
