name: Lovely 1 bedroom flat (10 min from Zurich HB)
description:
Hi everyone! Welcome to my cozy and light flushed apartment! Every detail is supposed to make you feel at home! There is enough space for working from home or for a nice dinner. The kitchen is fully equipped and happy if you use it to make yummy meals! The apartment is located close to the tram stop Berninaplatz (2 min). Public transport connections are great. You reach the city centre including the main train station within 10 min. and the train station Oerlikon within 2-3 min. See you soon!

The space
Feel free to chill out, spend a cozy evening in the apartment, or if you're here for business, I'm sure you'll feel comfortable working from home. Enjoy the afternoon sun from the balcony or taking a bubbly bath. Whatever you do, feel at home!

Guest access
The whole apartment is accessible to you! Also feel free to do your laundry in the common washing area.
neighborhood_overview: You have everything close by: grocery stores, pharmacy, post office just 1-2 tram/bus stops away, they also can be reached by foot (max. 10 min.). There is a public outdoor swimming pool just 5-10 walking minutes away, it's open throughout the summer months and the adult entry fee costs 8 Fr.  You can reach the night life scene within 10-15 minutes by tram. There are also several nice cafés and restaurants in both tram directions, also all in walking distance. You'll find a small shopping centre (restaurants, grocery store, atm) and a bakery just around the corner and down the street (at the Berninaplatz tram station). Down the street you'll find an asian restaurant. There are also several parks in the area, the biggest (and probably nicest) one being at "Irchel", where the university is also located. The airport is just 15 minutes away from Berninaplatz (tram 10) or 4 minutes away from the Oerlikon train station (several trains). If you need any specific info, feel free to ask me.
host_about: Hi, I'm Rosie, a student living in Zurich.. I like travelling a lot, meaning that I rent my apartment when I'm gone and book other airbnb apartments when travelling! :-)

The space

Guest access

Herrliches Naturerholungsgebiet Katzensee. Alter, historischer Dorfkern 2 Gehminuten. Zum Katzensee 10 Gehminuten. Bademöglichkeit. Unweit von ETH Hönggerberg.
Wanderwege vor dem Haus. Migros und Coop ca 5 Gehminuten entfernt. Tolle Gegend zum Velofahren. Gute Zug/Bus-Verbindung ins Stadtzentrum.
host_about: Ich lebe sehr gerne in Zürich.  Ascona und Umgebung ist meine zweite Heimat und ist wunderbar zum Relaxen und Wandern. Gerne bin ich auch in Arosa, das auch im Sommer viel zu bieten hat. In Ascona und Arosa habe ich seit über 20 Jahren  kleine Pied-à-terres, welche ich neu versuchsweise ebenfalls vermiete.

The space
Diese charmante Wohnung haben Sie für sich allein und ist der perfekte Host um Zürich; sogar die gesamte Schweiz zu erkunden. Von dort sind es nur ein paar weitere Minuten bis ins Stadtzentrum. Vom Flughafen kommend sind es 7 Minuten Fahrzeit mit der S-Bahn und nur zwei Haltestellen bis zum Bahnhof Wipkingen. description:

Friendly and warm.
2 rooms with a bed (1.4m-2m) ideal for one person or a couple, clothes rail.

There's also a a spacious living room, and a sunny balcony which you are very welcome to use.

The space
I'm living in bright and beautiful 3 room apartement;

1 bedroom for rent (on request I can offer you an extra matress on the floor - please notice that the room might be then a bit tidy)

1 bedroom (my private one, that only sometimes is available for rent and only for very very quiet people) has a bed (1,4m-2m), commode, clothes rail.

neighborhood_overview:

- city center (bahnhofstrasse: by tram 11min, walking distance 20min, HB Zürich 9-13min, by tram or train)
- prime tower (by bus 11min), google center (walking distance 10min)
- old town (niederdorf: by tram 17min, walking distance 30min)
- lakeside (public transport 15min, walking distance 25min)
- city life, like going out for dinner, bars etc. (walking distance 5 to 10 min)

- race track for jogging/runners (sportanlage sihlhölzli: walking distance 7min)
- different food stores (1min walking distance) and smalls restaurants (international food) very close

The space

name: Fairy-Tale Apartment next to the Opera & Bellevue
description:
Cosy apartment with wooden roof elements. An oasis of tranquility in the middle of the city. Walking distance to the lake of Zurich and the Opera.
Caution: Although the site is free of traffic noise, the nearby church bells might be an annoyance. Please read details beneath (section “Other things to note”)

The space
The entire apartment is at your disposal. It’s charm is due to the self made renovation it has gone through 2016.

Most of the interiors are either handmade originals (especially the 2.60 meter long pear wood table as well as the paintings and the sculptures) or catches at second hand stores.

The Japanese made classical guitar may be used for playing music. Please handle with care.

Guest access
You may take the small tables and the small stools (one round, one rectangular, both with bamboo or yarn) in front of the house. Please, take them in again when leaving.

If needed, you may use the wash
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is not as busy as other parts of Zurich but is as near as it gets to the city and many sightseeing highlights.

Being situated in a courtyard, the house is surrounded almost entirely by taller buildings which keep you safe of any traffic noise coming from the streets. Nevertheless, daylight is never short because the west front of the house is facing an open space that separates the house from the St. Anton Church.
host_about: Teacher, olive oil producer and music lover trying to keep the work-life balance in good shape all over the year while cooking for friends, travelling to distant and near places and having interesting discussions with people.

name: Sunny & Quiet Apartment, 20min from City center
description:
We offer a very nice, sunny and modern apartment in Zurich, inside a 3 family house recently renovated. It's on a very quiet location at the golden coast of Zurich (Witikon). The bus stop that leads from and to the main station is 250m away, but if you prefer driving there is free private parking available by request also public street parking. ALDI, Denner & Migros supermarkets are 280m away in a shopping mall and if you like jogging or nature, the forest it's at the end of the street.

The space
The apartment was recently renovated, we have a modern induction kitchen and a bathroom with a Geberit toiled/bidet plus a jacuzzi type bathtub for your enjoinment. There are two balconies, one looking forward to the lake and the other at the back of the kitchen. We have king beds(180x200cm) in all rooms and one of them can be split to become two single beds according to your requirements (please ask beforehand). There is coffee, tea and a SodaStream water on the fully
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Witikon one of the most exclusive neighbourhoods in Zurich at the east side of the Lake, better known as the Golden Coast, because the sun reaches all year long. Close we have the Zurich Zoo and the Dolder Bath & Ice Skating. The woods are just at the end of the street and three supermarkets (ALDI, Migros and Denner) are on a shopping mall 280 meters away from the house.

The east side of the lake offers several distractions if you like art and culture, close is The Kunsthaus (Art Museum), The Bellerive Museum, The Tram Museum, The Corbusier House, The China Garden, the Opera House and of course many spots at the lake where you can take a swim or go for a picnic in summer.
host_about: We are Jürg and Valeria, we like to travel a around the world and know very well what are the amenities everybody seeks on vacation rental. We like to pay attention to details and try our best to keep the apartments clean and tidy for our guests. We are looking forward to be your host and give you a pleasant stay.

description:
Swiss Coolness in the heart of Zurich's old town - just 3 minutes by tram from main station. From here you can explore the city easily by foot, the lake is only 200m away. The apartment is uniquely designed from the heart and top modern equipped. 3 comfortable bedrooms with high-quality beds, 2 bathrooms with bath and shower and a spacious living and dining room overlooking "Hechtplatz" and the river "Limmat". This is for sure the ultimate place to stay and we love to host you!

The space
This mega hip apartment is located in the center of Zurich's Old Town and offers the following amenities in detail:

Living room:
Spacious and inviting living room with views of the "Hechtplatz" and the river "Limmat". Two comfortable sofas, as well as the cool stiletto armchairs, invite you to spend some quality time with the group in the apartment too. You receive more than 500 international TV channels in various languages. You will find the program selection i
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the center of Zurich's old town with many sights, restaurants and bars. The lake and the famous Bahnhofstrasse are within walking distance.
host_about:
I am Karin, 37 years old,  living together with my partner Tobias and our 2 years old daughter Katelyn in Zürich.  I have been in hospitality for many years- two years at the legendary Badrutt's Palace Hotel in St. Moritz. I remember always been passionated about being a host for other people. 
We love travelling the world, enjoying the sunny side of life. 
My slogan: "Never stop doing your best just because someone doesn't give you credit."

- prime tower (by bus 11min), google center (walking distance 10min)
- old town (niederdorf: by tram 17min, walking distance 30min)

- different food stores (1min walking distance) and smalls restaurants (international food) very close

name: Room: 1★Your downtown base for tourism + business★
description:
Your private bedroom is located in a old beautiful and cozy apartment in the center of Zurich on one of the most famous streets in Switzerland: Langstrasse. You are just minutes from central station and just a few meters from the city's nightlife in the midst of clubs, bars, restaurants, shops and also relaxing green areas. Zürich international airport can be reached in half an hour with public transport. There is often the opportunity to check in earlier or later. Just send me an inquiry.

The space
A compliment which I always hear from guests, that the accommodation is very well located. It is located just a few minutes from Zurich main train station (Zürich HB), from which you can easily reach Zurich International Airport ZRH. My accommodation is ideal for tourists who want to visit our beautiful city of Zurich as you can reach many attractions and the old town on foot very quickly. Even party people who only come to Zurich for the weekend or for a concert are
neighborhood_overview:
Langstrasse is Zurich's most colorful and varied district. You can savor international specialties and enjoy multi-cultural shopping options during the day here, while the street converts into Zurich's nightlife district at night. One bar after another, popular clubs and if you get hungry from partying a lot, there's plenty of food available from the many take-aways and 24-hour shops. Langstrasse never sleeps and has progressed from a former red-light district into one of the most popular districts in the city. This is also thanks to the many young designers and restaurant owners, who have upgraded the district over the past years. (Source: Website Zurich tourism)

The apartment is located in one of the city's most popular locations: the so called Langstrassenquartier. The Langstrasse (which means long street) is one of the most colorful addresses here in Zurich. The Swiss Army used to be stationed here in large barracks which still exists today and are only minutes from the

name: Villa Allegra Studio - Bohemian chic in Zurich
description:
Located half way above Zurich in the mansions district, Villa Allegra is an old lady build in 1907 in a typical Swiss mountain chalet style. It’s situated, not far from the city center by foot, public transport or taxi and yet set in beautiful natural green surroundings with open views. The studio with about 30 sqm of space is available to you with a kitchenette, that can host up to 2 adults. The house is divided in 3 units and 2 are offered in AirBnB.

The space
This villa has its own charm and definitely is one of a kind. Living in almost the heart of the city but still be in a chalet-like home is pure luxury.

The studio apartment with small cooking facility and a big bathroom is on the garden level. It has its own patio outside with a table to enjoy your meals. It fits two persons on 30 sqm

Guest access
The garden area in front of the house and the pergola are private and not shared with guests of the Airbnb.

Othe
neighborhood_overview: My personal tips and guide is set up for you to see in my profile. Many known places for sure some secrets coming from me as a local Zurich habitant. But nevertheless this location is very close to the lake and Bellevue, as it is a jump away from the university campus and ETH. Zurich is a little big city, but for main sightseeing you are quite fast everywhere in town. My favorite around the corner the Bohemia Restaurant at the Kreuzplatz!
host_about:
We are are a young family of four, two school-girls, my husband, me and recently added two bunnies named Frida & Armstrong .

We love to travel ourselves and enjoy being adventures and learning about new things, cultures and habits while we are abroad. Biggest love is Paris and New York, Tel Aviv has been a regular and can't be missed at least once a year, the food is devine! Actually the bohemian-chic and boutique hotels are the places you would find us most. We appreciate the special gems around the globe.

Since spring 2019 we are the happy new owners of this beautiful villa. 
At our home we are happy to share any inside tips with our guests, but of course are respecting the privacy of your stay. For that reason we are also expecting the privat area of ours to be respected.

For my part I love to decorate and style places that tell a story, that make you dream or lets your imagination travel anywhere in the past or future. Unfortunately I have not had the time yet to do so in the Airbnb apartments, but will soon put my creativity into it to make the spaces even more cozy. 

Since we are working in the movie business my big passion is film, has been always and still fascinates me every day. New ventures coming ahead that will evolve in the new rooms we are just now getting to know. Cooking and hosting is another big love of mine, but the biggest is my family, for me I enjoy having quality time with them. Lucky us, the family even expends to a great group of dear friends, so our life is blessed with lot's of good energy and fine people.

I am so curious about life and who we are in ourselves, I love the journey day by day!

name: Downtown Exclusive 2-BR Apartment with Terrace
description:
Just less than 1 km from Bahnhofstrasse and a 12-minute walk from Paradeplatz and featuring free WiFi, this newly refurbished 2BR apartment is centrally located and well connected by public transport.

Charming & safe neighbourhood, with restaurants, bars, swiss bakery, shops and supermarkets all closeby. The apartment has an unblocked view to the park and enjoys full privacy.

A spacious 40 sq. m outdoor terrace (very rare in the city centre) with dining table for 8 & two sun beds awaits you.

The space
The apartment is ideal for up to 5 persons - a double bed plus a sofa bed in the master bedroom and 2 single beds in the second bedroom.

The apartment is modern and comfortable for a family, a couple, group of friends, or business traveller.

Kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, oven, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee maker, electric kettle, microwave, toaster, cooking utensils and a full set of cutlery and plates.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is just round the corner from Stauffacher, and close to Zurich’s vibrant central district. Surrounded by restaurants, shops and services, this neighbourhood is safe and has plenty to offer.

With many popular restaurants just right next door (Samurai II Japanese, Mythos Greek, Molino Italian, Le Cedre Lebanese, St. Jakob Bakery & Café etc.) and a mini supermarket just one minute walk away, you are well served in the area.

For those who like to keep active, NON STOP GYM is right across the road and Hallenbad City Indoor Swimming Pool is within five minutes of the apartment, while nearby Kasernenareal Park is perfect for a lunchtime stroll.

And if you’re keen to soak up some culture, the Kantonspolizei Zürich Kriminalmuseum and Haus Konstruktiv modern art museum are all a short walk away.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Cher.
 
 I enjoy traveling around the world, exploring new destinations, staying at luxury properties and  learning about other cultures. 

My philosophy is "Be a traveler, not a tourist!"
 
You are most welcome to come and stay in my unique apartments in Zurich, which have been prepared with you, the traveller in mind! The apartment will be your home away from home. 
 
 I consider each one of you as my guests and not customers. I will be very happy to give you recommendations during your stay, and I have prepared a bespoke Manual which upon check-in will give you useful information about the location, public transport and recommendations to restaurants and cafes in the neighbourhood, with clear directions how to get there from the apartment.

name: Zimmer im schönen Kreis 4
description:
Das Zimmer ist Teil einer 3-Zimmerwohnung. Die Wohnung wird mit meiner super Mitbewohnerin geteilt, unkompliziert,ordentlich, und immer Hilfsbereit.
Das Zimmer verfügt über ein Bett, Eine Garderobe/Schrank der benützt werden kann.
Küche/Wohnzimmer, Bad sowie die Waschküche kann mit genutzt werden.
Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr Central und trotzdem sehr ruhig gelegen.
Da ich immer mal wer unterwegs bin, vermiete ich mein Zimmer in dieser Zeit.

Other things to note
Its a smokers apartment, but the room you rent is nonsmoking.
host_about:
Ein paar worte über mich :
Ich selbest würde ich mich als Freigesit bezeichnen. ich liebe es Neues zu erfahren und zu entdecken. Das Reisen, die Natur ,die Musik , Yoga und Ayurveda sind meine Leidenschaften und zugleich meine Anker.
Seit 2 Jahren studiere ich Ayurvedischemedizin in der Schweiz und nebenbei arbeite ich als Krankenschwester.

"Zahme Vögle singen von Freiheit, Wilde fliegen!"

name: 1,5 Zimmer Wohnung in Zh, hell, grün und zentral
description:
Biete schön renovierte 1,5 Zimmerwohnung (35 qm), direkt am Wald und mit Velo/ öffentliche Verkehrsmittel nur 25 min von der Innenstadt und 15 min zu den hippen Stadtteilen Kreis 4 und 5 entfernt. Sie verfügt über einen grosse Terasse und einen eigenen Tiefgaragenparkplatz. Neben der Wohnung befindet sich eine Waschküche zum Wäschewaschen.

The space
Ihr wohnt in einer privaten Wohnung, nämlich in meiner :-). 35 liebevoll eingerichtete qm empfangen euch mitten im Grünen. Wanderweg zum Ütliberg startet fast vor der Tür. Zum Letzistadium ( Konzerte) sind es 10 min mit dem Velo, ca 15 min mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln.

Guest access
Ihr habt meine Wohnung für euch allein. Im Haus ist auch eine Sauna, die über einen Geldautomat beheizt wird. Mit 5 CHF könnt ihr je nach Temperatur zwischen 1-1,5 h die Sauna nutzen. Im Badezimmer im Regal findet ihr Handtücher. Eine Waschküche mit Waschmaschine befindet sich auch im Haus.
Küche: Zum K
neighborhood_overview:
In der Nähe meiner Wohnung ist der Lindenplatz mit vielen Geschäften, Cafes und Restaurants.
Der Wald mit vielen Wanderwegen wie z. B. zum Ütliberg, ist in 2 min zu Fuss erreichbar. Ich wohne direkt an der Sportanlage Buchlern mit Fussballplätzen, Tennisplätzen und vielem mehr. Die Schwimmhalle Altstetten ist ca. 10 min zu Fuss erreichbar. Dort gibt es auch eine Sauna und einen Wellnessbereich. Das Letzi Stadium, wo oft Konzerte stattfinden ist in 10 min mit Velo und ca. 15 min mit dem öffentlichen Verkehr erreichbar. Auch die Werdinsel (Baden in der Limmat) ist ca. 10 min (Velo) / 15 min (öffentlicher Verkehr) erreichbar.
host_about:
Namaste :-). My name is Dani. Currently I live in Zürich, Switzerland, part time in Barcelona. But I was born in the east part of Germany, near Berlin. I m fluent in german and english. At the moment I m learning spanish. 

I m a lifetime student, buddhist, globetrotter, nurse and a health coach. Funny, thoughtful, non-smoker, vegetarian. 

Lover of/ interested in: nature, trekking, swimming (esp open water & long distance) , mountains, meditation, Wim Hof method, urban gardening, tiny house projects, buddhism, cinema, traveling, discover other cultures, photography, sharing economy, effective altruism, phytotherapy, poetry slam...and a lot more. 

Let's share experiences and learn from each other :-).

name: Le Bijou Bahnhofstrasse / Paradeplatz LB18A
description:
Located in the heart of Zurich at the famous Bahnhofstrasse next to the Fraumünster Church and Paradeplatz, Le Bijou presents a Swiss masterpiece in hospitality: Le Bijou Bahnhofstrasse / Paradeplatz Apartment. This is a self check in type of property. There is no reception and no staff on site. You check in by yourself with your personal door code which will be sent to you by James. The apartment is in a residential building so you can immerse yourself into the local Zurich city living.

Other things to note
There is a Sauna inside the apartment which the guests can use.
neighborhood_overview: Switzerland’s biggest city is more than an impressive financial centre. Start the day by walking through the Niederdorf to explore the small streets, lined with shops and historic buildings. Indulge in retail therapy on Zurich’s most famous shopping street, Bahnhofstrasse which is right on your door step.

description:

description:
Space, comfort, perfect location - in those few words you can describe this apartment.

In the immediate vicinity, there are all the best attractions and restaurants of Zurich!

Langstrasse, Limmat, Old Town - all you need and more is located 10 min walk or bus from the apartment.


Whether you are here for business or pleasure - this apartment will guarantee you rest and convenience during your stay.

The space
The flat is very modern, clean and spacious.

The lounge room contains a large sofa bed (sleeps 2), and a big TV (55 inches) with Netflix and the Wii. It is connected to the kitchen and entrance.

Kitchen contains a large fridge, dishwasher, cooktop, and all the crockery and cutlery required for a pleasant stay.

The bedroom contains a double bed, chest of drawers and clothes rack - there is also a reading lamp near the bed.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor, accessible wit
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is the most lively place in the city - probably even in the country (Langstrasse around the corner is well-known as the most lively street in Switzerland). Yet, the flar is located in a very quiet corner and two parks can be found around. A lot of excellent restaurants and places to go out can be found around the flat - including an excellent cocktail bar around the corner.
host_about:
"Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive." 
E. Hubbard

"The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page."
St Augustin

Welcome on our profile!

We are a Ukrainian-French couple or as we prefer to call ourselves: a European couple. We have been living in 8 countries (62.5% of them together) and we combine the ability to speak 5.5 languages. 

We love travelling (very much), discovering places and discovering cultures. We are optimistic and curious people caring a lot about our friends and families.

Olena loves to eat (she is addicted to chocolate - and Switzerland is a risky place to be) and Thibaut has to pretend he knows how to cook because of his origins. =)

Among the things we love (combined): Great books, board games, classic slow rock, interesting people (95% of people according to our research), psychology, consumer behaviour, startups, management of innovation, brand's history of corporations, Mario Kart, Zelda, Crêpes (do not call them pancakes - EVER),... and thousands of other things.  

We look very much forward to meeting you!

Olena & Thibaut

name: 25m2 quiet Studio in Zürich (K11)
description:
This modern studio is located in the city of Zurich in front of the forest and can be also used as home office during your COVID-19.

If you are looking for a quiet area which is near the airport, close to the ETH and the city centre, this place is perfect for you.

The forest near by is good for nature loving vistors. It can be reached in 5 min and a 20 min walk will grant a breathaking view over the whole city.

The space
The little studio is splitted in 2 parts, a living and a sleeping area. There is a big dining table with comportable seats which can be used as working area as well.

There is also a bathroom with shower and a small cooking area in case you would like to cook for yourself.

The WiFi is free to use with a very strong signal and available in the whole house such as the garden area in front of the house.

Guest access
The private terrace can be used for barbecuing and is not used by ot
neighborhood_overview:
The area is a clam, safe and quiet living area close to the forest on a hill with no traffic and no loud bars or restaurants which will desturb you during the night, but perfectly situated in case you want to visit the city centre.
However there are also shopping possibilities, such as Denner, Spar Discounter or Vegetable shops,
Restaurant Mumpfli and famous
Kebab Restaurant Ayverdi as well as
backery and coffe-shop in the walk
distance of 3 min. to reach - on Wehntalerstrasse, down the hill from
my location.
And with bus 62/61 or 10 min walk you are in the big center of Oerlikon with
many different other bars, restaurants and shopping center.

name: Beautiful, spacious art nuveau flat in the center
description: Beautiful, very spacious 4.5 room apartment in the center of Zurich right above the university area. The apartment has a king size bed, two bathrooms, a large living- and separate dining-room and a big kitchen with a 20sqm terrace. Grocery stores and many restaurants are in walking distance (Coop 50m, Migros/Pharmacy 450m). Public transport stops right in front of the house (station Winkelriedstrasse) and takes you everywhere (Bellevue, the lake and Zurich HB in 8', nonstop to airport in 30').
neighborhood_overview: The other parties in the house are only offices.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Zurich and have been living in this apartment since over 8 years. After it got fully renovated in spring 2019 , I decided to Airbnb it. I'd like to give curious travellers from all over the world the opportunity to explore beautiful Zurich and feel home the same way I do here.

I'm a partner in a creative agency, organising live experiences and events. Therefore I travel  frequently and love to discover new cities, trends and cultures around the world. I'm very clean and respectful of other people's apartments, the same way I want others to treat my home as well. 

I've been in Zurich all my life and very happy to help my guests with any tips and recommendations!

name: Studio Apartment Senior
description:
IMPORTANT: Until the end of 2020 there are renovation works in the property that can cause some noise during the weekdays.

These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Studio Apartment Senior size: 28m² - 34m².

This snug studio in Italian design offers everything that an apartament needs: a living area with a parquet flooring and flat screen TV, a fully fitted kitchenette with a microwave, coffee maker, glass ceramic stove and a complete set of kitchenware, as well as a sleeping area with a comfortable double bed. The elegant marble bathroom provides hand and bathing towels, as well as a hair dryer. Curtains and the intercom system ensure sufficient privacy.

Guest access
The laundry room in the bas
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a charming, historical building with a lift, situated in a quiet residential street in the heart of the hip 5th district. The location constitutes an ideal base to discover the urban city life of Zurich. A myriad of restaurants, bars and clubs can be found just around the corner. The hipshopping street “Viadukt” with many small shops and cafes as well as the beautiful green area “Josefwiese” and the Limmat river are just steps away from the property. The tram stop Quellenstrasse and the Hardbrücke railway station are also easily accessible on foot.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

Handtücher und Bettwäsche sind inklusive. Waschmaschine und Trockner stehen allen Gästen zur Verfügung. Die Vermieterin setzt auf nachhaltiges Wohnen, z. B. durch Ökostrom, umweltfreundliche Pflegeprodukte, Cradle-to-Cradle-Produkte oder Second-Life-Designartikel.

Wöchentliche Reinigung bei Bedarf gegen einen Aufpreis von 110.- möglich
neighborhood_overview: Die 2 Zimmer Wohnung liegt im angesagten Kreis 4 in Zürich.

name: Ruhige Wohnung, 20 Min Zürich HB, 10 Min Airport
description:
Ruhige, moderne Wohnung (Lift im Treppenhaus), gut ausgestattet, ca. 20 Min zum Zürich HB, ca. 10 Min zum Zürich Airport. Sehr gut an ÖVs angebunden (Bushaltestellen ein paar Fussschritte entfernt). WICHTIG: Es steht kein Parkplatz zur Verfügung. Anreise mit einem Auto ist daher suboptimal. Parkmöglichkeiten in der Umgebung sind beschränkt (blaue Zone).

The space
Die Wohnung liegt ideal: Flughafen. Mit dem ÖV Bus/Tram ist man in ca. 20 Minuten direkt am Hauptbahnhof.

Guest access
Wohn-/Esszimmer, Küche, WC/Dusche, Balkon, Schlafbereich

Other things to note
Es steht kein Parkplatz zur Verfügung!
neighborhood_overview: Ruhige, sichere und sehr gut erschlossene Gegend (ÖV).  Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in der Nähe. Im Wohnkomplex hat es einen kleinen Lebensmittelladen sowie eine Pizzeria. Denner Express (Einkaufsgeschäft)  ca. 350 Meter entfernt (5 Min zu Fuss). Wer Natur mag: nach ca. 10 Min zu Fuss kommt man zu einem kleinen Wald.
host_about:
Man muss eine Aufgabe vor sich sehen und nicht ein geruhsames Leben.
Leo Nikolajewitsch Graf Tolstoi

name: :) Cozy room near Zurich HB and Airport
description: One room is available in the heart of Zurich. The apartment is 5minutes walking from stop Radiostudio (Tram 11/Bus32) and 10 minutes from Bucheggplatz (Tram11/15 Bus32/69/72). The apartment has 3 bedrooms, kitchen and a living room. We live with my brother (Medicine Student) and my girlfriend (same room)!. There is a kitchen fully equipped, one bathroom, a corridor and a balcony. If you want to explore and see the city, this will be the perfect location for you ! Looking forward to host you :)
host_about:
My name is Francesco. 
MBA grad from California working in New York City and born in Switzerland.
It is a very exciting city to be in as it has a lot to offer. I like to travel, food and sports. My hobby are cars and watches. 

I am a very welcoming host, I like to meet my guests and make sure they are confortable and most importantly I do like to make my guests feel they are at home. 

As a host on Airbnb and traveller I have learned the beauty of hosting people from different parts of the world and provide them with excellent services and very comfortable stay. 

My promise to my guests is: YOU will always have a friend and a good assistant in me if you ever need while you are in New York and after you leave . 

I would like to tell my guest you are welcome to your home away from home. 

Hosting is what I do best, I offer comfort and relaxation, to all our guests and I like to say I have met so many wonderful people during my years of hosting and I am always looking forward to meet more wonderful people and get the pleasure of hosting them. 

My new friendships are one of the biggest reasons why I love to host!

Cheers,
Francesco

name: 2 Bedroom Apartment Junior
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
This spacious 2 bedroom apartment with classic marble flooring stands out thanks to its plain color tones and exclusive designer pieces. Playful accessories and selected materials exude South African flair and create a modern yet homely living experience.The fully fitted kitchen with a microwave/extractor unit has all the necessary equipment, from crockery to pans and cutlery to a modern coffee maker. Both separated bedrooms feature a snug double bed, as well as direct access to the bathroom with a bathtub or shower. The necessary space to relax is offered also by the open and bright living and dining area with flat screen TV and a cozy lounge.

Guest access
The laundry room
neighborhood_overview: This building can be found in the heart of Zurich, in the centre of District 4"s urban bustle. Europaallee and its many shops, restaurants, and offices are just a few steps away, and the city"s main train station including the Shopville centre can be reached in just three minutes on foot. One of the building"s highlights is its open view of the Kasernenareal and the Uetliberg, Zurich"s very own hill. Its close proximity to the city"s well-known shopping promenade (Bahnhofstrasse) and the vibrant neighbourhood Langstrassenquartier are further aspects that make this a top location.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Mini Studio Apartments' size: 18 m²

This modern studio offers everything one may expect from a place to live. The apartment contains a double bed, a wardrobe, a dining table, as well as a flat screen TV. The kitchenette is fully fitted with a cooking stove, microwave with baking and grill function, coffee maker, cutlery and crockery. The bathroom with a shower offers hand towels, a hair dryer and company-branded toiletries.

Guest access
The laundry room in the basement equipped with washing machines & dryers is at your disposal free of charge. Washing powder/liquid is not provided.
For long term stays it is possible to have access to a letterbox.
neighborhood_overview: The apartments are located in the lively 4th district which constitutes a great starting point to explore Zurich’s urban charme. Right round the corner there awaits a plethora of various restaurants, cafés, shops and local pubs  all within a walking distance. The legendary Langstrasse, with numerous bars and clubs, is only a few steps away. In the vicinity, there are also some green areas and a small park. Moreover, the location is perfectly connected to the public transport. The tram stop Bezirksgebäude is situated right on its doorstep. A direct connection to the Airport Zurich Kloten is available from the Wiedikon station, situated just a 2-minute walk away. Additionally, the main railway station is approx. 10 minutes away.

The street itself is calm, guaranteeing a good sleep.

name: Central bright, big room close to the city & lake.
description:
Spacious, feminine, veggie friendly and bright room in the Zurich city, close to the lake. Parking available.
Workspace in your room available if you're travelling for work.

The space
To all the girls out there :) I live by myself and I am happy to welcome you to my home!
* You will have a big room available for you with a bed and wardrobe for your use.
* If you need a parking space I am able to provide this.
* You are free to use TV, Netflix and Wi-Fi
* Fridge space and coffee is available for you
* You are allowed to cook in the kitchen (I accept all guests but am more than happy when some veggie comes to stay :)

Guest access
Kitchen, bathroom and living room can be used anytime. You get a spare key to the flat and the building and your room has a key as well.

Other things to note
This apartment is for females only :)
neighborhood_overview:
My apartment is located in the city zone of Zurich, few minutes walk to the lake and either bus or tram to take you straight to the main shopping street. Even though those are not far, my apartment is surrounded by green fields and a quiet street.

Just a few minutes away there is small Migros grocery's and bigger Aldi and Coop. Pharmacy and more stores are close by.
host_about: UX Designer living in Zurich City since 2009. I love getting to know different people, I speak 3 languages.

name: Newly renovated apartment in the center of Zurich
description:
This 60m2 apartment has three rooms, a living, a bed and one bathroom. You find all what you need to spend several days in Zurich. This place can host up to 4 persons, where you have one bedroom for 2 and 2 on a sofa-bed.

Additional mattrass are available for CHF50 a night.

You walk 5 min from the train station to the apartment; reach restaurants & bars and the lake in a couple of min.

Local law obligates us to ask our guests to show their passports or sending us a photo of it electronically.

The space
Our place is ideally suited for a couple or a couple with children, who would like to explore Zurich. You find all you need in our apartment for cooking or just relax and sleep after a visit in the Zurich Opera.

Other things to note
we are often asked if we can offer a luggage service. We are able to provide this service for a fee. Please ask.
neighborhood_overview: A Starbucks is right around the corner, there are many local restaurants of all colours - high end to just a burger king. The famous Bahnhofstrassse with all Luxury shops and banks is in 10min walking distance
host_about: I work for bluesky information GmbH, for which I do host other airbnb guests. Beside this I work for a few It projects and consult people that would like to start their new business.

name: Montmartre Zurich - Room "Joséphine"
description:
spacy ‘joséphine’ allows the night to enter through a starshaped skylight.

take the 27 steps to the 1st floor and discover this room looking out on the (trafic-free) ‘weggengasse’ where a space of 35 m2 awaits you with an oak ‘grand lit’ (180 x 200cm), a settee and a comfortable armchair, set under a starshaped skylight. charming small bathroom with a shower, but where two will not be able to brush their teeth… together :-) !. separate toilet.

The space
spend the night in the heart of zurich’s historic centre as if you were in a french movie. The rooms ‘joséphine’ and ‘maurice’ ensure an unforgettable and unique overnight experience in a charming old town house. with their new oak floors, each room has been furnished and decorated in a stylish, individual and unique way.

their different ground plans and multiple benefits harmonize perfectly with the charm of this ancient building and its exterior frame.

faites-vous plaisir, faites

name: Züri Tip
description: Gemütliches Zimmer in bester Lage Zürichs zu vermieten. Es ist ruhig, sauber, die Matratze ist bequem. Mehrere Kissen zur Auswahl. Feine Decken (es wird euch nicht kalt nachts).Das Zimmer kann nachts verschlossen werden, oder während ihr abwesend seid. Das Ledersofa ist edel und ist ebenfalls zum schlafen gut. Ich liebe Sauberkeit bin ordentlich,  humorvoll und „easy going“ - 38 Jahre, vom Beruf Übersetzerin. Gebe euch gerne Zürich-Tipps. Ihr seid bei mir herzlich willkommen!

name: Grand Apartment
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS.

If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Grand Apartment's size: 108 m²

This bright and open penthouse apartment in the loft style impresses with its elegant marble flooring and high quality furnishings. Designer furniture combined with muted earth tones and the dominant white hues create a truly modern ambience. The spacious living room features chic furniture, flat screen TV and a hi-fi system. The adjacent open kitchen caters for all the daily needs, offering a glass ceramic stove, microwave with baking and grill function, coffee maker, as well as crockery and cutlery. A separate storage room provides an additional space for personal belongings. Guests can enjoy their meals in the open dining area. The highlight
neighborhood_overview: The building is located in the central, yet quieter part of the 2nd district. The direct vicinity boasts numerous restaurants, shopping possibilities, bars, a cinema and other attractions. The shopping center Sihlcity lies within a few minutes’ walking distance. A plethora of local recreation areas and walking paths extends behind it.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

name: Hotel Glockenhof Zürich
description:
Herzlich willkommen im Hotel Glockenhof in Zürich. Unser Viersterne-Haus befindet sich in bester Lage im Herzen der Stadt Zürich. Es verfügt über hoteleigene Parkplätze und ist nur drei Gehminuten von der berühmten Bahnhofstrasse entfernt. Ob Sie als Business-Reisender oder Urlauber bei uns weilen – wir sorgen mit persönlichem Service und Engagement dafür, dass Sie sich bei uns sofort wohl fühlen.

The space
Unsere Philosophie…
Der Gast und seine Zufriedenheit stehen bei uns im Mittelpunkt. Wir wollen Genuss und Wohlgefühl bieten. Denn nur ein zufriedener Gast ist auch ein zukünftig wiederkehrender Gast.

Das zeichnet uns aus…
Die Vielfalt und die Differenziertheit unseres Angebotes und unser „Alles-unter-einem-Dach-Konzept“ haben uns zu dem gemacht, was wir heute sind: Eines der führenden Stadthotels Zürichs – ein modernes Viersterne-Haus mit Tradition und Zukunftsperspektiven.

Das bedeutet für Sie als Gast…
Zufriedenheit. Wohl
neighborhood_overview: Das Hotel liegt Mitten im Zentrum nur ein paar Gehminuten von der berühmten Bahnhofstrasse entfernt, welche keine Shoppingwünsche offen lässt. Ebenso sind zahlreiche Restaurants zu Fuss innerhalb weniger Minuten erreichbar.

name: Central Apartment in the heart of Zurich
description:
This cozy studio apartment is located in the center of Zurich: 15 minutes by train from Zurich airport and 5 minutes by train from the main station and city center.
Clean and fully equipped studio apartment with a rooftop terrace. Elevator available. The place can host up to 2 people.

The studio apartment is located in a lively neighbourhood, called Wiedikon, with many restaurants, bars and cafes in walking distance.

Great place for business travellers as well as tourists.

The space
The interior is modern and stylish as well as comfortable. The apartment features a queen-size bed, a flat TV with Netflix access for guests, a bathroom with a shower, and a fully equipped kitchen, including a Nespresso coffee machine and complimentary coffee pads to start your day right.

Guest access
Guest have access to every room.

name: Large Fully Equipped Room - Zurich
description:
Large (16.5 sqm) and well-equipped room, designed for business travellers, located in the city of Zurich.
Much care and attention has gone into design of the room to provide guests with a number of key facilities to allow for a comfortable stay. In addition, the location of accommodation provides excellent travel links to reach a number of key destinations.
Given how well equipped the room is, it also provides an excellent platform for a tourist who wants to visit the city at the weekend.

The space
Room Specification
- Literature provided (not to be removed from the property); Monocle guide to Zurich, Latest edition of Monocle magazine, city map, key contact numbers
- 3 Seater green chesterfield sofa
- Cork notice board
- Desk organiser complete with basic office stationery (Pens, post it note and ruler)
- Desk lamp
- 39 inch/ 100 cm Panasonic HDTV
- HDMI cable to link your own media device to the HDTV
- Goog
neighborhood_overview:
- 3 minutes walk to the number 3 tram stop, which stops at; Zurich Main Station and a number of other great eating and drinking destinations in the city (Langstrasee, Wiedikon, Lochergut, Hardbrucke, Letzigrund)
- Number 80 bus which will connect you to Trimelispital, Altstetten Station and Oerlikon
- Number 67 bus which will connect you to Wiedikon (popular night life area)
- Located next to 3 major supermarkets
- Very close to nature and Albisrieden forest and Uetliberg walking trails
- Letzigrund is a short ride on public transport or 15 minute walk
- Close to a number of large businesses (UBS, Siemens, Electrolux, IBM)
- if you are visiting by car and need to arrange parking there are a number of blue zone spots on Altstetterstrasse, close by.
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.
Please let us know how we may help you with your next trip.

name: Modern Bedroom close to City Centre & Airport
description:
The newly built apartment is situated in an urban area and is 15-minutes from the Zurich city centre by train and 10-minutes from the airport. That being said, the apartment is still very quiet, so you will be able to enjoy the tranquillity of having your own room & toilet, with direct access to the balcony.

If you tell us a bit about yourself, we are happy to give you some tips and make your stay as comfortable as possible. We are looking forward to meeting you soon!

Kim & Timo

The space
You have your own bedroom (which you can lock) with an adjustable working desk and own bathroom (toilet & sink). You also have access to the common spaces (living room and shower).

If you would like to warm up some food, you can use our microwave and you can also use our fridge to keep anything that needs to be cooled. Additionally, you are welcome to enjoy a fresh cup of espresso (at a little charge) or some tea.

We share the living s
neighborhood_overview: Large supermarkets are located within a 10-minute walk or a 3-minute bus ride (1 stop). Alternatively, there are many different restaurants in the area. The Hallenstadion is a short bus/tram ride away in case you're in town for a concert or event.
host_about:
I am an open-minded person that loves to travel, explore, sports, adventures, the outdoors and most importantly: food.

I live together with Kim, my girlfriend, who's half Swiss half Singaporean and who's travelled the world her entire life. Together we constantly look to explore remote areas off the beaten track and love meeting new people from all over the world.

We look forward to meeting you soon, either at your place or at ours.

The bathroom is not private, it is shared.
This is 1 private room in the apartment.
Please send enquiry message for long term rental to get better price.

The space
Fully equipped kitchen where you can cook whatever you like. In the city center with all city attractions around the corner, so the location could not be better.
neighborhood_overview: This is Zurich city center. Famous restaurants, bars, shopping mall and clubs all around the corner within easy walking distance. This is one of the most hip districts of Zurich.
host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

Bei längerem Aufenthalt wird die Wohnung regelmässig gereinigt.
.

name: Senioren-Residenz Segeten Zürich Witikon
description:
Die Tertianum Senioren-Residenz Segeten heisst Sie an exklusiver Lage im schönen Zürich Witikon willkommen.
Verweilen Sie sich in unserem Garten, in der grosszügigen Lounge oder in unserer Bibliothek. Dank der Bushaltestelle direkt vor dem Haus gelangen Sie im Nu ins Stadtzentrum von Zürich.

Zur Ausstattung der geräumigen Wohnungen gehören eine volleingerichtete Küche und einem Gartensitzplatz. Das Frühstück steht Ihnen jeden Tag bereit.

The space
Unser Bistro hat täglich geöffnet von 08:00 - 19:30 Uhr. Geniessen Sie eines unserer feinen Tagesmenus oder wählen Sie Ihren Favoriten aus dem à-la-carte-Angebot. Bei all unseren Speisen legen wir in der Zubereitung grossen Wert auf saisonale und marktfrische Produkte.

name: Bright room with private bathroom in Oerlikon
description:
Lovely guest room in our beautiful, spacious flat in Oerlikon, Zurich. You get your own bathroom with shower to use. Perfect for solo travellers or business travellers looking for a clean and friendly place to stay.

Quiet area, yet very close to Zurich: in 20min you are at the Lake & in the old town of Zurich, at Bahnhofstrasse for shopping or at Langstrasse for the vibrating night life with bars.

Free parking space right outside our house.

The space
The guest room comes with a comfortable 1,20m-Bed with a VERY SOFT mattress and enough storage space for your belongings. Private guest bathroom with a shower and toilet.

If there are 2 of you, we can put up a big air mattress (1,20m) for the second person in the same room at CHF 20.- per night.

Guest access
Guests enjoy their own room and their own bathroom with a shower. You have access to the shared Kitchen, living room and balcony. In the kitchen you have a
neighborhood_overview:
There is a super market (Migros) within 10min walking distance and a corner shop less than 5minutes away.

You can buy fresh milk from the organic farm 15mins from our house. They also have a shop where they sell their fresh and organic products. There are fields and forest to retreat to after a day's work or school.

Enjoy the sunset in the summer from the balcony or go for a run in the nearby woods (5min).

Oerlikon has lots of great restaurants, shops, a huge second-hand shop and public swimming pool.

In 20min you reach the center of Zurich, the lake and the old town.
host_about: Hi, I am Nicole! I have worked in hospitality for over three years and now I am so excited to be able to host people in our own little AirBnB hotel! I moved in with my boyfriend Livio a little while ago. We have a spare room and bathroom that we love to share with travellers from all ages and places. We love good coffee, long walks around our house and good meals in Zurich. On the weekends, we often go hiking or camping around Switzerland. I love to read, so you will also find a selection of books available. We are very happy to share our beautiful country with you!

name: Aparthotel Familie Hugenschmidt
description:
Das APARTHOTEL Familie Hugenschmidt ist sowohl von Modernität und Innovation als auch vom Charakter traditionell schweizerischer Gastfreundschaft geprägt. Als Familienbetrieb halten wir den Gedanken von persönlichem Service, direktem Kontakt und familiärer Nähe hoch und möchten uns dadurch abheben vom Mainstream der heutigen «Click-and-bed» - Hotelindustrie. Das gemütliche Gefühl «Zuhause» zu sein, ist eines unserer höchsten Ziele, welches wir in unserem Familienbetrieb kontinuierlich anstreben.

The space
Das familiengeführte Aparthotel Familie Hugenschmidt liegt im charmanten Viertel Seefeld von Zürich, nur 3 Gehminuten von den grünen Ufern des Zürichsees und eine 5-minütige Fahrt mit der Straßenbahn vom Zentrum entfernt. WLAN nutzen Sie in allen Bereichen kostenfrei. Service mit frischen Handtüchern 2 x pro Woche

Guest access
Wir bieten Ihnen eine 75m2 grosse Wohnung wo Sie sich wie Zuhause fühlen werden! Sie haben Ihre volle Privatsphäre
neighborhood_overview: Mitten im trend Quartier Seefeld! Kulturelle Höhepunkte: Stadtzentrum, Kirchen, Kunsthaus Zürich und Schweizerisches Nationalmuseum, während die Bahnhofstrasse und das Glattzentrum zum Bummeln und Shoppen einladen. Stadion Letzigrund – hier erwarten Sie spannende Veranstaltungen. Für unsere kleinen Gäste ist der Zoo Zürich Ideal.  Um die Ecke erwarten Sie 2 Café-Bäckereien, die täglich geöffnet sind. Nur wenige Gehminuten von der Unterkunft entfernt laden Restaurants zu einem Besuch ein.

name: Cosy Studio with a separate entrance and bathroom
description:
My name is Enrique and I study law at Fribourg University so I decided to lease my studio in Zurich.

The studio is very quiet and has its own entrance and its own small bathroom (no kitchen). It is therefore very suitable for women traveling alone.
My family lives in the apartment next to it. We are open and sociable, but also respect your privacy.

The space
Mein Name ist Enrique und ich studiere Rechtswissenschaft in Fribourg. Das ist der Grund, weshalb ich mein Studio in Zürich vermiete.
Das Studio ist sehr ruhig gelegen und verfügt über einen eigenen Eingang und ein eigenes kleines Bad (ohne Küche). Es ist deshalb sehr gut geeignet für Frauen, die alleine Reisen.
In der Wohnung daneben wohnt meine Familie. Wir sind offen und kontaktfreudig, respektieren aber auch deine Privatsphäre.

name: Platte200 im Univiertel
description:
In einem Hotel im Herzen von Zürich, mit einer hervorragenden Lage, nur paar Gehminuten von der Universität Zürich oder dem Uni Spital entfernt, gibt es ein kleines, sehr einfaches Einzelzimmer im Obergeschoss, welches für kleines Budget vermietet wird. Das Zimmer ist klein, hat eine Dusche und ein Waschbecken, die Toilette befindet sich im Gang eine Etage unterhalb. Man hat eine Privatsphäre und befindet sich Mitten in einem Hotel für kleines Geld.

The space
Unser Hotel verfügt zu dem über ein Restaurant und eine Bar. Man bekommt ein eigenen Schlüssel für den Hoteleingang und das Zimmer und ist somit unabhängig. Das Zentrum ist ist der Nähe. Geeignet auch für langfristige Aufenthalte wie für Studenten oder Wochenarbeiter, aber auch für Touristen, die gerne zentral, für kleines Budget im Hotel wohnen möchten.

Other things to note
Kein WC im Badezimmer! WC liegt 1. Stock.

Mitten im Univiertel nahe an Universität, ETH, Unispital und Kunsthaus.
Die Altstadt ist innerhalb von 5 Fussminuten erreichbar.

name: aja Hotel Zürich, Comfort double room
description:
Your body and soul deserve a well-earned break so treat them to a vacation at Aja Hotel. Our focus is on your well being during your time here. We’ll be your urban retreat for relaxing and rejuvenating before exploring the city. You will have comfortable accommodations serviced with spa amenities.

The space
Comfortable rooms give you the benefits of spa amenities. Rooms have modern furnishings with attention to detail to give you the best stay. Our high quality beds have back-friendly mattresses and covered with allergy-friendly linens. The comfort and superior style rooms have modern bathrooms with walk-in showers.

Aja Hotel is conveniently located to give you easy access to exploring the city. You’ll be nearby favorite destinations for sightseeing, dining, shopping, and more, just minutes from the hotel. Our 24-hour reception can assist with concierge services.

Each room includes:
Free WiFi
43” Flat screen TV
Complimentary t
host_about: We are bringing wellness to the city. At our urban resort, we want you to enjoy a good night’s sleep and, most importantly, all-round well-being. With a wellness area with rooftop terrace, a selection of saunas, 24-hour fitness and culinary delights in DELI Restaurant – our first resort in Switzerland offers every guest the opportunity to enjoy their own personal time out. Whether travelling for business or pleasure, our resort is just the spot for some rest and relaxation.

name: BnB Balgrist am Buchenweg
description:
Seit dem 1. November 2019 bieten wir eine grosszügige 1.5 Zimmerwohnung von 45m2 mit separatem Eingang in neu erbautem Mehrfamilienhaus im Balgrist als Bed’n’Breakfast an. Das BnB verfügt auf Anfrage über einen Parkplatz in der Tiefgarage. Ruhige Lage in privatem Garten, Tram in 5 Min., 15 Min. ins Stadtzentrum, See, Parks, Wald, viele Spazier-/Wanderwege in kurzer Gehdistanz. Minibar, Kaffeemaschine, Toaster, reichhaltiges Frühstück 7.30 - 9.00 Uhr. 2 Einzelbetten, oder als Doppelbett (2/2m)

The space
Moderne, begehbare Dusche, tägliche Reinigung
In der Küche können mitgebrachte Fertigmalzeiten aufgewärmt werden.
Bei passendem Wetter kann das Frühstück auf dem Gartensitzplatz eingenommen werden. Natürlich steht Ihnen dieser gemeinsam mit den Hausbewohnern auch tagsüber zur Verfügung. Direkt vor dem Haus beginnt ein Fussweg, der Sie fast autofrei zum See oder in den nahen botanischen Garten führt.

Guest access
Die ganze 1.5 ZI Woh
neighborhood_overview: Das BnB geht mit separatem Eingang nach der strassenabgewandten Seite in den Garten. Mehrere Cafés und Restaurants sind in kurzer Zeit  zu Fuss oder mit dem Ö.V. erreichbar.  Verschiedene  Privatkliniken sowie  Balgristspital sind in 5-10 Min. zu Fuss erreichbar.

name: Apartment in the heart of the Old Town
description:
The apartment building is situated in the most ancient part of Zurich Old town, and the heart of the old town. It is calm despite the distance to the shopping street of Bahnhofstrasse. It is a prime neighbourhood with the most attractive hotspots the city can offer. Within only 5 min walk to the main train station, Zurich HB, you can easily take a train and get to all destinations in Switzerland.

The space
The apartment building is from year 1336. It is narrow building and there is no elevator. The building had a major renovation in thirties so many elements are still from that time such as bathtub/shower, kitchen sink, radiators, pipes and doors. You can see the trace of time, wich gives the apartment the charming aspect.
The bathtub is a bit higher than todays standard tubs. The bathroom with a window doesn't have a sink.

Guest access
If you are travelling alone and book the apartment for yourself without the ”extra guest” option. Yo
neighborhood_overview:
There is a multistory car park in the vicinity. The neighbourhood is car free except for the delivery to the shops until noon. Taxis can enter the whole day with a very reduced speed limit.
The tram stop is just down the street and the main train station Zurich HB is 1 stop away or 8 minutes walk distance.
host_about: I do not have any specific hobby/ies but I like to do and have done many things. I can't tell what I am good in. I never do things that I dislike. I am very satisfied with my desicions. Most of them are very spontaneous. I think I am the funniest person I know....that's enough for me as I rarely find a borring moment being alone. I don't know if my friends think the same of me as not everybody understand my jokes :).

This bright and cozy 1 bedroom apartment ensures maximum comfort of living. The living room is furnished with a sofa, dining table with chairs and a flat screen TV. name: Grosszügige 1.5 Zimmer Wohnung mit sonnigem Balkon
description:
Diese grosszügige Wohnung mit grossem, sonnigen Balkon befindet sich im Kreis 2. Sowohl das Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity als auch der See sind nur 10 Gehminuten entfernt. Die Nachbarschaft bietet diverse Restaurants, eine Bäckerei sowie einen kleinen Supermarkt. Ein Umfassendes Einkaufs- und Freizeitangebot findet man im Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity.
Öffentliche Verkehrsmittel mit direkter Verbindung ins Zentrum befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe und bringen Sie in kurzer Zeit ans gewünschte Ziel!

The space
Das Wohnzimmer bietet eine gemütliches Sofa, einen SMART TV, einen Ess-/Arbeitstisch und auch genügend Platz für ein work-out.
Der Schlafbereich bietet ein komfortables, grosses Bett und diverse Schränke für die Aufbewahrung. Bei schönem Wetter lädt der grosse Balkon zum verweilen ein.

Guest access
Der Waschraum befindet sich im Keller und funktioniert ausschliesslich mit dem elektronischen Waschschlüssel.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
Die Nachbarschaft bietet unter anderem die grosszügige Allmend, wo man ausgedehnte Spaziergänge oder Joggingrouten entlang des Flusses laufen kann. Hier gibt es auch einen Wanderweg auf den Üetliberg, für diejenigen, die hoch hinaus wollen. Richtung See geht man über den Hügel, wo sich das Museum und der Park Rietberg befinden. Man hat einen tollen Ausblick über den See bis hin zu den Bergen!
Einkäufe erledigen Sie ganz nahe im Sihlcity oder beim kleinen Supermarkt um die Ecke.
Es warten auch diverse Restaurants und Bars, welche sich in 10 Minuten Gehdistanz befinden, Google kennt die genauen Adressen!

name: Trendy and central 3 room flat with terrace
description:
The trendy flat has 3 rooms and there is space for up to 6 people. It's perfect for small groups and families and it's located very centrally at Binz, very close to Bahnhof Binz. Well connected to the train main station, the city center and the lake.

The space
The apartment is on the groundfloor and has 3 bedrooms: One doubleroom with a 160cm-doublebed and a single bed, another bedroom with a 160cm-doublebed and a spacious living room with a sofabed that can also be used as a bedroom. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is a coffee machine and the basic cookingtools. The is also a Garden/Terrace. The toilet and the shower are separated.

Guest access
The whole apartment is at your disposal

Other things to note
Parking: If you come by car is there a possibility to get a daily parkingcard that costs 15.- CHF per day and you can park in every blue parking space close by. Those are li normals parking on the street but hav
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located close to Bahnhof Binz (less than 10 min. by train to Zürich main station). Several sights and attractions, restaurants, bars and museum are within walking distance. The old town is reachable in 20 min. walking or 5 min. by the train.

description:
Modern fully furnished designer flat,in a perfect location between airport and main train station zurich. Bus Stop just in front of the building takes you in max 7min to Zurich Oerlikon station where you either can reach the airport in 7min or the Bahnhofstrasse, main Zurich shopping street in 8min.by public transport. Very clean and friendly home waiting to make your stay the most pleasant experience.
Breakefast could be arranged upon request;

The space
Quiet apartment in the beautiful Affoltern Zurich.Close to main Oerlikon train station. MIGROS OR COOP and Denner supermarkets just 5 min away. Post office,parks, public transportation nearby.also ideal for ETH students/workers

name: 2 Bedroom Apartment Junior
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS.

If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
This charming penthouse apartment with a balcony and a view overlooking the city is a perfect place to unwind after a stressful day. White marble flooring, chic glass elements, bright designer furniture and sand-colored hues give the apartment an elegant touch. The open living and dining area features a snug sitting corner, flat screen TV and a large dining table. The well-lit, modern kitchen is fully fitted offering a glass ceramic stove, microwave with baking and grill function, coffee maker, as well as pans, crockery and cutlery. Both bedrooms tempt with a comfortable double bed and offer sufficient space to relax. The high quality bathroom with a bathtub features a hair dryer, hand
neighborhood_overview: The residence is situated in a central and yet very quiet area in the trendy Wiedikon district. Thanks to many parks and green areas guests will be able to escape the urban hustle and bustle in no time. The location constitutes a perfect base for those who want to enjoy all benefits of a central location and still stay close to the nature.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

name: Stay on top of Zürich on the 16th floor
description:
New urban highrise space on the 16th floor. There are only 4 highrise appartment buildings in Zürich. This is your rare chance to stay in one.
I live here usually, so all you need is there.

The space
Perfect for couples or individual travellers that are looking for a special place far above the roofs of Zürich
neighborhood_overview:
My place is in the hip Kreis 5. Formerly an industrial area, now a cool combination of new and old. Cool restaurants and clubs just 5min walk away.
The tram station is just downstairs as well as two restaurants inside my building and another 5 just next door.
host_about:
After 8 years in the US, I decided to move back to Switzerland in 2009 and start my own company Supertext AG with two friends.
But having been abroad so long, it always pulls me back out into the world.

name: Hippes 4* Hotel im Trendquartier - Einzelzimmer
description: Das neue Hotel Züri by Fassbind wurde 2017 gebaut. Das Haus mit 167 Zimmer zeigt einen zeitgenössischen „Zürich Touch“. Das „Boutique Hotel“ wurde von den Stararchitekten Gigon & Guyer konzipiert welches mehrere Zürcher Wahrzeichen geplant hat. Mit seinem frischen, zeitlosen und klaren Design bietet das Hotel einen erfolgreichen und erholsamen Aufenthalt. Das Hotel liegt im Trendquartier Züri West, 500 Meter vom Bahnhof Hardbrücke entfernt.

name: *9MINUTES FROM ZH MAIN STATION* / *SPACIOUS* / *MODERN* / *SURROUNDED BY RESTAURANTS & COFFEES* (A)
description:
***VIEW NOW IN 360° MODE / COPY THE LINK BELOW***

https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=Pd6xw8XtdAn

A wonderful spacious apartment, well furnished offering all amenities you need during your stay in Zurich for 1-5 guests. A supermarket is located in the same building and the tram stop "hottingerplatz" from where you are just minutes away from "kunsthaus/museum of arts" is litterally in front of the house. Bakeries, coffee, restaurants and pharmacy are across the street. The apartment is located in one of the posh areas of Zurich and surrounded by many old and nice townhouses great for nice walks.

The space
As you enter the house there is a big elevator to get to the apartment. Opening the apartments door you will have a entry area, the dining area and couch/tv area in front of you in an open space. There are big windows and a nice view. A balcony invites for a glas of wine or a cold beer during the warmer month. The bedrooms are in the back fro
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in a wealthy area of Zurich. The apartment is located to the small ancient "village center" which offers all daily supplies you need. On foot you are in "niederdorf/old town zurich" in about 10min/1km). Museums like the museum of art or Kulturama (museum of culture) are in walking distance. Also theaters and the lake of zurich are just a walk away. I strongly recommend to have a walk to Kafi Paradiesli, Hofstrasse 19, 8032 Zürich, a very nice sweet little hidden coffee place with a small but good menu.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

Spacious, mid-century flat in the eclectic part of Zurich's city center. Hip bars, well-known restaurants as well as local hotspots are just around the corner.

In 20 min. walking distance you reach the old town with its cathedral oand few minutes more you enjoy a stunning view over the lake.

A grocery store opened 7 days a week and public transportation just around the corner (Main station, tram, bus) etc.

Looking forward to hosting you!

name: 3 room apartment between airport and city center
description:
The flat has 3 rooms and there is space for up to 6 people. It's perfect for small groups and families and it's located very centrally in the district of Oerlikon. It's well connected to the train main station, the city center as well as the airport. Hallenstadion, Thater 11 and Messe are within walking distance from the apartment.

The space
The apartment is on the 2nd floor and has two bedrooms: One room with a 160cm-doublebed and a single bed, another bedroom with a 160cm-doublebed and a crib. The living room has a sofabed - that room can also be used as a bedroom. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is a coffee machine and the basic cookingtools.

Guest access
The whole apartment is at your disposal
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a calm neighbourhood close to Bahnhof Oerlikon (10 min. by train to Zürich main station and 10 min to the airport). Several restaurants, bars, shops and the concert hall (Hallenstadion) are within walking distance. The Zurich old town is reachable within 10 min. by train.

Die Wohnung hat zwei Balkone , zwei WC's, und Office.

Die Wohnung ist möbliert inkl. Apple-TV, Netflix, Prime, WIFI und Sonos.

name: Central city-view penthouse
description:
Our apartment is in one of the best locations in Zurich; central, but not in touristic areas, quiet but there’s life surrounding it, cosy but spirited.

It's very easy to get around to wherever you want to get to - either on foot or by public transport. It's in a residential block, so you'll get to experience living of living amongst the locals. We chose unique items to decorate our home with, our pieces are special but familiar.

The space
We are very happy with our apartment’s open space and French windows, and since it’s a penthouse apartment, there’s never a dull moment if you choose to stay in. A flat screen TV, a good sound system, more than enough kitchen appliances to cook a delicious dinner are available. You can enjoy a cosy evening eating next to the artwork that is the view of the city of Zurich, or outside on the balcony with the chitter-chatter and buzzing of the surrounding neighbours doing the same.

Guest access
Yo
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is on the top floor, our neighbours are young couples and families who equally enjoy the one-minute walk to the park next to the house, a 15-minute walk to the main train station and a 20 minute tram-ride to Bellevue (one of the busiest plazas in Zurich).

Boutique shops, supermarkets, bars and restaurants are just around the corner on the main road.

name: 3 room apartment perfect for long stays
description:
The flat has 3 rooms and there is space for up to 6 people. It's perfect for small groups and friends who want to stay a bit longer in Zürich. It's located very centrally in the district of Oerlikon in a calm neighbourhood. It's well connected to the main train station, the city center as well as the airport. Hallenstadion, Theater 11 and Messe are located within a few minutes walking distance.

The space
The apartment is on the 3rd floor and has two bedrooms: One room with a 180cm-doublebed and another bedroom with 2 single beds. The living room has a sofabed, a balcony and the dining table. It can also be used as a bedroom. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is a coffee machine and the basic cookingtools as well as a microwave.

Guest access
The whole apartment is at your disposal.

Other things to note
the apartment is perfect for long stays
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a calm neighbourhood close to Bahnhof Oerlikon (10 min. by train to Zürich main station and 10 min to the airport). Several restaurants, bars, shops and the concert hall (Hallenstadion) are within walking distance. The Zurich old town is reachable in 10 min. by train.

name: 3.5 room apartment in the city by lake and parks
description:
This is a bright and comfortable apartment, perfect for a longer get-away. It is located 100m from the lake, and during the colder months we even have lake-view through the trees!

The flat is equipped with a projector for cozy movie nights as well as yoga mats for more spiritual adventures.

Normally a Swedish man and a Chinese woman shares this flat. However since the Swedish boy is not at home his big bedroom is up for rent! :)

The space
The apartment has a bright scandinavian style. We have put a lot of thought into the furnishing and decoration, we hope that you will like it!

For example; The bedroom has a awesome bed from the Swedish brand Hästens and the kitchen table is from the renowned Swiss brand Horgen Glarus. We hope that you will be eating and sleeping well! :)

Guest access
We now rent out the big bedroom with a huge double bed from Hästens. This means that my flatmate will be sharing the apartme
neighborhood_overview:
The area, Seefeld, has many good restaurants, cafes and parks both along the lake and up in the neighborhood.

Why not take a morning walk along the lake just 1 min away, or bring a towel and jump for a swim. The lake of Zürich is known for its very clean water!

Zurich See 15 minutes walking distance.

name: Lakeside Studio in Zurich Seefeld
description:
Stylishly decorated small studio apartment. Approx. 30sqm, located on a 2nd floor. Entirely equipped and furnished with handmade objects, books & artwork. The space has a partial wall-bookshelf or divide and a 200x160cm bed.

Centrally located, perfectly connected to public transport, and situated in Zurich’s popular Seefeld district, on the lakeside.

Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
A single room that features a kitchen and a bathroom. It is a self-contained unit and houses everything in the single room space except the bathroom, to which is connected through a corridor. The different areas of the single room are employed for varied uses: a corner of the room is used as sleeping area, another corner designed as a kitchen, and the space in between is designed as a living/working room. In addition, the space has a partial wall/bookshelf or divider.

The space is entirely furnished and equipped,
neighborhood_overview:
It is only a jump away from the lake of Zurich, next to the train station of “Tiefenbrunnen" and tram station “Wildbachstrasse”, offering perfect connectivity to the Main Train Station as well as the Airport.

Other areas of the city center and the lake of Zurich are only few minutes walk away. Surrounded by numerous restaurants, bars, supermarkets, parks & cafés, the studio is amid one of the most beautiful, hip and vital areas in Zurich.
host_about: Zurich based. Creative Entrepreneur. Art & Design Lover. Fervent traveller.

name: City Center - 3 Bedroom Apartment with own Parking
description:
The apartment is located in a small charming house in the popular Zurich Wiedikon district. A dedicated parking spot for the apartment is included.
Within walking distance you have many popular restaurants, cafés and bars. The Sihlcity mall and the Hürlimann Areal with restaurants, shops, movie theatres, spa etc. are close by.
The key is located in a key box outside of the building and you can check-in and check-out yourself.

The space
Apartment is on the 3rd floor and offers 3 separate bedrooms (one with a sofa and TV and one with an armchair), a combined dining area and kitchen and a bathroom. The master bedroom offers a double bed (with two separate matrasses). The other bedrooms are equipped with two single beds. Bed linen and towels are provided.
The kitchen is fully equipped including Nespresso coffee machine, water heater etc. Free internet WLAN and cable TV is available. Smoking is not permitted.
neighborhood_overview: In about 5 minutes by foot you reach the Sihlcity mall with shops, restaurants and movie theatres and also the Hürlimann Areal with restaurants and the Thermalbad & Spa Zurich. The famous Rietberg and the FIFA Museum are also close by.
host_about: Vivimos en Zurich. Nos encanta viajar y conocer gente de todo el mundo.

name: My little Paradise in Zurich
description:
Welcome to my little Paradise in Zurich! If you want to relax or explore Zurich while feeling on a holiday mood you found your space! Just walking out of the door and you can go jogging, enjoy the view or go for a walk along the lake.
The apartment is located opposite to the world famous Neubühl Bauhaus settlement , which many architects have visited, and just 2 minutes to the next Busstop. The apartment is extremely sun-filled during the whole day due to the fact that it faces south.

The space
There are many parking spots right in front of the house.
You can arrive in the city within 20 minutes of public transport, 10 minutes of car drive or 10 minutes by bike.
