name: aja Hotel Zürich, Superior room-Early booking rate
description:
Your body and soul deserve a well-earned break so treat them to a vacation at Aja Hotel. Our focus is on your well being during your time here. We’ll be your urban retreat for relaxing and rejuvenating before exploring the city. You will have comfortable accommodations serviced with spa amenities.

Book your stay up to 3 days prior to your date of arrival and get a 15% discount per room/night on our a-ja Flex Rate.

The space
Comfortable rooms give you the benefits of spa amenities. Rooms have modern furnishings with attention to detail to give you the best stay. Our high quality beds have back-friendly mattresses and covered with allergy-friendly linens. The comfort and superior style rooms have modern bathrooms with walk-in showers.
host_about: We are bringing wellness to the city. At our urban resort, we want you to enjoy a good night’s sleep and, most importantly, all-round well-being. With a wellness area with rooftop terrace, a selection of saunas, 24-hour fitness and culinary delights in DELI Restaurant – our first resort in Switzerland offers every guest the opportunity to enjoy their own personal time out. Whether travelling for business or pleasure, our resort is just the spot for some rest and relaxation.

name: Flat very well located in Zürich City
description:
Nice flat in the center of Zürich. Very well connected to the public transport (tram, bus and train station of Zürich Wiedikon). The arrangement of the flat is handy and would be perfect for a couple that would like to spend a pleasant city trip. The main train station is at 12 minutes with the tram and Bellevue Place at 10 minutes. In the district 3 (Kreis 3) you will find a lot of nice restaurants and bars. There are also several possibilities to get a delicate brunch.

The space
There are two balconies in the flat, one in the room and one in the kitchen where you can have breakfast. The new kitchen, bathroom with bathtub and the room with the sofa bed and table will be at your disposal for your comfort. The sofa bed feels like a real bed because there is a mattress of 140 cm and a bed base. You will also find an expresso coffee machine and everything you need to do tea, coffee, and also cappuccino.
host_about:
Hi there, I am Amandine and I come from France. I live in Zürich since 2015 and I looooove this city.

description:
The space
Das Haus ist bald 500-jährig und liegt gehört zum Denkmal-geschützten Teil der Zürcher Altstadt.
neighborhood_overview: The Krone Zurich is ideally located – whether you are planning a city getaway or a business trip to the beautiful city on the Limmat. Our personally managed hotel is only five minutes from the central train station, and you can comfortably see the sites by foot, or by public transport. Please note, that we have no restaurant at our hotel. There are many cafés, restaurants and bars just around the corner and we will be happy to help you choose the right one for you.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang.

description:
Das Penthouse im 14. Obergeschoss, 50 m über Zürich Oerlikon, ist verkehrstechnisch optimal erschlossen. Das Penthouse bietet neben einer grossartigen Aussicht über die Stadt Zürich bis hin zu den Schweizer Alpen, ruhe und viel privacy und Luxus auf 126m2.

The space
Das Penthouse verfügt über zwei grosszügige und komfortable Schlafzimmer, welche mit hochwertigen, grossen Boxspringbetten sowie einem Flat Screen TV pro Zimmer ausgestattet sind. Angrenzend an die Schlafzimmer befinden sich zwei edle Badezimmer. Das Eine mit Lavabo und Badewanne, das Andere verfügt über Lavabo, WC und einer begebbaren Regendusche. Das Penthouse verfügt zudem über ein separates Gäste WC.

Das Sofa im Livingroom kann bei Bedarf für zwei zusätzliche Gäste, zu einem vollwertigen Bett umgebaut werden. Wie in den Schlafzimmern hat es einen Flat Screen TV im Livingroom. Ein Kleinkinderbett kann bei Bedarf zusätzlich aufgestellt werden. Der Wirtschaftsraum im Penthouse verfügt übe

name: Cozy vintage apartment with a beautiful view
description:
Cozy vintage apartment with a beautiful view over Zurich, the lake and the Swiss alps.
The apartment is on the top floor of a villa on the hill ("Zürichberg") in Zurich close to nature but still in the city.
We are an artist community living in the rest of the villa and taking care of the house and its surroundings.
It's a very quiet and peacefull neighbourhood.

The space
We share the staircase and the main entrance door of the house.
neighborhood_overview:
The Zoo is a 15-minute-walk away. On top of the hill, 10 minutes away there is also a Restaurant and a Café at the Zürichberg Hotel (Sorell Hotel Zürichberg). In walking distance you also find the versatile "Rigiblick Theater", where you can enjoy music and theatre.
The forest is just 5 minutes away and perfect for relaxing walks or energizing running tracks with stunning views.

name: THE FLAG Zürich - Comfort Apartment in Altstetten
description:
Large Room (24 sqm) with king size or queen size double bed, shower/toilette, hair dryer
fully equipped kitchenette (without hob), fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, kettle
small seating area, safe, flatscreen TV, ironing station
free W-Lan, digital E-Concierge, free access to digital newspapers, USB ports
on request breakfast buffet (CHF 15 per person) or snacks for on the go in the restaurant

Guest access
free access to fitness room and public terrace

Other things to note
Please note that our breakfast will not be available until May 31, 2020. Thank you for your understanding
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

name: Cosy room 15min from Zurich HB in hip area Kreis 5
description:
Central room 15 min walk from Zurich HB (main train station) with good bus and tram connections to every corner of the city.
Suited for people who want to explore the city to the fullest. Situated in the hip and creative area Kreis 5 you will find a variety of restaurants, cafes, bars and little shops. The great nightlife of Langstrasse is just a 5 minutes walk away, yet the area is quiet and very safe.
You’ll get all that in a homey flat with two very warm and hospitable hosts.

The space
This is our home. You are welcome to enter all the rooms that are not locked. Be aware, we have personal things on display in the common rooms. Please treat them with respect. We want you to feel at home so we hope you’ll treat our home as if it were your home.
neighborhood_overview:
Big grocery stores (Migros, Coop, Denner):
5min walk

Numerous restaurants, cafes, bars:
5min walk

5min walk

Public swimming at the river Limmat:
5min walk

name: THE FLAG Zürich -Executive Apartment in Altstetten
description:
Large Executive apartment (26 sqm) with king size or queen size double bed, shower/toilette, hair dryer
private terrace
fully equipped kitchenette (without hob), fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, kettle
small seating area, safe, flatscreen TV, ironing station
free W-Lan, digital E-Concierge, free access to digital newspapers, USB ports
on request breakfast buffet (CHF 15 per person) or snacks for on the go in the restaurant

The space
free access to fitness room and public terrace

Other things to note
Please note that our breakfast will not be available until May 31, 2020. Thank you for your understanding
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

name: Luxury 100sqm Attic apartment 10min walk from HB
description:
Luxury 100sqm attic apartment 10min walk from the main station - temporary rental

The apartment has windows to all 4 sides, including to the Zuriberg mountains, to the city main station and partial view to the lake from the bedroom.

There is a bio supermarket 2 min walk and tram stop 9&10 that links you directly to the airport, main station, Bellevue area, Bahnhofstrasse and Enge.
Also great to go jogging up to the zoo or down to the lake / Limmat river

The space
The apartment is located at the foot of the Zürichberg, near the University and the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH). It’s a 7 minutes drive by tram to the main train station, to the lake and to the old town. From/to the airport it takes you about 25 minutes by a direct tram (Line Nr. 10). The nearest tram stop is only 2 minutes away by foot. The apartment has a island kitchen (coffee machine, oven, fridge, dishwasher) and all utensils needed to cook a good meal :)

name: -- SUPER CENTRAL FURNISHED SINGLE APARTMENT --
description:
Hi traveller,

This is a perfect opportunity for young professionals staying in Zürich for couple of days/weeks.

1.5 room apartment (no studio) right at Stauffacher - fully furnished incl. dishwasher and bath tub.

Small yet practical apartment with high ceiling in renovated historical building.

Two rooms & a sunny balcony:
- A bedroom including big bed (max 2) & work space.
- A living room including kitchenette, & extendable sofa (max 1).

Would love to host you, send a message,
Emanuel :)

The space
It is my home in super central location - very practical for getting to know Zurich. At the same time it also holds my personal belongings, so only reliable guests please.
neighborhood_overview:

Werd - while very calm and decent, Werd is a trendy hipster quarter right next to old town. Lots of restaurants and bars around.
1 min walking to shopping street and tram exchange Stauffacher.
2 min walking to supermarkets.
3 min walking to train station Wiedikon (with direct trains to airport).
4 min walking to old town.
5 min walking to Langstrasse (nightlife area).
6 min walking to Zurich central train station.
7 min walking to the lake.

Nähe ETH als auch zum Zentrum ( Limat, Schiffbau, Moods, Tonhalle...) ruhige Südseite, freie Aussicht, öV & Einkaufsmöglichkeit 150 m...autarkes wohnen (Jeder macht was er will).

It is a quiet area, but still connected to the city. It makes it the perfect spot to relax when enjoying the sights of Zürich!

The space
Unabhängiger, selbstbestimmter Aufenthalt/ wohnen, kommen und gehen.

neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is located in Höngg, Zurich. It is a quiet area, but still connected to the city. It makes it the perfect spot to relax when enjoying the sights of Zürich!
There is a bus & tram station directly (150m) below the apartment, making mobility very easy.
The local river Limat can be reached in 10 minutes by walking, and is great for swimming in the summer.
There is also a forest behind the apartment, just 15 minutes away by walking!
Supermarkets, banks, pharmacies are a maximum of 5 minutes away on foot.

name: Casual? Not my style: Large Studio made with love
description:
The newly renovated & high quality completed property on 5 floors with elevator is located on an almost traffic-free one-way street and each apartment is accessible via a charming passageway with a view of an unobstructable green meadow.

These 23 apartments will amaze you. From large studios to exclusive 1-bed-apartments a "WOW" is written on your forehead.

This unit is offered in two different interior designs; "Park Avenue" or " Mexican South"

The space
NEW OPENING!
Not too much and not too little: Just right with more space.

Open floor plan with lots of well thought-out details and an extra portion of comfort.

The designer kitchens, which are angled at the entrance, are fully equipped with a large refrigerator, oven and dishwasher. Their clever arrangement gives the impression of an apartment rather than a studio. The combined living & sleeping area with real parquet flooring offers plenty of space to live, w
neighborhood_overview:
The apartments are located in the heart of the metropole of Zurich and in attractive proximity to the shore of Lake Zurich.

The "Seefeld" district is attractive for people who love city life, nature and the lake and is ideally located in Zurich's central banking and administrative district - just a few minutes' walk from the lake. As the most popular district for living and working, for leisure, culture and recreation, Seefeld is at the top of the agenda. Here you will find numerous neighbourhood shops, a wide range of restaurants from trendy to gourmet, fashionable boutiques, galleries and countless local recreational opportunities.

With its two spacious bedrooms and three 160x200 beds, a dining area, kitchen and bathroom and a balcony, all equipped with everything you need for a few days in Zurich, it is the perfect base for small groups or for families or business travellers to make the most of their stay without loosing time with commuting. The space

neighborhood_overview: The area around "hegibachplatz" is know for its calm wonderful neighbourhoods with big old townhouses and many parks, smaller coffees and shops. Yet it is very well connected and offers it self for nice exploration walks to "villa Patumbah", the botanic garden, the lake or the "neumünsteranlage" around the corner. Right next to the apartment you will find the restaurant "Butchers Table" which is well known for its outstanding meat dishes, and the restaurant "Misoga" which offers modern asian fusion kitchen.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

name: Zimmer im Zentrum von Zürich!
description:
Du hast ein Zimmer mit einem 1.8 x 2 Meter Bett. Ihr könnt euch das also auch zu zweit teilen. Die Wohnung hat 6.5 Zimmer, ist also ziemlich gross, hat einen grossen Balkon mit Blick auf das Wahrzeichen des Quartiers, die Kirche Enge. In der Wohnung hat es alles was du brauchst, inklusive Waschmaschine und Tumbler direkt in der Wohnung! Die Tramhaltestelle ist direkt vor der Haustür, von dort aus erreichst du fast alle wichtigen Orte in Zürich in wenigen Minuten, auch den See.

The space
Du teilst dir die Wohnung mit meinen super netten Mitbewohnern, also sei bitte auch nett zu ihnen. Wenn du Tipps und Hilfe von ihnen brauchst, frag sie, sie werden dir gerne helfen. Verlasse die gemeinsamen Räume einfach so, wie du sie angetroffen hast. Sprich nutzt du die Küche, bitte mach sie danach wieder sauber, genau so das Badezimmer.

Guest access
Du hast Zugang zum Wohnzimmer, zur Küche, zum Bad und zum Balkon. Tabu sind eigentlich nur die Zimmer mein
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt super Zentral. Es gibt in der direkten Nachbarschaft viele kleine Cafes und Restaurants. Direkt auf der anderen Strassenseite findest du zum Beispiel die gemütliche Bederbar. In wenigen Minuten erreichst du das Zürcher Seebecken, du kannst Abends zum Beispiel für einen Drink ins Seebad Enge um deinen Tag ausklingen zu lassen oder einfach am See entlang spazieren und den Blick in die Alpen geniessen.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Nico. I live in beautyful Switzerland and love to host and meet people and of course also to travel. 

See you soon ;-)

Public transport (train station Brunau and bus stop) - is only 100 meters away and you reach the city center in 9 minutes. The shore of lake Zurich with a large public park (Landiwiese) and the famous Rietberg Museum are within walking distance.

Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

name: Greulich Design & Lifestyle Hotel
description:
Mitten im trendigen Kreis 4 in Zürich liegt das Greulich Design & Lifestyle Hotel mit 28 Zimmern. Hier trifft wohnliche Atmosphäre auf puristisches Design, trifft das pulsierende Stadtleben auf Erholung pur im ruhigen Birkenhain. Die Zimmer verteilen sich auf das Haupthaus und den Innenhof neben Birkenhain.

The Bahnhofstrasse and the Zurich Central Station can be reached within minutes of walking distance and the international airport can be reached in 15 minutes via S-Bahn.

name: Everything you need to feel at home on 110m2
description:
The stylish apartment (110m2) is situated in the urban area of the 3rd district. The city centre and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The elegant shopping centre Sihlcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Other restaurants, bars, shopping possibilities, as well as as the Hürlimann spa with a rooftop bath are offered by the direct vicinity. The beautiful local recreation areas Allmend Brunau and Uetliberg are situated nearby.

The space
The light-flooded apartment with high quality materials, modern furnishing and a sunny balcony of 28 m2 creates a unique living experience. You enjoy a spacious living room, a dining corner for 6 persons with an open and large, fully equipped kitchen. The bedroom has also direct access to the balcony and the separate walk-in wardrobe is combined with washing/tumbler machines. Elegant stone tiles in the bathroom, a modern fireplace, art and pictures on the walls
neighborhood_overview: The suburban train station Giesshübel is situated just on its doorstep and brings you in four minutes to the main railway station (the airport Zurich Kloten can be reached in 25 minutes). There are only steps to the closest bus and tram station, while the surrounding traffic arteries can be accessed quickly by a private car.
host_about: I lived in Zurich for many years and worked in an international environment in the city. I enjoyed the time in this great city and I am still often in Zurich. The apartment was my oasis for years. Today I live near Zurich in a house with garden. I love gardening, today I often paint in my own studio and enjoy our three four-legged friends (mainecoon cats).

name: Centrally, large and vintage 4.5 rooms apartment
description:
The apartment has 4.5 rooms and there is space for up to 7 people. It's perfect for small groups or families and it's located very centrally in Zürich Wipkingen. It's well connected to the train main station and the city center. The train station Wipkingen and Hardbrücke are walking distance as well as the river Limmat.

The space
The apartment is on the second floor and has three bedrooms: One room with a 160cm-doublebed, another bedroom with a 180cm-doublebed and a cot and the third with a single bed. The living room has a sofabed - that room can also be used as a bedroom. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is a coffee machine and the basic cookingtools. The apartment has 2 balconies, one of them is mostly sunny.
neighborhood_overview: Despite the apartment is in the city center, the trendy neighbourhood in Wipkingen is very calm. Several restaurants, bars, coffees, supermarkets and the river Limmat are within walking distance. In Summer we suggest a jump in the river :)

The space
Die neue Küche, WC/Bad wird gemeinsam genutzt.

host_about: Hi, ich bin Christa, Mutter 3er Kinder und 3 Enkelkinder. Ich vermiete unsere 3 WG-Zimmer in einer 4,5 Zimmer-Wohnung im EG in ZH Örlikon. Ich selbst wohne in Zürich, ca 20Min von der Wohnung entfernt. Ich liebe Tiere und arbeite grösstenteils von zuhause aus als Schneiderin. Ich liebe Tiere und hüte von Zeit zu Zeit den Hund meines Sohnes. Auf dem Bild seht Ihr meine jüngste Tochter mit meinem Enkelkind. Sie ist mir bei Arbnb bei Übersetzungen und Überwachung der Termine behilflich.

Light-flooded 4-room holiday flat with 2 balconies in a top location in Zurich-Wiedikon. Very quiet location, yet easily and quickly accessible by public transport. Stylishly and lovingly furnished. The flat is particularly suitable for families, with a lot to discover for children. You are welcome to use the garden. Breakfast on request. Parking in front of the house.

The space
The flat has been recently renovated and lovingly and imaginatively furnished, offering many conveniences for a wonderful holiday stay.
The kitchen is generously equipped and stocked.
If travelling with children, high-quality toys are available for all ages.

name: Stadt Zürich 4204 kleine Wohnung Albisriederplatz
description:
Kleine Wohnung mit Küche und Bad. Ca 25 m2. Zu Fuss zum Albisriederplatz in 2 min. Die Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende Abenteurer, Geschäftsreisende und Paare.Coop, Migros, Restaurants, Bars, Bäckereien in der Nähe. Mit Tram Nr. 3. in 15 min zum Hauptbahnhof. Wenn Ihr zu zweit seid, bitte für 2 Personen buchen, besten Dank! Rauchverbot, keine Parties. Parkplatz kann dazu gemietet werdenFr.8.-/Tag.

The space
Die Unterkunft ist ideal für 1-2 Personen. Wenn Ihr zu zweit kommt, bitten wir Dich für 2 Gäste zu buchen! Besten Dank! Bad und Küche mit Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Kaffeemaschine, sowie Geschirr und Besteck und Pfannen sind vorhanden.
Weisse Handtücher und ein frisch bezogenes 160x200cm Bett sind für Dich/Euch bereit.
Bei längerem Aufenthalt wird die Wohnung regelmässig gereinigt.
.
Föhn, TV, Bügeleisen, Bügelbrett stehen bereit.

Apartment with kitchen and bathroom. Approximately 38 square meters. 2 min walk to Albis
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung befindet sich neben dem Crowne Plaza Hotel. In der Nähe gibt es viele Einkauksmöglichkeiten (Migros /Coop ) und Restaurants, 3 Gehminuten zum Letzigrundstadion (0.5 Km) . Mit dem Tram ( 2 oder 3) bist Du  in wenigen Minuten in der City, am Hauptbahnhof (ca. 15min/3 Km) und in der Altstadt ( 15 min/ 3 Km) oder am Bellevue /See ( Tram 2 ).
host_about:
Hallo,
wohne und arbeite schon seit immer in der Stadt Zürich.
Freue mich auf Deinen Aufenthalt in dieser spannenden Stadt.

name: Apartment in the central of City Zürich
description:
A very nice location in the heart of the city with 1 minute walk to the tram stop connection Paradeplatz which takes you any direction you want in the city. The neighbourhood is part of the old town and the scenery is very nice around this area.

I'm looking for someone (longterm or short-term) that wants to stay here on a monthly basis because of studies or such and therefore needs their own space to be private when needed.

I is possible to come and see the apartment before booking.

The space
You will have quite a large sized newly renovated apartment for yourself with a fairly sized room with its own kitchen. The hallway will also be for your disposal and there is a private entrance to this separated hallway. There is also a washing machine in the hallway that can come be shared at times but Im sure it will be in rare occasions.

The bathroom has a shower and all the basic necessities you need.
host_about: I do not have any specific hobby/ies but I like to do and have done many things. I can't tell what I am good in. I never do things that I dislike. I am very satisfied with my desicions. EN

name: Spacious apartment in "The Metropolitans"
description:
Located within the Oerlikon district of Zurich, the apartment offers two loggias, a garden view & free private parking. The apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking and cycling. The apartment features a bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, an oven and a bathroom with a shower. The new apartment building is 10 minutes away from the airport (train) and another 10 minutes by train to the central station of Zurich.

The space
The apartment is located in the 4th floor and offers a bedroom, a bathroom with a shower, two balconies (south and north), a fully equipped kitchen and dining table.

As I usually live there, my private bedroom will be locked. I only rent this place when I am not there, therefore the apartment is all yours.

The bedroom itself includes a sofa (can be extended to a double bed) and a 140x200cm bed with direct access to the balcony.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
There is gas station with a mini market as well as a super markert right across the street which offers a big section on groceries. There are 2 more supermarkets available within a 5 minutes walk.
The building faces a nice park on the south side which is ideal for some walks.

description:
Unsere Wohnung liegt an Top-Lage, nahe vom Zentrum und hat beste Verkehrsverbindungen. HB Zürich 12min., Zürichsee 15min., Flughafen Zürich 20min. Wir haben mehrere Hier Einkaufsmöglichkeiten oder Bäckereien in unmittelbarer Nähe (200m.), viele Restaurants und deren kulinarischen Gerichte aus aller Welt sowie zahlreichen Bars, Cafés oder Partyclubs.

Freunde der kulturellen Angebote wie Kinos, Theater, Parks, Museen oder Schiff-/Bus-/Tramfahrten kommen natürlich ebenfalls auf ihre Kosten :-D

The space
Es ist eine 3 Zimmer-Wohnung mit ca. 75m2. Einzig under Privatzimmer ist abgeschlossen und nicht benutzbar, ansonsten gehört die gesamte Wohnung euch und wir werden während eurem Aufenthalt nicht anwesend sein. So könnt ihr Zürich in vollen Zügen geniessen. Aber selbstverständlich sind wir für wuch da, wenn ihr Tipps, Ratschläge, gute Restaurantadressen oder sonstige Unterstützung benötigt :))

Other things to note
Wir lieben unsere
neighborhood_overview: Unkomplizierte und freundliche Nachbarn. Helfen gerne.
host_about:
Herzlich Willkommen in Zürich! 

Wir heissen Simi & Marc, sind 36 und 40 Jahre alt und freuen uns, Touristen oder Traveller aus aller Welt hier in unserer schönen, sehr zentral-gelegenen Wohnung begrüssen zu dürfen. In unserer Freiheit reisen wir gerne, lernen neue Kulturen und Abenteuer kennen, kochen und essen sehr gerne oder geniessen die Natur mit all ihren wunderschönen Facetten.

Da wir aktuell etwas ausserhalb Zürich‘s leben und undere Stadtwohnung erst in einigen Monaten untervermietet wird, haben wir uns kurzerhand entschieden, unsere gesamte Wohnung über Airbnb anzubieten. 

Wir wünschen uns Gäste, die unserer am Herzen liegenden Wohnung acht geben, sich anständig und ordentlich verhalten und eine schöne Zeit in Zürich verbringen wollen :)

name: HELVETIA Homeoffice Stadtwohnung mit Parkplatz!
description:
Charmante 2 1/2 Zimmer Wohnung mit tollem Ausblick über die Stadt, inklusive Parkplatz auf Privatgrundstück. Sie ist für Ferienreisende, wie aber auch Geschäftsleute bestens geeignet. In 8 Minuten sind Sie im Stadtzentrum oder in 20 Minuten am Flughafen Zürich Kloten. Dennoch liegt die Wohnung an einer sehr ruhigen Lage, nahe bei diversen Erholungsgebieten. Bitte beachten Sie auch mein 2. Inserat der "Turicum" im selben Haus.

The space
Diese charmante 2 1/2 Zimmer Wohnung haben Sie für sich allein und ist der perfekte Host um Zürich; sogar die gesamte Schweiz zu erkunden. Die Unterkunft liegt im trendigen Quartier Wipkingen, an einer sehr ruhigen Strasse. Bus- sowie Tramstationen sind in 2 Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Von dort sind es nur ein paar weitere Minuten bis ins Stadtzentrum. Vom Flughafen kommend sind es 7 Minuten Fahrzeit mit der S-Bahn und nur zwei Haltestellen bis zum Bahnhof Wipkingen. Nicht nur das Nachtleben, Konzerte und Veranstaltungen jegliche
neighborhood_overview: Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind in ein paar Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Verschiedene Restaurants sind in der Nähe und die beste Aussicht auf Zürich geniesst man vom Restaurant "DIE WAID", das in ein paar Gehminuten erreichbar ist. Diverse Unterlagen,  Reiseführer und Vorschläge liegen in der Wohnung auf. Sehr gerne helfe ich auch persönlich bei der Ausflugsplanung.
host_about:
Das Reisen und das damit verbundene Kennenlernen von Menschen unterschiedlichster Kulturen ist eine meiner Leidenschaften.
Mein Credo fürs Leben: Die Bereitschaft jeden Tag dazu zu lernen, Ehre und Respekt. Genau so versuche ich als Gast und als Gastgeber zu sein.

host_about:
Hi, my name is Irina.
I am so happy that our paths crossed even if only virtually for now. 


Let me share with you some information about myself. 
I lived in 7 countries and speak 7 languages. 
I cannot live without: traveling, sport (especially yoga and jogging), fruits, flowers and books.

Favorite continent to travel: Asia
Favorite country to live: Italy (but I LOVE Switzerland and especially Zurich where I currently live)
Favorite fruit: mango, but I go crazy about all what is in season. 

You will have a positive, vibrant and bubbly world citizen as host/guest with a lot of travel and life stories to tell (in lots of languages). 
Traveling, meeting new people and sharing life experiences is my biggest passion and I hope yours too. 
Hope to meet you soon and until then stay blessed, healthy and happy! 
Irina

The district below the Uetliberg is a popular area with cozy cafés, restaurants, bars, boutiques, and vintage stores. Wiedikon has a super cool neighborhood vibe and is super central within the city so you can walk to all other relevant quarters easily.

description:
It's a lovely 2.5 room apartment located in the lively area of Wipkingen with a terrace over the river Limmat and Wipkinger Park.
You can start your morning with a cup of good coffee and get going around by nearby public transportation or by my old bicycle. I usually don't live in this apartment in the summer.

The space
2.5 room apartment: separate bedroom (double bed), living room at the entrance of the apartment (TV & netflix available), dining area next to the kitchen; building renovated 5 years ago.
neighborhood_overview: Located in a residential area near a community center with various facilities: playground, little zoo,  table tennis facilities, etc. River Limmat just 3 minutes away, perfect for a walk or your run, during the summer you can dip your tired feet in the river on stairs in the Wipkinger park where people hang around. The area gets lively during the day, usually quiet at night. Legendary bookstore/cafe Spheres, few restaurants and bars (Gruental, 26 Rose Garden, Bar Damm, pizzeria San Genaro) are around the corner. Nearest grocery shop 8mins on foot. Just across the river there is the industrial area Hardbruecke with bars, music and jazz clubs (e.g. Moods).

description:
Small & renovated apartment to rent in the center of Zürich, in the nice area of Zürich Wiedikon with coffeeshops and restaurants around.
The apartment is 15 minutes walking from the lake, old town and Bahnofstrasse & public transportation (bus, s-bahn, tramway) can also be used.
At the corner of the street you can find the local supermarket (Coop), a little butchery and 200 meters away a good bakery.
If it is sunny you can enjoy the small balcony! :)

The space
The apartment has one bedroom, one living room with an open kitchen, one bathroom and a small balcony where you can enjoy the sun.
In the building, there is an elevator and you can also use a washing machine / dryer located in the ground floor.

Guest access
The guests will be alone in the flat and can have access to all facilities.
neighborhood_overview:
Zurich Wiedikon is a nice area with many coffeeshops, restaurants and parcs. From this area, you can easily access Uetliberg to do an easy hike.
From the apartment, you can walk to the lake (15min), to the old city (15min) or to the bahnhofstrasse (15 min).

name: Naturzimmer
description:
Im 5 Millionen Sterne Hotel bist du weit weg von der Hektik des Alltags und trotzdem nur 30 Minuten vom Stadtzentrum von Zürich entfernt.

Du übernachtest mit Rundumsicht mitten auf einer Waldlichtung und musst trotzdem nicht auf den Komfort eines Zimmers verzichten.

Frühstück ist inklusive und steht am morgen vor dem Naturzimmer bereit. Je nach Wetter könnt ihr es draussen auf der Waldlichtung oder gemütlich im Bett geniessen.

Auf Anfrage bieten wir auch eine Massage oder eine Yoga Lektion.

The space
Das wunderschön eingerichtete Zimmer befindet sich auf einer Waldlichtung am Stadtrand von Zürich. Ihr habt die ganze Waldlichtung mit dem Naturzimmer für euch alleine zur Verfügung.

Selbstverständlich steht Holz für das Lagerfeuer zur Verfügung.
neighborhood_overview:
Die Umgebung bietet sich für kürzere und längere Waldspaziergänge an. Unsere Lieblingsroute geht dem Bach entlang, welcher mit einem kurzen Fussmarsch erreichbar ist.

Nach einem 30 minütigen Spaziergang, werden auf diesem Weg auch die beiden empfehlenswerten Restaurants Trichterhausermühle oder Steakhouse Fleisch am Chnoche erreicht.
host_about:
Geschichte Naturzimmer
Vor ein paar Jahren hat Lukas in einem Bubble Hotel in La Réunion übernachtet und war vom Erlebnis begeistert. Er hat dann zusammen mit Iwan an der Umsetzung eines solchen Projekts in der Region Zürich gearbeitet. Die beiden haben einen Weg gefunden, wie man ein Angebot gestalten könnte, waren nach erstem Standort-Misserfolg nur noch auf der Suche nach einem geeignetem Plätzchen. Durch einen glücklichen Zufall sind sie dann auf Corinne aufmerksam geworden, welche nicht nur einen wunderschönen Standort zu bieten hatte, sondern mit ihren Fähigkeiten das Team perfekt ergänzen konnte. Seit dem hat das Dreierteam daran gearbeitet, den Leuten eine unvergessliche Übernachtungsmöglichkeit zu bieten, welche gerade im Sommer 2020, wegen den vielen gescheiterten Urlaubsplänen, gerne gebucht wird.


Über uns
Iwan und Lukas haben sich während dem Studium kennengelernt und durch viele lustige gemeinsame Abende, abenteuerliche Reisen und interessante Projekte eine enge Freundschaft entwickelt. Corinne unterrichtet Yoga und leitet mit Freundinnen verschiedene Workshops wie Hypno-Yoga und Woodland Medicine. Unter anderem natürlich auch auf diesem magischen Waldplätzli unter freiem Himmel.

And all our homes are “lovely & unique” too

Hospitality with a difference, where `experience & essence of living` matters more than anything else.

Your support and encouragement have helped us to grow from a humble beginning with a single unit in October 2014 to more than 60 units now.

We are the most efficient and the only hospitality company in Switzerland.

The space

host_about:
"Home is where our story begins…"

And here is our story...

As an IT professional with global experience and the first ever  real estate entrepreneur in Switzerland with ´empathy´ for our guests, I take pride in keeping the Indian tradition of valuing our guests as ´God´ - अतिथि देवो भवः (Atithi Devo Bhava) as we say in Sanskrit. It is our endeavour  to offer you a truly  ‘home-away-from-home’ experience, a feeling as someone rightly said. 

“Home is not a place…it’s a feeling.”

I am a Swiss resident of Indian origin and speak English, German and Hindi. I believe in the philosophy ´the world is one family - वसुधैव कुटुम्बकम्  (Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam) and ´the global village´. 

It´s my privilege and honor to welcome you from all over the world. I look forward to welcome you in my ´signature´ and beautifully done ´Swiss Home´.

You are welcome to choose from one of the 60 apartments all over Switzerland in all the different ´flavours´ - studio, sharing, holiday apartments, ladies only, sharing, full occupancy and even on daily and weekly basis.

We have apartments in - Bern, Basel, Zug, Zurich, Winterthur, Luzern, Adliswil, Glattbrugg, Bonstetten and we are still growing well...

I am the only real estate entrepreneur in Switzerland who gives you a ´home´. instead of an apartment and who connects you with ´community´ instead of just getting ´networked´ !

And we have a special offer for corporate travellers for long or short term stay in Switzerland.

These 23 apartments will amaze you. New OPENING: be one of the first guests to move in!
This comfy and "hygge" apartment in bright colours will for sure delight you.

Cosy and smart! – Compact but not petty.

Charming smaller housing space, combined with a large dose of functionality at a great value for money.

Through the clever arrangement of the fully equipped kitchen with large refrigerator, oven & dishwasher in the entrance area, your living, sleeping & working area is extremely cosy and comfortable. The oak parquet flooring gives this studio a warmth, comfort and elegance & the super comfortable box spr
neighborhood_overview:
The lake is just 3 mins away!

The "Seefeld" district is attractive for people who love city life, nature and the lake and is ideally located in Zurich's central banking and administrative district - just a few minutes' walk from the lake. As the most popular district for living and working, for leisure, culture and recreation, Seefeld is at the top of the agenda. Here you will find numerous neighbourhood shops, a wide range of restaurants from trendy to gourmet, fashionable boutiques, galleries and countless local recreational opportunities.

name: Your Urban Jungle Q-Station
description:
Spacious (70m2) and modern industrial style urban jungle apartment that was newly built in 2019. It is located in Zurich's Kreis 6, merely a 15 minutes journey to Bahnhofstrasse. Zurich's beautiful Irchelpark and Käferberg are just a five minutes walk away.

The flat has a spacious living room with a couch that can be converted to a spacious bed as well as a seperate bedroom. The kitchen is equipped with all amenities you need to cook, including a coffee machine.

name: Cozy apartment in Wiedikon. Great location.
description:
Cozy and bright apartment in the nice neighborhood of "Wiedikon".

Great for home office, as a base to explore the city and Switzerland. You will feel at home in this apartment.

The space
Quiet and spacious bedroom with 160x200 bed.

Big bright living room can be used for working: includes massive whiteboard, 4K beamer, Nvidia Shield (Netflix, etc.) with Controller and on demand I can get a second screen for your laptop.

Big 3D Map of Switzerland and some hiking books (german) if you plan any hiking trips in Switzerland.

All rooms have Tradfri Lightning.

Other things to note
There is a church close by but the bedroom is faced away and with closed windows it should not be an issue. Additionally there are some free fresh earplugs beside the bed to be used.
neighborhood_overview:
Lots of cafes / restaurants / ice cream parlors and bars within 2min walking distances.

Idaplatz is around the corner for that italian feeling.

Bus stop 1min walking distance.

Super market 5min walking distance.

name: Cozy, central room at the heart of Zurich city!
description:
We are renting a cozy room in our centrally-located 3.5 room apartment :) Enjoy Zurich city life and recharge with a glass of wine on our green balcony!
- Walking distance to Zurich city center and the lake
- Proximity to the Zurich party scene (e.g. Supermarket Club 10 min by bus)
The apartment has a shared kitchen, balcony with a garden view, washing machine and a dryer. You can enjoy an evening in our urban garden and join us for breakfast :)

The space
We are pet-friendly.
Smoking is allowed on both balconies.
You can use our urban garden (200 sqm with a sitting area) for free.
We serve breakfast (tea / coffee, eggs, toast, Swiss cheese, oatmeal and home-made jam) for additional 10 CHF per person.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located next to a big shopping gallery (Sihlcity) and 10 min away from Bahnhofstrasse, Zurich's main shopping street.
There are many cafes (Joe and the Juice, Starbucks) and restaurants (Bederhof, Vapiano, Indian & Chinese diner) close by.
Beautiful old roman baths spa including a rooftop pool (Hüerlimann Areal) located within 5 min walking distance.

Grosszügige 1.5 Zimmer Wohnung mit Balkon an hervorragender Lage im hippen Wiedikon Viertel. Die Lage ist zentral und doch ruhig. Restaurants, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in Gehweite.

name: Luxurious & quiet , APT w balcony/ garden view
description:
Elegant and comfortable 1 bedroom apartment with a lovely balcony with views into the greens. The location is very tranquil and quiet, yet incredibly central with excellent transport links. A variety of shops and restaurants are nearby​.

The apartment has recently been renovated and re-furnished it includes high-speed wifi, dishwasher and a fully equipped kitchen.

It's on the third floor (no elevator).

The space
The apartment has one bedroom and a separate dining/living room, brand new kitchen and bathroom, two balconies (one small outside the kitchen, the other outside the living room with seating possibility)

The bedroom contains a kingsize boxspring bed (180cm x 200cm) and a built in wardrobe.

Guest access
Entire space.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on a quiet street in Wollishofen, yet very central. The closest tram station is called "Wollishoferplatz", about 5 min walking distance. To reach Zurich main station (HB) there is a direct tram (nr.7), that leaves every 8 minutes. Right next to the station is a little Bakery called Hausamann, they sell extremely delicious mini Chocolate- Muffins. The closest Supermarket is just 7 minutes walking distance. The lake is only 12 min away for a refreshing swim during the summer month or a beautiful walk alongside in the cooler times of the year.

name: Herrliche möbilierte Loftwohnung zu vermieten
description:
Möbilierte herrliche Loftwohnung von 85qm mit hohen Räumen von 3m für den ganzen Monat September 2020 zu vermieten.
Ein Parkplatz in der Tiefgarage.

The space
Die herrliche helle Loftwohnung hat 85qm. Hohe Räume von 3m geben dieser Wohnung den speziellen Touch.
Hier zu wohnen bedeutet am prallen Leben teilzunehmen.In nächster Nähe zu Ihrer Loft finden Sie alles, was Sie fürs tägliche Leben brauchen –und noch viel mehr. Ob einkaufen im Letzipark oder Abendessen im japanisches oder koreanisches Trendrestaurants, alles ist zu Fuss in wenigen Minuten erreichbar. Und mit der Tramhaltestelle (Käppeli) unmittelbar vor der Haustür, ist auch z.B. der Paradeplatz nur 15 Minuten entfernt.

name: **Sweet modern flat in the city center of Zurich**
description:
***Sweet modern flat right in the city center of Zurich***

5 minutes walk to the main station, to the old town where you can find plenty of bars + restaurants. Many tram lines at our doorstep (Haldenegg). The living area is bathed with sunlight and opens on the guest room to create a larger area. We have a small balcony overlooking a courtyard & sunny most of the day and for dinner/apero time. The master bedroom is quiet as it gives on a small one-way street. We look forward to welcoming you!

The space
We made our home cosy and comfortable, with light touch of design & decoration, and green plants. We have a special comfy mattress in the master bedroom, which we hope you'll enjoy as much as we do.
neighborhood_overview: We're right by the old town (Niederdorf) where most touristic sights are located and reachable on-foot. Furthermore, we're also conveniently close to the main train station so you can go for a day trip to the mountains or another city (Bern, Basel, Luzern, St. Gallen)

description:
The flat has 2 bedrooms and there is space for up to 4 people. It's perfect for small groups and families and it's located very centrally in the district of Oerlikon. It's well connected to the train main station, the city center as well as the airport. Hallenstadion, Thater 11 and Messe are within walking distance from the apartment.

Guest access
The apartment is on the ground floor and has two bedrooms: One room with a 140cm-doublebed and one room with 2 single beds. The living room has a sofabed - that room can also be used as a bedroom. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is a coffee machine and the basic cookingtools.

Other things to note
You can write us via Airbnb App
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a calm neighbourhood close to Bahnhof Oerlikon (10 min. by train to Zürich main station and 10 min to the airport). name: Chic Boutique Studio by the opera & Bellevue
description:
This boutique studio apartment is fully furnished with modern, luxurious and chic furnitures and accessories like with Santa & Cole Lamps, Casamilano pieces and Tom Ford accessoires. Our concept is to offer a state-of-the-art apartment for a affordable price. It’s about give our guests pleasure and make them feel good at home.

Our ideal guest is someone who likes and appreciates design, is international, open-minded, cultivated, has excellent manners, a successful career and disposable income.

Guest access
Entertainment

• WIFI with unlimited high speed internet
• Samsung flatscreen smart tv 32“


Living Space

• a very comfortable box-spring bed for two persons (140x200) with pillows and nice white bed linen and
• two bedside tables
• a lounge chair
• a coffee table and chairs
• commodes, lamps, a mirror, a fan/ ventilator and home accessoires


Bathroom

• bath
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a one of the most beautiful and so most desirable areas of Zurich in walking distance to the lake, the opera, Bellevue, the old town and the Bahnhofstrasse/ Paradeplatz. It’s very close of lot’s of cool cafés, bars, clubs, restaurants, galleries, concept stores, fashion boutiques and more. The area is quite and green and just a few minutes away from the vibrant city center with interesting international, open-minded and cultivated people. Also the public transportation brings you within a few minutes to all spots of the town wether it’s the prestigious shopping street Bahnhofstrasse, the old town or the lake. To the main station it takes 10min and to the airport about 30min.
host_about:
My name is Rafa, I am passionate traveller myself and I speak fluently English, German, Italian and Spanish. My interests and hobbies are  football, tennis, fitness, boxing, running, nature, travelling, culture, philosophy, interior architecture, fashion, photography and film.

I hope my short description allows you to immagine me a bit :-).

name: Luxurious, quiet & cosy studio APT w garden view
description:
Elegant and comfortable studio apartment with a lovely garden view into the greens. The location is very tranquil and quiet, yet incredibly central with excellent transport links. A variety of shops and restaurants are nearby​. The apartment is newly renovated and re-furnished it includes high-speed wifi, dishwasher and a fully equipped kitchen. It's on the first floor (no elevator).

The space
The apartment has one bedroom/living room and brand new kitchen and bathroom.

The bedroom/living room contains a kingsize boxspring bed (180cm x 200cm), a comfortable sofa.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on a quiet street in Wollishofen, yet very central. The closest tram station is called "Wollishoferplatz", about 5 min walking distance. To reach Zurich main station (HB) there is a direct tram (nr.7), that leaves every 8 minutes. Right next to the station is a little Bakery called Hausamann, they sell extremely delicious mini Chocolate- Muffins. The closest Supermarket is just 7 minutes walking distance. The lake is only 12 min away for a refreshing swim during the summer month or a beautiful walk alongside in the cooler times of the year.

name: Exclusive Loft in in a old factory building
description:
Our cool and comfortable 1 BDRM loft in a old factory building is located on the 2nd floor with elevator. The Loft has an access to a private party room and terrace with a fire place, billiard table and fully equipped kitchen shared with other lofts.

The space
The loft is equipped with all basic necessities :-)
The whole furnish is luxury standards. The Bed is extremely comfortable an made by Schlossatelier Zürich. You will also have a TV with Netflix and more than 300 channels if you decide to have a cozy evening at home.

Die Unterkunft
Located on the 2nd floor of the building, the apartment is discrete and well protected from outside noises. The building itself is located in a new builded residential area and is served with direct connections to the main station, the lake and other points of interest.
The Loft is spacious enough for you to feel at home and relax after a long day of visiting Zurich and its surroundings.

It's a beautiful and convenient location and perfect for your city trip getaway.

The space
Diese schöne Altbauwohnung liegt im Herzen vom Seefeld und ist sehr gut erschlossen. Tram 2, 4 und Bus 912 halten vor der Haustüre. Es gibt ein Coop und Migros 1 Minute zu Fuss erreichbar. Du kannst dich über tolle Restaurants, Cafes und Bars in unmittelbarer Nähe freuen. Natürlich ist ein Highlight der See der zu Fuss in einigen Minuten erreichbar ist.

Guest access
Privates WC und Waschbecken wird nicht mitbenutzt. Badezimmer (Bad, WC und zwei Waschbecken), Küche und Wohnzimmer werden mitbenutzt.

Other things to note
Ideal für Städtetrips, Businesstrips aber auch Familienreis
neighborhood_overview: Das Seefeld ist wunderschön, mit prächtigen Altbauwohnungen, vielen Restaurants, Cafes, Bars und Boutiquen und sehr gut erschlossen. Es fahren viele Trams und Busse und zu Fuss ist man schnell im Wald oder am See. Ob für  Familien oder Singles, dieses Quartier hat alles was man wünscht und mehr!
host_about: I enjoy sports like scuba diving, yoga, skiing/snownoarding and swimming preferably outdoors in nature. I love swimming in the Zurich lake!

name: Room in old-town home - highest private rooftop!
description:
This unique apartment is located at the very heart of Zurich, on top of stunning Lindenhof Hill, where the city was founded by the Romans.
The historic house (THE tourist-picture spot in town) features the highest rooftop terrace in the city center, with an uncomparable 360degrees view of the whole city and the lake.

Unlike many new apartments in Zurich, this place still has the charm of a classic old-town home, which matches perfectly with the hip, bohemian-style interior.

The space
Your private room is equipped with a Queen Size Bed by the famous Swiss Brand "Elite", the Rolls-Royce of Bed Manufacturers.
A design desk serves as your working space and through the window, you look out into the historic alley and can peek into the garden of the adjacent monastery while the morning sun welcomes you.

You will be sharing the common spaces, a large living room with a beautiful view directly into the Lindenhof Parc, a dining room wi
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is literally at the best location a Zurich visitor can enjoy.
The famous ViCafé Brand has a cute little outlet right in the same building, for your coffee-lovers out there.

In the Lindhof Parc, you will witness Chess and Boule players enjoying their day, and see other tourists on their walks, snapping pictures of the place where you're staying at ;)

The river Limmat is right next to the house, behind the adjacent monastery building. There you can walk along the water by the beautiful old-town promenade with shops and cafés all the way to the lake, which is 10 minutes on foot.

To experience Zurich, this is THE BEST area to be in.
host_about: Austrian, loves to travel, has a super cool dog and his happy to share his place with other travellers when he's not around.

name: Beautiful Studio in Wipkingen, Interior Design ♥♥
description:
Ein sehr schönes und helles Studio mit hohem Standard. Die Lage ist perfekt, 5 Minuten zur Autobahn oder 5 Minuten zu Fuss zum Zug (Bahnhof Zürich Wipkingen), die Bushaltestelle in unmittelbarer Nähe. 35m², im Parterre, Parkplatz (optional) direkt vor der Haustüre. Ideal für Kurzaufenthalte oder längere Aufenthaltsdauer. Das Studio hat einen separaten Eingang, ein gedeckter Sitzplatz gehört dazu. Zum Hof hin sehr ruhig, auf Strassenseite hört man tagsüber den Verkehr etwas.

The space
Der gehobene Ausbaustandard bietet viel Wohnqualität auf kleinem Raum. Ein grosszügiges Bad mit Dusche und Bodenheizung bietet reichlich Platz, die Küche steht wie ein Sideboard in der Raummitte. Ein sehr grosser TV Screen lässt sich bequem hinter einem grossen Spiegel hervorziehen und bietet Kino-Atmosphäre im Bett. Viele massgefertigte Design Details lassen sich entdecken. Das rote Sofa lässt sich zu zwei Betten ausziehen. Ein zusätzliches Kinderbett ist auch vorhanden.
neighborhood_overview: Das Studio befindet sich im Stadtteil "Wipkingen". Ab und zu hört man den Begriff "Hipkingen" – was in einem Wort die Entwicklung der letzten 10-15 Jahre zusammenfasst. Das Quartier hat sich stark gewandelt und ist bei vielen Jungen und Familien sehr beliebt. Grünräume, Wald und vor allem der Fluss "Limmat" mit seinen Flussbädern ist sehr nahe gelegen. Gleichzeitig ist in den letzten Jahren ein grosses Angebot an kleinen Läden und Cafés entstanden. Dank dem Bahnhof Wipkingen ist das Gebiet sehr gut eingebunden und die Strecke zum Flughafen dauert tatsächlich nur 10 Minuten im Zug.
host_about:
We love design. 

My wife Bettina is running her architecture firm in Zurich. I personally have a design studio, named Klauser Lienhard ( (Hidden by Airbnb) > you will find it) where we work within the realms of product design, interior design and exhibition design.

The studio was completely rebuilt (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and hopefully shows our goal to create a very comfortable, compact and beautiful space with many nice details.

Unser Tiny House ist eine idyllische Oase in einem grossen, traumhaft schönen Garten, Eine Insel der Ruhe, nur zwei km vom HB Zürich . Das kleine Haus mit separatem Eingang bietet ein bequemes Doppelbett mit dicker Matratze, einen Tisch mit zwei Stühlen, und eine Garderobe.

name: Sunny terraced loft close to main station
description:
This gem in the heart of Zurich is the perfect location for anyone visiting or living temporarily in Zurich. Strategically in the quintessential residential area of Sonnegstrasse.

– 5 min walking to Oberer Letten (Limmat river bathing area)
-10 min walking to the main station (Zurich HB) and the Bahnhofstrasse finance and shopping area
- 7 min to the historic Niederdorf
– 15 min walking to Langstrasse (clubs), Zuriberg and Zoo
- 20 min walk to post-industrial Hardbrücke, the Opera and Lake

The space

It comes equipped with a grill to enjoy sunny Zurich at its fullest. Its a few steps from the famous Stocker Backery for your fresh daily bread and Azzuro neighborhood shop with delicious italian treats and exclusive wines and liquor.
neighborhood_overview: It is a few steps from the famous Stocker bakery for your fresh daily bread and Azzuro neighbourhood shop with delicious Italian treats and exclusive wines and liquor. On the next corner is a small grocery store for your convenience. On warmer days you can walk to the Oberer Letten bathing area on the Limmat river for a run or to enjoy with friends in the cafes on the water's edge. Continue walking from there to visit the national museum, Landesmuseum, and reach the glamorous Bahnhofstrasse (Station Street) walking just 10 minutes from the flat. One of the best central neighbourhoods in Zurich.

Little food shop in the building.

name: Central 3 rooms flat close to ETH and university
description:
The apartment has 3 rooms and there is space for up to 4 people. It's perfect for a couple or families and it's located very centrally in Zürich city, very close to the University and ETH. Well connected public transportation and the city center is reachable by walking distance or 5 min by tram.
Next to the proprety they are building a house, so it's possible that during the they there will be some noise.

The space
The apartment is on the groundfloor and has two bedrooms: One room with a 160cm-doublebed and a balcony, the orther bedroom also have a 160cm-doublebed and a crib. The kitchen is fully equipped, has a dining table and a sofabed. There is a coffee machine, a dish washer and the basic cookingtools. The toilet and the shower are separated.

Guest access
The whole apartment is at your disposal
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located close to the university (less than 10 min. by tram to Zürich main station). Several sights and attractions, restaurants, bars and museum are within walking distance. The old town is reachable in 20 min. walking or 10 min. by the tram/bus. It's a very quiet but central neighbourhood.

name: Cosy beautiful bedroom in Zurich Center

Beautiful bedroom in the city center of Zurich. Only 5 minutes by tram to main train station, 7 minutes by tram to old town. Vibrant area with numerous restaurants, bars and clubs around the corner. You can easily walk to all the touristic areas of Zurich. The apartment is quiet and calm at night.

This is 1 private room in the apartment, it is not the complete apartment.
Please send enquiry message for long term rental to get better price.

Fully equipped kitchen where you can cook whatever you like. In the city center with all city attractions around the corner, so the location could not be better.

host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

description:
Practical studio in Zurich Oerlikon, right next to the train station.

Very well connected to Zurich Main Station and Zurich Airport (both only 10 minutes away with the train, tram or bus).

The studio has 40m2 living space and is located on the third floor of the building (a lift is available). Bathroom with bathtub. Own washing machine and dryer (not shared!) in the basement.

It is furnished and the kitched is completely equipped with microwave, oven, dishwasher. Weekly cleaning included.

The space
The apartment is lovely furnished with queen-size boxspring bed, sofa, dining table and chairs, wardrobe, TV. Kitched is fully equipped.
host_about:
We offer furnished apartments in Zurich and Wallisellen.
Studio, 1 or 2 bedroom apartment. I have the best offer for you.
All flats are modern and fully equipped and if you stay longer than one week, a weekly cleaning service is included. Of course you can (almost) always contact me during your stay. Request your offer now! :)

name: Comfy, Bright at one step of city center
description:
Comfy and broad daylight apartment. Easy access to any part of the city with public transports almost at the door.

The space
A two bedroom apartment with natural daylight at all times of the day. It can host up to 6 people and is fully equipped with everything you need for your stay at Zürich.

The apartment does have an unfortunate detail : the bathroom is rather unconventional as it was built in a way that no common person would think. If you look at the picture, you will see that you need to pass the sink and the toilet in order to enter the shower. Strange yes, but definitely original :-) We always keep it clean but bear in mind it is very small. We are truly sorry for this, we believe the architect might not have been a bathroom person as it is narrow and just made to do your toiletries and nothing more; but the rest of the apartment makes up for it!

The building itself is located on the corner of two streets and thus has a continual acc
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a old residential building which might be possible to ear noises from outside, however not so loud.
The neighbourhood is quiet and safe even at late night.
The aparment is located on the 3rd floor and there's no lift, the stairs aren't steep but we prefer you to be aware of this beforehand.
host_about:
I love to travel and be welcome at the places that I visit, like that since 2015 that I'm helping Niels with his properties I try to have them the way I would like to be hosted. 

I'm very simple and happy person, always improving myself and my work, so any suggestions are welcome. 
I will continue travelling with my kids and from the free time in leisure take some ideas and improvements to host you even better.

name: spacious old-town home - highest private rooftop!
description:
This unique apartment is located at the very heart of Zurich, on top of stunning Lindenhof Hill, where the city was founded by the Romans.
The historic house (THE tourist-picture spot in town) features the highest private rooftop terrace (!!) in the city center, with an uncomparable 360degrees view of the whole city and the lake.

Unlike many new apartments in Zurich, this place still has the charm of a classic old-town home, which matches perfectly with the hip, bohemian-style interior.

The space
From one bedroom you look out into the historic alley and can peek into the garden of the adjacent monastery while the morning sun welcomes you.

The large living room has a beautiful view directly into the Lindenhof Parc.
The dining room with a big wooden table seats 8.
Small and cozy bathroom with tub and toilet.
A fully equipped kitchen.

The most stunning feature is the enormous rooftop terrace, offering a
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is literally at the best location a Zurich visitor can enjoy. The famous ViCafé Brand has a cute little outlet right in the same building, for your coffee-lovers out there.
In the Lindenhof Parc, you will witness Chess and Boule players enjoying their day, and see other tourists on their walks, snapping pictures of the place where you're staying at ;)

The river Limmat is right next to the house, behind the adjacent monastery building. There you can walk along the water by the beautiful old-town promenade with shops and cafés all the way to the lake, which is 10 minutes on foot.

To experience the best of Zurich, this is THE BEST area to be in.
host_about: Austrian, loves to travel, has a super cool dog and his happy to share his place with other travellers when he's not around.

name: Brand New Studio in the Heart of Zurich old town
description:
Brand new magnificent studio right in the heart of old town.
Perfect for both tourists and business travelers.
This is the best location in the whole city where all of Zurich comes alive with its buzzing downtown activities.
All the major restaurants, bars, coffee shops, museums of the city are around. The views of the city are breathtaking from across the street. All the city attractions are within walking distance. Please send enquiry message for long term rental to get better price.

The space
The studio is on the 1st floor in absolute center of the city.
Zurich is right at your feet here.
The studio has sparkling clean private bathroom and a kitchenete where you can cook for yourself.
There is a flat TV which you can enjoy.
neighborhood_overview:
The most central location in the city of Zurich.
Just walk few minutes and you will reach all of Zurich attractions.
Main station: 4 minutes walk.
Bahnhofstrasse: 5 minutes walk
Limmat River: Across the street
host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

name: Gemütliches Zürich Home nahe See mit Ausblick
description:
Diese gemütliche und helle Wohnung oberhalb von Seefeld befindet sich nur 10 Geh-Minuten vom Züri See entfernt. Man ist sehr gut angebunden und braucht ca 10 Minuten mit dem Bus zum Hauptbahnhof. Die Wohnung eignet sich ideal für 3 Personen, wo Sie sich im Kingsize Room und im Einzelzimmer so richtig wohlfühlen können. Vom Balkon aus können Sie die wunderschönen Sonneuntergänge Zürichs geniessen. Die Küche ist gut ausgestattet und Waschmaschine und Trockner stehen ebenfalls zur Verfügung.

The space
Es gibt einen Balkon von dem man über die Stadt sehen kann und den Sonnenuntergang. Es gibt 2 Klos und die Waschmaschine und Trockner ist auf dem selben Stock wie die Wohnung. Es gibt aber keine Störung durch Geräusche von den Maschinen.
neighborhood_overview: Es gibt 3 Familien im Haus, deshalb bitte Abends ruhig im Hausflur verhalten.
host_about: Ich bin aus München uhrsprünglich. Bin Medizinischer Masseur seit 3 jahren. Ich reise, Koche, und mache gerne Sport. ich liebe es aktiv zu sein und jeden tag auszunutzen und immer wieder neue erfahrungen zu machen.

name: Old Town Luxury Suite
description:
It is a small quaint luxurious space in the best location in the old town of Zurich.
Walking distance to the famous Church, art galleries and the museum Kunsthaus as well as cafes and restaurants. The house is equipped with everything you need to make you feel at home, safe and very comfortable.

The space
LOCATION,LOCATION,LOCATION!!
There is really no better location during your stay in Zurich than staying in beautiful old town.
The place is equipped with fresh towels, WIFI, water kettle, Coffee machine, microwave and a induction hot plate to cook your own food. The supermarket at the nearby train station Stadelhofen is open Monday till Sunday from 6:AM till 10:PM.
neighborhood_overview:
District 1 is a very elegant part of town being the historic heart of the city which beats on both sides of the Limmat river.
The romantic little streets are lined by guild houses, churches and historic places.
The Old town with cobbled streets is full of cozy bars, traditional Swiss restaurants and art museums like the Kunsthaus.
Iconic churches include the Fraumünster with Chagall and Giacometti stained-glass windows. The luxurious shopping mile Bahnhofstrasse offers chocolate and jewelry stores next to high-end boutiques.
The popular Lindenhof hill offers views across the beautiful Limmat River with its famous promenade.

name: Komfortables Zimmer in City-Nähe (Holiday Inn Zür)
description:
Entspannen Sie im Holiday Inn Zürich-Messe Hotel, gegenüber der Messe Zürich und 10 Taximinuten vom Flughafen Zürich gelegen.

Gratis-WLAN steht Ihnen im gesamten sechsstöckigen Hotel von der Lobby bis in Ihr komfortables Zimmer mit Holzboden zur Verfügung. Die Straßenbahn bringt Sie vom Holiday Inn Zürich-Messe in nur 17 Minuten in das geschäftige Zentrum von Zürich.

The space
Genießen Sie Ihren Aufenthalt im Holiday Inn Zürich - Messe. Gönnen Sie sich eine Ruhepause in Ihrem geschmackvoll eingerichteten Zimmer oder trainieren Sie im Fitnessraum. Später können Sie in der Brasserie Bits & Bites schweizerische Spezialitäten probieren.

You are most welcome to come and stay in my unique apartments in Zurich, which have been prepared with you, the traveller in mind! The apartment will be your home away from home.

Two separate bedrooms with snug double beds, flat screen TV, wardrobe and a working desk provide the necessary privacy. The open kitchen with a dining area is fully fitted with a glass ceramic stove, microwave with baking and grilling options, coffee maker, as well as pans, crockery and cutlery. Ein bequemes Bett für zwei, aufklapp- und wieder zusammenfaltbar. Ein frisch gebrühtet Kaffee, morgens beim Aufstehen. Egal, ob das Müsli am Strand beim Parkplatz steht oder unter alten Bäumen in einem Stadtquartier. Die Küche mit fliessendem Wasser, Gaskocher und diversen Utensilien ergänzt sich mit dem Parkettboden zu einem gemütlichen Innenwohnraum. Klein, aber fein.

The space
Die Lichterkette und die farbigen Vorhänge verzaubern unser Büsli, so dass ihr Abends eine wunderschönen Stimmung habt. 3 Sitze für Mitfahrende. Smartphone ans Radio anschliessbar, für Sound während dem Fahren. Füsse aufs Amaturenbrett legen erlaubt.

description:
Brand new fully-furnished and stylish apartment on the 12th floor of a new condo building, including balcony and parking. It is a 5 mins walk to the tram station where you can comfortably get to the airport in 13 mins and a 5 mins walk to the Hallenstadion where several events take place. You can get to the centre of Zurich within 15-20 mins. This new suburban area hosts several restaurants and bars near by and is becoming a new center within Zurich.

The space
Modern and stylish apartment fully equipped with everything you need to live in it. There is a lovely outdoor patio where you can enjoy the views from the 12th floor as well as a private parking spot in the garage of the condominium (includes electrical charging station).

neighborhood_overview: The condo is located in a new part of Zurich, Oerlikon, which is slowly becoming one of the new centers of Zurich. Within walking distance you have several choices of restaurants, a shopping center, grocery store and bars. In addition there is a large park and walking trail along the river very nearby (great for jogging).

description:
Cosy and smart! – Compact but not petty.

Charming housing space, combined with a large dose of functionality at a great value for money. The best: you have a private terrace to enjoy.

The newly renovated & high quality completed property on 5 floors with elevator is located on an almost traffic-free one-way street and each apartment is accessible via a charming passageway with a view of an unobstructable green meadow. The lake is located 3 mins away.

Need a parking? We have 5 single boxes

The space
This apartment has been designed to get the most out of even the smallest space. Through the clever arrangement of the fully equipped kitchen with large refrigerator, oven & dishwasher in the entrance area, your living, sleeping & working area is extremely cosy and comfortable. neighborhood_overview:
The lake is just 3 mins away!

The "Seefeld" district is attractive for people who love city life, nature and the lake and is ideally located in Zurich's central banking and administrative district - just a few minutes' walk from the lake. As the most popular district for living and working, for leisure, culture and recreation, Seefeld is at the top of the agenda. Here you will find numerous neighbourhood shops, a wide range of restaurants from trendy to gourmet, fashionable boutiques, galleries and countless local recreational opportunities.

neighborhood_overview:
Kreis 7 in Zürich
Der Kreis 7 gilt als Top-Wohnlage Zürichs. Er ist beliebt wegen der Ruhe, des Sonnenscheins und der schönen alten Bauten. Wer am Zürich- oder Adlisberg wohnt, hat hohe Ansprüche. Die Bauten werden gepflegt oder alte Bausubstanz durch Neubauten ersetzt.
Der Wald sowie diverse Parks bieten viel Platz für sportliche Aktivitäten oder für erholsame Stunden.
Für Kinder gibt es einen grossen Robinson-Spielplatz in nächster Nähe. Strand/Badeanstalten und Freibäder sind mit dem ÖV leicht erreichbar.
In der näheren Umgebung können Sie im Migros, Coop oder Denner gemütlich einkaufen oder ein Frühstück im Honold - Confiserie und Bäckerei - geniessen.
