neighborhood_overview: Zürcher Theater Spektakel, an international theater festival ranking among the most important European festivals for contemporary performing arts, is held annually in August on the Landiwiese lakeshore and on the Saffa-Insel. The cultural centre Rote Fabrik is also located in Wollishofen, as well as Lydia Escher's former home, the Villa Belvoir.
host_about: Hi, this is Ilan & Anna from Zurich, since 2010 we call Zurich our home. Please let us know how we may assist you prior to your stay. Happy to host you! Coffee, tea, high speed wifi, towels, fully equipped kitchen,  cable tv & Netflix are included.

name: Studio in the heart of Zurich
description:
The studio is in the centre of Zurich, 5 minutes walking distance to the opera, to the lake and the train station Stadelhofen.
With 23qm ist is small, but it is fully equipped with everything you need.

The space
The studio is in a house with many apartments. You have access to the studio (one room, bathroom and balcony), to a small park behind the house and to a shared room with washing machines.
neighborhood_overview:
The appartment is in a lively neighbourhood in Seefeld, with many bars, cafes and restaurants.
Opera is in 5 min walking distance as well as the lake.

name: Cozy 100m2 flat for 5 travellers with 2 bathrooms
description:
Large flat (100m2) for five travellers with 2 bathrooms. Near Schaffhauserplatz, 7 min by tram to Zurich main station, famous Bahnhofstrasse; Limmat river and vibrant Langstrasse in walking distance. Surrounded by various restaurants, parks & cafés.

The space
The flat has 100m2 with 2 large bed rooms, 2 bath rooms, a dining room connected with the living room, two balconies and a kitchen. Here is an overview about the sleeping rooms: - Two bed rooms with two beds (1.60m) for 4 people (25m2 and 21m2) - Huge and comfortable couch to accommodate the fifth person We will of course provide you with shampoo and shower gels so that it is easier for you to travel. Our kitchen is quite large and fully equipped. In the room you will find more information about the city and of course our WIFI connection. The flat itself is located in an ancient and beautiful building from the 1930's on the second floor without an elevator unfortunately.
neighborhood_overview: It takes only a few steps to get to the restaurants which are located in the neighbourhood. Only two minutes away you can enjoy a cozy brunch at Café des Amis, have a drink at fancy Kafischnaps, get fresh food at the bakery Wüst or at Migros, a coffee at Starbucks around the corner or enjoy italian pasta at La Casa or Scala. Only a short walk away, you easily get to the green and beautiful Irchel Park. Also, if you enjoy the nature and wish to sit at the Limmat river, just walk a few minutes down to the water.
host_about: Open minded world traveler - loves to explore new sports activities around the globe. Hope this Corona thing will end soon. Enjoy your stay in Zürich.
amenities: ["Dedicated workspace", "Essentials", "TV", "Kitchen", "Hair dryer", "Smoke alarm", "Wifi", "Long term stays allowed", "Hangers", "Shampoo", "Iron", "Heating"]

name: Chic & spacious 2-room apartment in hip district 4
description:
The Stylish 2-Room Apartment (65m2) is located in the trendy district 4 with lots of cool restaurants, bars, cafés, cinemas like Grand Cafe Lochergut, Lily‘s, Bebek, Houdini, etc. The neighbourhood with its beautiful and vibrant streets like Bertastrasse, Idaplatz, Langstrasse, etc. is where the day and nightlife of Zurich is going on. The apartment is a stylish yet quiet sanctuary with 2 balconies, one with a garden view and one towards the main street and has ideal public transportation access

The space
The apartment is fully furnished with modern design furniture like a 160x200 cm boxspring-bed (queen size) in the bedroom, a separate living room with a balcony, couch/ sofa bed (fold out 120x200), a big Samsung TV and internet. The kitchen is fully equipped with another balcony that looks out on a beautiful garden. It is equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine, a microwave/ pizza oven, stove and oven, a dishwasher, a coffee table and another table where you ca
host_about:
My name is Rafa, I am passionate traveller myself and I speak fluently English, German, Italian and Spanish. My interests and hobbies are  football, tennis, fitness, boxing, running, nature, travelling, culture, philosophy, interior architecture, fashion, photography and film.

I hope my short description allows you to immagine me a bit :-).

name: Bird's eye view of Zurich
description:
Welcome to our bright modern apartment on the edge of Zurich city center. On the 6th floor of an architectural phenomenon, with stunning 180° views of the Alps and Zurich city. Cosy, clean and spacious, the apartment has an open living, dining and kitchen area, two comfortable sleeping rooms, suitable office space, generous balcony, and two bathrooms. City center is 30 minutes away by foot, or 15 minutes on bus or tram. Many shops and restaurants within walking distance. Wifi, TV etc. provided.

The space
Tastefully decorated, the apartment has every convenience desired for a fulfilling stay in Zurich. The jaw dropping views of the mountains can be enjoyed from every angle, including on the comfy sofa or armchair or from the spacious balcony, even with a blanket in winter.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on the edge of one of Zurich's hippest neighbourhood's, Wiedikon. Easily reachable within walking distance are some of the best bars and restaurant's the city has to offer, ample grocery shopping, pharmacies and other amenities. The apartment overlooks some of the leafiest parks in the city which provide multiple opportunities for getting out in the fresh air. A park with slides for children is situated behind the building and is frequented by local families regularly.
host_about: I'm an Irish guy, living in Zurich. Survive on ideas and music. Keen to provide a good experience, and help people to travel and find their destination.

name: CENTRAL, COZY ROOM in the heart of ZURICH
description:
The flat is super central located, rich of natural light in a quiet neighbourhood.
Bus and tramstation just in front of the house. Connections to the railway are every 5minutes, means only 20min to the airport.
To the city center 10min by public transport.
3min by feet to supermarket, post office, kiosk &co.
Just across the road is a cemetery with a beautiful park.
Restaurants and Bars 5min by public transport, so the Limmat (river), lake15min.

name: Komfortables Zimmer in City Nähe (Holiday Inn Zür)
description:
Entspannen Sie im Holiday Inn Zürich-Messe Hotel, gegenüber der Messe Zürich und 10 Taximinuten vom Flughafen Zürich gelegen.

Gratis-WLAN steht Ihnen im gesamten sechsstöckigen Hotel von der Lobby bis in Ihr komfortables Zimmer mit Holzboden zur Verfügung. Die Straßenbahn bringt Sie vom Holiday Inn Zürich-Messe in nur 17 Minuten in das geschäftige Zentrum von Zürich.

The space
Genießen Sie Ihren Aufenthalt im Holiday Inn Zürich - Messe. Gönnen Sie sich eine Ruhepause in Ihrem geschmackvoll eingerichteten Zimmer oder trainieren Sie im Fitnessraum. Später können Sie in der Brasserie Bits & Bites schweizerische Spezialitäten probieren.

Ihr gemütliches Zimmer im Holiday Inn Zürich-Messe ist mit Holzboden, elektrischen Jalousien und High-Tech ausgestattet. Ihre Emails holen Sie mit gratis WLAN ab, der Flachbildschirmfernseher bietet Pay-per-View Filme.

Sie können einige der Annehmlichkeiten des Holiday Inn Zürich Messe, darunter den Co
neighborhood_overview:
Während ihres Aufenthalts können Gäste des Holiday Inn Zürich Messe beispielsweise Niederdorf (3, 5 km) und FIFA Headquarters (3, 6 km) besuchen, einige der bekanntesten Sehenswürdigkeiten in Zürich. Öffentliche Verkehrsmittel und Geschäfte des täglichen Bedarfs sind einfach zu erreichen.

Das Hotel liegt gegenüber der Zürich Messe, unweit des Bahnhofs Zürich Oerlikon, der Flughafen Zürich ist nur 10 Taximinuten entfernt. Fußläufig entfernt befindet sich die Tram-Haltestelle Messe/Hallenstadion, von der aus Sie mit der Nr. 11 in 17 Minuten ohne Umsteigen am Hauptbahnhof Zürich und im Stadtzentrum sind.

Geldautomat: 0,2 km
Fitnessstudio: Mini-Gym im Haus

Friseur: 0,8 km
Drogeriemarkt: 0,8 km

name: *Low pricing* Very spacious and quite apartment in the middle of Zurich (Apartment C)
description:
***VIEW NOW IN 360° MODE / COPY THE LINK BELOW***

https://www.remotely.tours/app/property/5fa03b718c20420017ca8b47

A wonderful spacious apartment, well furnished offering all amenities you need during your stay in Zurich for 1-5 guests. A supermarket is located in the same building and the tram stop "hottingerplatz" from where you are just minutes away from "kunsthaus/museum of arts" is litterally in front of the house. Bakeries, coffee, restaurants and pharmacy are across the street. The apartment is located in one of the posh areas of Zurich and surrounded by many old and nice townhouses great for nice walks.

The space
As you enter the house there is a big elevator to get to the apartment. Opening the apartments door you will have a entry area, the dining area and couch/tv area in front of you in an open space. There are big windows and a nice view. A balcony invites for a glas of wine or a cold beer during the warmer month. The bedrooms
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in a wealthy area of Zurich. The apartment is located to the small ancient "village center" which offers all daily supplies you need. On foot you are in "niederdorf/old town zurich" in about 10min/1km). Museums like the museum of art or Kulturama (museum of culture) are in walking distance. Also theaters and the lake of zurich are just a walk away. I strongly recommend to have a walk to Kafi Paradiesli, Hofstrasse 19, 8032 Zürich, a very nice sweet little hidden coffee place with a small but good menu.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

- big bedroom (18 m2) furnished with a big wardrobe, bed, table and chairs
- living room (20m2) furnished with table, chair and shelves but no couch

Appartment is simply furnished (bed, big wardrobe, tables & chairs, shelves, lamps, curtains).
Bed linen, towels and kitchenware are provided.

name: Standard Einzelzimmer
description: Standard Einzelzimmer – Diese stilvoll renovierten 14m² grossen Zimmer bieten den idealen Komfort für Einzelreisende. Die Zimmer sind ausgestattet mit 120 cm breiten Swissflex-Betten, einem funktionalen Arbeitsbereich, einer Dusche und verfügen über Parkettboden.
host_about:
Das Lady's First Hotel begrüßt Sie in ruhiger Lage in einem Gebäude aus dem 19. Jahrhundert, nur 100 m vom Zürichsee entfernt und in der Nähe mehrerer Straßenbahn- und Bushaltestellen. Das Opernhaus Zürich, der Platz Bellevue sowie verschiedene Restaurants und Cafés befinden sich im Umkreis von 500 m.

name: hotel marta – Doppelzimmer im Herzen von Zürich
description:
Das Hotel Marta wurde im Jahr 2010 renoviert und bietet preiswerte Zimmer im Zentrum von Zürich, nur 5 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt. WLAN nutzen Sie im gesamten Gebäude kostenfrei.

Alle Zimmer im Marta Hotel verfügen über ein eigenes Bad und einen Flachbild-Kabel-TV. Im gesamten Hotel darf nicht geraucht werden.

Das B&B Hotel Marta liegt im bezaubernden Stadtteil Niederdorf. Die berühmte Bahnhofstrasse und den Zürichsee erreichen Sie nach einem 10-minütigen Spaziergang.

name: Charming & quiet studio in the heart of Zürich
description:
Experience Zürich like a local in my charming and fully furnished studio. It offers a double bed for a perfect night's sleep, a smart TV and high-speed wifi. The studio also has a fully equipped kitchen and a washing machine.

Located between the Limmatplatz & Museum für Gestaltung tram stops. The trendy street "Langstrasse" with many restaurants/bars/cafes within walking distance. 15 minutes on foot to the main train station (Zürich HB).

The studio is not suitable for infants/children.

The space
You will receive your own key and have full access to the studio. There is also an elevator in the building.

The studio is cleaned and disinfected before your check-in and the same thing is done after you leave. There is no daily housekeeping or change of towels and sheets.

name: Am Fusse des Züribergs, ruhig und zentral
description:
Die Wohnung ist direkt am Schwamendigerplatz. Man kann mit dem Tram 7 in 15 Minuten beim Hauptbahnhof sein oder man kann auch mit Tram 9 direkt in 20 Minuten an Zürichsee fahren. Wir sind ausserdem auch sehr nah beim Flughafen. Vom Oerlikon kann man hinfahren. Das Zimmer ist privat. Hinter dem Gebäude beginnt Zürichberg, welcher wunderbar ist, wenn man wandern gehen möchte.
We live very close to the city centre. With tram you can be in 15 min directly in city centre. It is a private room.

name: THE place to stay in Zürich: Boutique Hotel NI-MO
description: Das Boutique Hotel NI-MO befindet sich im Zürcher Seefeld und liegt nur ca. 200 m von der Seepromenade des Zürcher Sees und dem Opernhaus entfernt. Die Zimmer verfügen alle über WLan, TV sowie Kaffeemaschinen und überzeugen durch ihren modernen, individuellen Charme. Der Clou dabei: hier gibt es keine Zimmer-Nummern, sondern jedes Zimmer hat einen Namen. Das ist einer von vielen Gründen, der jeden Aufenthalt im NI-MO zum einzigartigen Erlebnis werden lässt.

this beautiful apartment is situated in the prestige district of Wollishofen, just across the street from the famous Zurich lake.
it is close by to the wollishofen railway station, as well as bus, and trams, which will get you to anywhere in zurich.
All new renovated with stunning finishes. Exposed wood & Modern Appliances.
Enjoy a huge common area, a spacious balcony, and one designated parking spot.
This space is truly one of a kind.

a cozy 4 rooms apartment. consisting 3 bedrooms+ one living room + 1 toilet with bath, and one toilet. Wash machine & Dryer in the unit!

name: Modern industrial loft (64m2) in central Zurich
description:
Modern and minimal one-bedroom loft in a newly-built building between Seefeld and Hirslanden. Located on 2nd floor, with elevator entrance right into the apartment, this 64 sqm loft has a large living room and equipped open-space kitchen.
All furniture is brand new (bought Oct '20) and barely used.
10-min tram ride away from city center, with tram stop right outside the building, and 15-min walk from lake of Zurich.

The space
The loft has an industrial feel, with high floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room, allowing one to enjoy the beautiful view of the neighborhood filled with trees.
The living room has a very comfortable large couch with coffee table, and a 65-inch TV (including Netflix access) with an extra soundbar. The blinds in the living room are automatic and are controlled by a button at the entrance of the living room.
The kitchen is fully equipped, with oven, ceramic stoves, fridge and freezer, Nespresso machine, dishes, glass
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is ideal for long walks as it is located in a beautiful residential area. There is a tram stop outside the building, offering uninterrupted access to the city center (10-min direct ride, without change needed). The loft is 10-mins walking distance from the center of the upscale Seefeld neighborhood, with several great cafes, restaurants and shops. It is also 15-mins walking distance from Zurich's beautiful lakeside.
There are several super markets in the surrounding area, with the closest one just 2-mins away by foot.

name: Basic room in a central location (district 4)
description:
Basic room in a modern and nice apartment in one of the hippest neighborboods of Zurich (Kreis 4). Close to restaurants, shops, bars, nightlife etc. Very good public transportation connections.

Because my flatmate moved out, I am subletting the room for a short period until I find a new flatmate. The basic room is 13m2 and comes with a bed and a matress. Fresh linens and towels will be provided.

The bed has four drawers where you can put things.

Fast WIFI available.

The space
The apartment is in the top floor of the building (there is an elevator!) and has a large open kitchen with a dining table. Feel free to use the kitchen, the refrigerator etc.
The bathroom is close to your room and will be shared.

The apartment is located in the area known as Kreis 4 (district 4), which is one of the hippest areas of the city, especially if it comes to nightlife. There are many restaurants, bars, little shops etc. nearby. The

name: professionell geführtes Hostel in der Altstadt
description:
Das Hostel ist mitten in der Altstadt von Zürich. Gäste schätzen die zentrale Lage und die dazugehörige Wüste Bar im Erdgeschoss.

Im zweiten Stock hat es einen Aufenthaltsraum mit einer kleinen Küche, die Mikrowelle, Kühlschrank, Wasserkocher und Backofen hat um etwas Kleines zum Essen zuzubereiten. Tee und Instantkaffee können dort den ganzen Tag gratis getrunken werden.

Es besteht die Möglichkeit am An- bzw. Abreisetag das Gepäck gratis einzuschließen.

The space
Das Hostel empfängt seit 2016 Gäste in Zürich im ehemaligen Hotel Otter. Das Hostel bietet einen Gemeinschaftsraum mit gratis Kaffee und Tee, einem Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle und Backofen. Es hat Schliessfächer um das Gepäck vor der Anreise oder nach Abreise sicher zu lagern. Die Bettwäsche wird zur Verfügung gestellt. Bitte selber die Betten beziehen und beim auschecken an die Rezeption bringen

Guest access
Mit der Schlüsselkarte kommt der Gast 24 h ins Hoste
neighborhood_overview: Die Sehenswürdigkeiten von Zürich sind in Gehdistanz vom Hostel und der Zürichsee ist nur gerade 200 Meter entfernt. Das Kunsthaus, sowie das Opernhaus können bequem in 5 Minuten zu Fuss erreicht werden. Auch das legendäre Café Odeon ist nur um die Ecke.

description:
***VIEW NOW IN 360° MODE / COPY THE LINK BELOW***

https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=ijHTEdRYmGr

A spacious apartment with a basic and functional furnishing, offering all amenities you need during your short stay in Zurich for 1-3 guests. The apartment is located in the heart of the old town of Zurich and therefore public transport, various restaurants and coffees, supermarkets and shops are everywhere you look!

host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

description:
Comfortable studio right in the heart of Zurich city accessible by Lift/elevator.
Perfect for both tourists and business travelers.
This is the best location in the whole city where all of Zurich comes alive with its buzzing downtown activities.
All the major restaurants, bars, coffee shops, museums of the city are around. All the city attractions are within walking distance as you are in the most central part of the city.
Please send enquiry message for long term rental to get better price.

The space
The studio is in absolute center of the city.
No need to climb stairs, just use the lift/elevator.
Zurich is right at your feet here.

There is also a laundry machine downstairs in case you want to wash your clothes.

host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

name: Luxury Penthouse, 180° view Alps, Lake & Zurich
description:
Designer loft with surrounding glass walls, in the heart of the Zurich-berg. Very likely that you've never seen such iconic architecture. The loft features a stunning view of more than 180° over Zurich, the Zurich lake, and the Swiss Alps. 1 comfortable bedroom with an equally stunning view. 1 bathroom with spacious shower. The closest Tram Toblerplatz is 6 min walking away, the tram takes 12 minutes to the Zurich main station (Hauptbahnhof). A parking space may be available on request.

The space
Minimalistic interior, with the bare minimum needed to enjoy the undivided attention of the surrounding view. Lights are dimmable Philips Hue based and can be easily switched on and off altogether. The bed mattress is currently without a frame. The provided Wifi is based on 1 Gbit symmetric Fiber Internet with exceptionally low latency (about 2ms to Google).
neighborhood_overview: Zurich-berg is a residential upper class area with many artists, designers and professors. The serene calmness, which is yet so close to the city centre is the perfect spot to relax after a long day or night out in the city.
host_about: I consider myself a direct, open, and fun loving character. Traveling is one of the best things to free your mind and learn about new people and cultures. I love practicing sports (swimming and bicycling) and only know work-life, work-life balance doesn't exist if you love your work.

name: Sunny & Stylish Apartment 20min from city center
description:
We offer a very nice, sunny and modern apartment in Zurich, inside a 3 family house recently renovated. It's on a very quiet location in a blind street at the golden coast of Zurich (Witikon). The bus stop that leads from and to the main station (Zurich HB) is 250m away, but if you prefer driving, we have a free and spacious parking for large cars. ALDI, Denner & Migros supermarkets are 280m away in a shopping mall and if you like jogging or nature, the forest it's at the end of the street.

The space
The apartment was recently renovated, we have a modern induction kitchen and a bathroom with a Geberit toiled/bidet plus a jacuzzi type bathtub for your enjoinment. There are two balconies, one looking forward to the lake and the other at the back of the kitchen. We have king beds(180x200cm) in all rooms. There is coffee and tea on fully equipped kitchen at your disposal. The living room has a smart TV box with Swiss channels, also a dining table for 6 persons.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Witikon one of the most exclusive neighbourhoods in Zurich at the east side of the Lake, better known as the Golden Coast, because the sun reaches all year long. Close we have the Zurich Zoo and the Dolder Bath & Ice Skating. The woods are just at the end of the street and three supermarkets (ALDI, Migros and Denner) are on a shopping mall 280 meters away from the house.

The east side of the lake offers several distractions if you like art and culture, close is The Kunsthaus (Art Museum), The Bellerive Museum, The Tram Museum, The Corbusier House, The China Garden, the Opera House and of course many spots at the lake where you can take a swim or go for a picnic in summer.
host_about: We are Jürg and Valeria, we like to travel a around the world and know very well what are the amenities everybody seeks on vacation rental. We like to pay attention to details and try our best to keep the apartments clean and tidy for our guests. We are looking forward to be your host and give you a pleasant stay.

This stylish building comprises 37 rooms spread over 4 floors of which 33 are doubles and 4 are singles. Further facilities include laundry and room services as well as public Internet access. Car parking facilities are also available.

name: GOLD
description:
Das stilvoll eingerichtete Zimmer befindet sich in einer sehr hellen Wohnung die praktisch gelegen ist. Die schöne Altbauwohnung liegt im Kreis 3 beim Goldbrunnenplatz und besitzt zwei Balkone. Das Zimmer ist sehr funktional eingerichtet: neben einem Doppelbett gibt es ein Desk mit Stuhl für ein Arbeitsplatz, ein Lesebereich mit Lesestuhl und Salontisch auf einem uniweissen geknüpftem Bauwollenteppich. Ein Schrank sowie eine Kleiderstange und ein Regale bietet genügend Platz für Stauraum.

The space
Der besondere Charm der Wohnung erhält sie durch die schöne Einrichtung sowie durch die naturnahen Verwendung der Materialien. Der gemeinsame Gangboden ist aus Terrazzo-Stein geschliffen, die Zimmer besitzen ein geölter Massivholz Buchenparkettboden im Fischgrät-Verlegemuster aus der Gründerzeit. Die WG besteht aus 3 weiteren Mitbewohnern zwischen 25-35, die zurzeit zu Hause arbeiten. Zwei Badezimmer, die jeweils zu zweit genutzt werden. Waschmaschine und Trockner in der Wohnung. Die Küche ist voll ausgestattet und kann mitbenutzt werden.

Der Bahnhof Oerlikon ist mit Bus (5min) oder zu Fuss (10min) gut erreichbar. Hallenstadion und Zürich Messe sind mit dem ÖV oder zu Fuss in 10 min erreichbar. HB und Flughafen sind mit ÖV je in 15-20min erreichbar.
In Oerlikon gibt es zahlreiche Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Sonst auch fussläufig sind verschiedene Läden erreichbar.

name: Beautiful high floor double room with view over the city
description:
We are the newest and hottest concept on the market!

Welcome to Nôtel! *We are not a hotel*, but a self-check-in home in the heart of Zurich Oerlikon. Clean, convenient, well equipped and fair priced is what we offer!

What to expect:
-easy, fast and convenient self check-in
-a comfortable and clean room of high standard with wifi
-a spacious lobby area with plenty of room to work and welcome friends
-within 3 minutes walking distance there are countless shopping possibilities and restaurants
-located directly next to the station Oerlikon
-one of the best transport links (within 5 minutes to the main station in Zurich / within 5 minutes to the airport’s)
-much more

What you should not expect:

name: Charming apartment for longstay close to ETH
description:
The apartment has 3 rooms and there is space for up to 4 people. It's perfect for a couple or families and it's located very centrally in Zürich city, very close to the University and ETH. Well connected public transportation and the city center is reachable by walking distance or 5 min by tram.
Next to the proprety they are building a house, so it's possible that during the they there will be some noise.
By request it is also possible to rent a parking space.

The space
The apartment is on the third floor and has two bedrooms with each a 140cm double bed. Both rooms have a balcony. The livingroom has a dining table and a sofabed. The kitchen is fully equipped with a coffee machine, a dish washer and the basic cookingtools as well as a balcony. The bathroom has a bathtub and a toilet.

Guest access
The whole apartment is at your disposal

name: Sophisticated apartment in the heart of Zurich
neighborhood_overview:
The old town is located in elegant District 1 (Kreis 1) , with cobbled streets full of cozy bars, traditional Swiss restaurants and art museums such as the Kunsthaus. The Fraumünster with stained glass windows by the artists Chagall and Giacometti is one of the district's famous churches.
There are chocolatiers, jewelers and exclusive boutiques along the upscale Bahnhofstrasse shopping street. The hill Lindenhof offers a view of the Limmat and its popular river promenade.
host_about: I am Swiss-Brazilian, married, love to travel, meeting the locals and enjoying the nightlife as well as the morning sunrise.

name: Doppelzimmer - Josephine's Guesthouse (Women only)
description:
Das Josephine's Guesthouse for Women genießt eine zentrale Lage in Zürich, 800 m vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt.

Jedes der frisch renovierten Zimmer bietet ein eigenes Bad mit einer Dusche. Während Ihres Aufenthalts im Josephine's stehen Ihnen ein Gemeinschaftswohnzimmer mit Panoramablick und eine große Dachterrasse zur Verfügung. Darüber hinaus erwartet Sie eine komplett ausgestattete Küche.
Morgens wird Ihnen in der obersten Etage ein Frühstück serviert.

The space
Josephine's Guesthouse hat eine lange Geschichte - fast hundert Jahre lang war das Gebäude ein Mädchenpensionat, später auch eine Art "Frauenhaus". Dann hat der Eigentümerverein entschieden, dass das Haus renoviert und das Konzept modernisiert werden muss. So kam das Team von Josephine's in die Liegenschaft - wir sind erfahrend Hotelprofis und führen bereits zwei andere Betriebe in Zürich - das hotel marta und das Hotel Lady's First. Alle drei Betriebe haben eines gemeinsam: Wir wollen ein

name: Real Airbnb experience - own flat near city center
description:
Cosy sunny apartment in walking distance to city center. This is a real Airbnb experience meaning that I live in this flat and rent it when I'm out of town. You'll be able to enjoy a home feeling in this fully equipped flat.

Zurich is a walk-friendly city and you'll be able to reach many of the points of interest on foot, such as the main street (bahnhofstrasse), old town, Limmat river, all in 10min distance.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire apartment and shared washing and drying facilities within the building. Note: the apartment is on the 3rd floor and there's no elevator available.

description: Lichtdurchflutetes modernes Loft im Herzen Zürichs. Direkt am Schaffhauser Platz mit Supermärkten, Apotheke, Post, öffentliche Verkehrsanbindung. Die untere Etage ist mit der Terasse verbunden und verfügt über ein Badezimmer mit Dusche. Die obere Etage besteht aus einem großen Bad, einem Arbeitsbereich und zwei  Schlafzimmern mit Doppelbetten.
neighborhood_overview: Sehr entspannte und freundliche Nachbarn.

2 room apartment (50 m2) with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom / shower, living room with open kitchen and patio. The apartment is located 5 minutes from the Balgrist tram station and in 3 minutes you are in the green at the nearby woods with a beautiful river walk

Guest access
You have access to all rooms within the apartment.
host_about: Since 1994 I live in Zurich together with my 3 children Jonas, Noëmi, Chiara , our bernese mountaindog "Chester". I love to take care of the family, the house and the garden and I like to travel, that's where I got the idea of opening a Airbnb. Meeting people from all over the world, gives me the impression of still beeing travelling a little bit.

name: Ruhiges Gäste- und Arbeitszimmer - Nähe Uni Irchel
description:
Das Privatzimmer liegt in einem ruhigen Quartier in der Nähe der Universität Zürich Campus Irchel und des Flughafens Zürich. Das Zimmer wird auch als Pendlerzimmer oder für temporäres Wohnen vermietet. Es verfügt über ein bequemes Einzelbett und einen voll ausgestatteten Arbeitsplatz mit Schreibtisch und Drucker zur Mitnutzung. Das Zimmer ist hell und verfügt über einen Zugang zum Balkon. Der Zugang zur Küche und zum Badezimmer mit Dusche wird geteilt. Ein Parkplatz steht zur Verfügung.

The space
Bei unserem Zimmer handelt es sich um ein voll ausgestattetes Gäste- und Arbeitszimmer zur temporären Vermietung. Ideal für Pendler und Studenten die in der Stadt arbeiten und lernen und die Nähe zum Campus Irchel, zum Tierspital oder zum Flughafen suchen. Die Wohnung ist sehr gut an die Öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel angebunden (zur Haltestelle Tierspital 2 Minuten Wegzeit). Auf Wunsch und gegen einen kleinen Beitrag bereiten wir gerne auch das Frühstück vor.
neighborhood_overview: Wir leben mitten in der Stadt und geniessen mit dem nahegelegenen Irchelpark und dem gegenüberliegenden Wald trotzdem die Nähe zur Natur.  Nahe gelegene Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Cafés befinden sich am Berninaplatz (zu Fuss erreichbar) ansonsten vom Milchbuck runter bis zum Schaffhauserplatz viele Restaurants, Bäckereien und Geschäfte.
